應用名稱: Toko：與 AI 機器人練習真實英語對話，增強英文口說自信

評論.標題: 他們只是想要你的錢，如果你不繼續訂閱，你以前付費得到的英文更正將都不見
評論.內容: This app requires you to re-subscribe in order to view your previous corrections. If you don’t continue to pay, any functionality related to your previous work will be blocked. This is so ridiculous, and I will never use it again
這是一個會重複扣款的APP，我在2024/8買了一年的會員，卻又在2024/12/30重複扣了一次，而且明明扣款明細寫了續約日期是2025/8，我向他們反應了卻都沒有人回覆，我只能說這是非常不安全的APP，我不會再繼續使用他。

評論.標題: 如何將手機版的Toko，移質iPad上？
評論.內容: 我的眼睛因為年紀的關係，看不清楚，手機上的字！所以我就嘗試要把它改成在iPad上看。但今天測試的結果原有上課的資料都不見了，要從最基礎的開始。可否派一個人幫我解決一下這個問題？

評論.標題: The app can truly improve my English!
評論.內容: I’m a generative AI engineer in Asia and speaking of English makes me very headache. This app show the power of my research direction and it makes excited that I can sense the powerful of generative AI! The shortage of it is after I subscribed it, it last nearly entire day that I can use all its functions. It’s so weird. So I suggest that the software of it should be optimized further.

評論.標題: Can I charge based on usage time?
評論.內容: Because I am always busy on the time and I don’t know when am I free this week or next all week, and I just want to pay based on the usage time, please
This App is amazing and useful , but the subscription cost is reaaaaaly high. I am a student, I can’t afford to $18 per month.

If the AI can point out your grammatically mistakes immediately after you send a message, it would better. Because the whole point of using this kind of app is to imitate having a native speaker friend to talk to. When you talk to a real person, he would definitely point out your grammatically mistakes.
让我在学习英文的过程中看到了乐趣，轻松的学习才能持久

評論.標題: 很棒的英文學習app，想給予鼓勵
評論.內容:
讓人不受限時間與地理位置，語音AI能分辨以及對答的能力已經讓人刮目相看了。每天持續的練習應該能獲得很好的效果。
美中不足的地方是文法建議部分希望可以再敏銳點，清楚判斷說的人語意以及錯誤的地方，而非只是純粹修正單字片語而沒有針對前後文。

評論.評論者: 真的好酷炫哦哦哦哦哦
評論.內容: I can’t use it because of the connection error… 主界面一直打不开呢

評論.標題: 很酷的英文會話學習體驗
評論.內容:
很久沒有嘗試英文會話app 因為之前使用的經驗往往呆板無聊 像是voice tube只能反覆朗誦 針對枝微末節校正 但toko 不同 他就像是跟真人講話一樣 比如說我回答提到我有一隻貓 他會問我我的貓叫什麼名字幾歲呢 這個過程就像是真實情況會發生正日常生活中 非常獨特且優質的練習

比較可惜的一點是文法校正沒法體驗 若點選文法校正 會出現訂閱服務的頁面 但希望可以在付費訂閱前先看到文法校正的內容 才可更明確判斷是否合適自己的學習目標

總之！這是一個相當有趣的ai 英文會話練習軟體、我會持續體驗！謝謝研發團隊！
I like how the conversation flow and how AI works. However, the way the auto voice talk just unnatural and the intonation is not helpful to leaner s.

the chatbot is actually very knowledgeable about the world, and I can have interesting conversation with it instead of repeating myself. I wish in the future, they can make the bot as a personal tutor for school kids. And I wish it can adaptively change the vocab level according to the user’s proficiency
一起聊了电影《肖申克的救赎》，对电影有深入的理解，棒

評論.標題: 超方便的英語會話練習App
評論.內容:
這裡必須感謝Toko與你們兩位創始人，因為2月的時候有使用Toko讓我在考托福的時候能夠更善於口說，這段使用時間等同於我能夠隨時使用英文，有點像是小型的營隊，不會受限於中文地區。

而我今年9月的時候來到波士頓就讀MassArt碩士，日常與世界各地的人溝通時因為使用過Toko的練習，也讓我在對話中更能夠延續話題。

非常感謝你們！

應用名稱: Canva：設計、照片和影片
應用描述:
Canva 可讓你在單一平面設計應用程式中輕鬆編輯相片和影片！創作令人驚艷的社交媒體帖子、影片、卡片、傳單、相片拼貼等等。

沒有設計經驗或專業嗎？沒有問題！從相片編輯器、拼貼設計工具到標誌設計工具都十分簡單易用，人人皆可輕鬆使用 Canva 發揮設計創意。

精美範本 
• 用數千款可自訂範本激發靈感
• 饒富趣味的 Facebook 帖子、Insta 版面配置、Instagram 帖子設計工具、IG 限時動態和情緒板
• 專業設計的邀請函、傳單、禮券等，讓你的業務或活動廣受歡迎
• 運用我們的標誌設計工具展示你的產品
• 運用時尚的簡報範本和投影片設計工具，讓資料一目了然

相片編輯器 – 沒有廣告和浮水印
• 讓你輕鬆裁切、翻轉和編輯相片的圖片應用程式
• 調整亮度、對比、飽和度、色調、模糊等設定
• 自動對焦以形成背景模糊效果，以及相片主體銳利化
• 使用美學濾鏡 (Retro、像素化、液化等)，呈現獨特設計風格
• 有趣的相片網格和相片拼貼設計工具

影片編輯器 – 輕觸幾下就能製作精彩影片
• 直接使用手機製作專業影片
• 修剪、剪輯和分割影片版面配置與音軌
• 將影片與影像裁切、調整尺寸和翻轉成任何尺寸
• 運用一鍵式動畫和頁面轉場，使靜態影像動起來
• 覆疊多重音樂、音效和配音音軌
• 影片編輯器也能當作影片拼貼設計工具和投影片設計工具使用！

社交媒體 – 用流行的內容大放異彩
• 探索數千款適用於 Instagram、TikTok、Facebook、Twitter、YouTube、Snapchat、LinkedIn 等社交媒體的範本
• 使用 Scheduler 將規劃完成的 Instagram 帖子排入張貼佇列 [Canva Pro]
• 善用我們的相片編輯器製作令人讚嘆的 Instagram 版面配置
• 拼貼設計工具和影片編輯器簡單易用，讓你輕鬆創作相片網格、拼貼

豐富的庫存圖庫 – 超過 200 萬個資產供你使用
• 完整組合套裝：你需要的所有元素盡在其中
• 超過 200 萬張免版稅圖片
• 數千支無浮水印庫存影片
• 超過 2 萬 5 千首預先授權的音軌和音樂

智能樣張 – 瀏覽設計成品印在恤衫上或印成海報等媒介的外觀
• 在產品上呈現設計成品，展現專業視覺效果
• 適用於手機、手提電腦、海報和其他展示媒介的高解像度樣張
• 訂購印刷傳單、馬克杯和服裝，用於贈禮或商業用途

即時協作 – 不限人選和裝置
• 隨時隨地編輯團隊專案和簡報
• 在流動裝置上展開設計，在電腦上完成設計，完全無縫接軌
• 與團隊成員即時合作、提供註解和套用變更

CANVA PRO
• 運用付費版範本、圖片、影片和圖像，將構想化為真實成果
• 以背景移除工具、自動調整尺寸和內容規劃表等工具節省寶貴時間
• 利用品牌工具組設計及經營原創品牌
• 和團隊聯手合作嗎？Canva - 團隊版可協助所有人更快速地完成創作

適合所有人的設計工具 
• 個人 - 用於創意和專業用途的版面配置設計，例如 Instagram 範本、履歷、相片拼貼等等
• 企業家 - 運用我們的標誌設計工具、影片編輯器、海報設計工具等創意工具拓展你的業務
• 學生與教師 - 透過精美的簡報和工作表投入學習和教學
• 社交媒體管理員和內容創作者 - 使用相片編輯器和拼貼設計工具，為品牌打造一致的
視覺效果。

*除非你在目前週期結束的 24 小時前關閉自動續約功能，否則你的每月訂用將會自動續訂。我們會在你確認購買時向你的 iTunes 帳戶收費。你可以在「iTunes 帳戶設定」管理你的應用程式訂用。如有提供免費試用期，則在你購買付費訂用項目後，即會喪失尚未開始使用的部分。無綁約。

https://about.canva.com/terms-of-use
https://about.canva.com/privacy-policy 

注意：在 App Store 透過應用程式內購功能購買的影像包，僅供在適用於 iPhone 的 Canva 應用程式中使用。

有任何問題或意見嗎？歡迎透過 http://canva.me/ios 聯絡我們

應用名稱: ChatGPT
應用描述:
Introducing ChatGPT for iOS: OpenAI’s latest advancements at your fingertips.

This official app is free, syncs your history across devices, and brings you the newest model improvements from OpenAI.

With ChatGPT in your pocket, you’ll find:

· Advanced Voice Mode–tap the soundwave icon to have a real-time convo on the go, request a bedtime story for your family, or settle a dinner table debate.
· Creative inspiration—birthday gift ideas or help creating a personalized greeting card. 
· Tailored advice—help crafting a personalized response or talking through a tough situation.
· Learning opportunities—help explaining electricity to a dinosaur loving kid or the ability to easily refamiliarize yourself with a historic event. 
· Professional input—a brainstorm partner for marketing copy or a business plan.
· Instant answers—clarification whether the napkin goes on the right or the left of the plate or a recipe when you only have a few ingredients.



Join hundreds of millions of users and try the app captivating the world. Download ChatGPT today.

評論.標題: Awesome, but still a bit unreliable
評論.內容: Overall a very helpful and incredible tool. Although it gets very seemingly straightforward things wrong, but speaks as if it’s completely correct. I.e. I asked it factual questions about a particularly well known athlete. It gave a very detailed and convincing response that was straight up false. I corrected it and it replied “you’re absolutely correct. Sorry about that.” Then it went on to “correct” the mistake by giving another factually false response. Also it often gets very basic math questions incorrect. But it has helped me map out some very useful plans for my business, plans for my fitness (personalized Meal and workout programs), as well as some financials plans. All in all, a great tool but for the user sure needs to double check its work.

評論.標題: Great when it works, horrible when it doesn’t
評論.內容:
This app is great when it does what you want, but horrible when it doesn’t. There are times it removed the background but left the doll stand showing! Then when creating an ai background, when you finally find the right one (which at times can take hours), if you move your image, the background changes! Usually to a horrible one. There is a “lock” feature in layers, but the background still changes, so the lock feature is useless. You can also save your background to “brand kit” but good luck finding it! You can also create a template from your design, but it saves the entire design as the background. So if you want to put a different image, it will just be on top of all the other images you used for that template instead of being able to remove it and only use the background. Finding a good ai image is the luck of the draw. You can describe what you want but sometimes it’s horrible. Describe the same exact thing using a different image, and it comes out perfect! Try to get the same background for another image and you won’t be able to. I wish there was a way to save the background or actually lock it not to change so that you can use different images with the same background. As for now, that is not an available feature.
Also, sometimes when you save an image, there’s no watermark. And other times a watermark covers the entire photo multiple times, so there’s no way to use the image. So in conclusion, sometimes this app is great, sometimes it’s not.

So this review is gonna get deep. Back in June of 2022, I had an ex who cheated on me, I was heart broken, I changed my career during that time as well so I was dealing with stress from that as well. I randomly downloaded this game finding it on tiktok. I love cats so I down loaded right away. I played it for awhile. I loved it so much cause it was so relaxing and kept my mind off of the ex boyfriend😂😂 Then I quit playing once it seemed like it was impossible for me to purchase more cats and cooking stations (I had no clue the app needed an update at the time). Now….in 2025 I downloaded again. I have a newborn baby (my first ever baby) and I cannot return to work because my husband and my work schedules do not work out for it, we have no family near us and no good baby sitters. It’s been tough for me being stuck at home. I randomly started playing this game again, and since I updated it…the game has gotten so much cuter I wanna cry. It’s crazy how relaxing this game is. I love it so much. I love the cats, all the cute sounds that are made when the cats are preparing ingredients♥️♥️

The game is great. I love dressing up my little cats, hearing their little sound effects, and decorating. It’s idle so I don’t have to be online to get rewards of earn money. The only reason why I uninstalled is because of the glitching. I’ll do my quests, and earn my rewards but it doesn’t even put them into my account. I’ll watch as the gems I collect go into the bar but don’t move my number of gems. It happens constantly also with the stamps. I’ve got the effect on screen of getting stamps but my number of stamps doesn’t move. That’s the only thing I hate about the game which makes me uninstall because what’s the point of doing little quests and redeeming my stuff if I won’t even have it added to my gems or stamps? It gets annoying and discouraging.

I love the game from its customization to the details in the animation. It’s diversity with cats is wonderful and collecting them is nothing but fun. I started about 4-5 months ago which I thought wasn’t bad. You can customize everything from the stations your cats work at, to the cats rooms, to the actual cats themselves. The cats have hats, clothes, accessories, and even friends. My only gripe comes in at the ads for this game, it’s 100% ad based and they used to have an upgrade available for the sloth manager but they took it away about a year and a half ago. I never got a chance to upgrade mine however my wife did and I regret my decision to not act. All that to say I won’t act like I don’t play the game every day and don’t enjoy playing it, me and my wife both play and we both enjoy it.
Is the best game ever that’s all I have to say

評論.標題: Can’t play this anymore because of crashes
評論.內容:
Stopped playing this game for a while and then came back to it. It used to work great, but after updating the game now it won’t stop crashing. Every time I go to take a picture or buy something in cat tower it crashes. Also just by doing random things. Crashes every 3 minutes or so. It’s a shame this last update broke the game for me Update: Recently opened game to see if there is any improvement with the crashes. As usual it crashed, but this time when I reopened I found it reset my progress back. I lost a few letters worth of gold and other items I had collected! It’s another level of frustration when on top of the glitches slowdowns and crashes, now we’re losing our progress! 

This is an issue that many many other users are experiencing, as can be seen by other reviews here and many on the Reddit Cats and Soup thread. It’s concerning that no acknowledgement has been made of this, and makes me feel that this will ultimately not be addressed. I truly hope I’m wrong because this is an enjoyable game.
Edit: I received an email asking that I contact support for a resolution. The game app sends you to a link that is not working for me

評論.標題: Game is amazing with one suggestion
評論.內容: This game is great, this the only idle game I've ever found myself coming back to over and over again. The cost of add-ons is legitimately absurd (who would pay $45 for enhancements to a single part of gameplay?), but I don't care about that at all because you don't need those enhancements to play or succeed. One very specific suggestion I have is that the basketball game scoring should be scalable. It's such a fun addition, but my high score is currently 400 and the prizes stop after 70. It would be nice if it kept going or maybe even just every additional 50 points after 70 you get more gems or materials. Please implement this, the basketball game is a lot less fun going just for a meaningless high score.

評論.標題: Best Relaxing Game of all time
評論.內容:
Cats are literally one of my most favorite animals. When I saw this game my curiosity went through the roof!
I decided to give it a try, and by golly I wasn’t disappointed.
The sounds of bubbling soup, sizzling food, and blending juice, along with the other noises is very satisfying. Not to mention the fact that you can relax until they give you a dish or drink. Once that’s done p, you just simply click the item and it gives you money!
I also love how it’s not overwhelming, and the fact that there’s music in the background is even better.
If you haven’t tried this app, download it! I highly recommend it ❤️❤️
I LOVE IT!

評論.標題: My favorite game! But there’s room to improve.
評論.內容:
I have been playing this game for over 2 years now and it’s incredibly enjoyable. The aesthetics of the game are top notch, as well as the animations. Every outfit, furniture piece, etc, is so well made and the attention to detail is incredible. I only have one major ask that would make the game better. 

The “collection” is in desperate need of an update/refresh. I think it should show every breed in the game, including event limited. It’s hard to keep track of what ones I’m missing and I usually end up checking Reddit or the Wiki to see who I’m missing. I have 64 cats and it would be so cool to see my progress as only 3 of those 64 are repeat breeds, or at least I think so seeing as there’s not a great way to track what breeds you’ve collected or how many of each you have. It would also be a cool place to see how you can purchase a different breed, whether it’s through the stamp rally, events, or gifts. If they could update the collection I would give this game 5 stars!

This problem has persisted with every update since, so it’s clear that they aren’t gonna fix whatever is broken. This goes beyond a language barrier and into straight up not caring. I had adored this game, but since it’s never gonna be fixed & the publishers don’t care, I would suggest avoiding it. That way you’ll avoid the same disappointment I’ve had.

應用名稱: Speak - 英文口說智慧學習，讓你自信開口「說」英語
應用描述:
【打開手機就能練習，全面提升英文口說力】

要讓語言進步的方式，就是練習！Speak 為你打造了最舒適的英文口說練習環境。
打開 App 就能和 AI 對談，想聊什麼就聊什麼，搭配 AI 即時修正建議，英文實力有感提升。

▲ 真實用戶好評

「AI對話時，會針對說錯的地方加強訓練，很棒」

「最喜歡和 AI 的對話練習，因為能立即收到回饋或建議，知道要改善的地方/文法。」

「是個練習開口說話的好工具。」

「與AI對話就和同與真人對話，Speak還會提出修改建議。」

---- 

▲ Speak 學習系統介紹
1. 定期更新的真人影音主題式課程，學習必備英文單字及句型。
2. 反覆口說練習重點句型，加強記憶並且延伸於不同情境。
3. 課程後的 AI 角色扮演，練習把學會的新詞講出來。
4. AI 實境對話，並且針對你的口說內容給予回饋，針對弱點設計個人化口說課程。

▲Speak 適合什麼樣的人？會適合我的程度嗎？
不用擔心，Speak 內容完全可以根據你的需求做調整。
1. 影音課程內容按照程度分級，從初階到進階，都能找到你需要的課程。
2. AI 對話提供初學者模式，透過開啟初學者設定，可以搭配放慢語速、中英翻譯等輔助學習。
3. 對談主題情境多元。不論是想商業英文對談、生活聊天 small talk、 旅遊溝通，Speak 都能滿足你。

---- 

▲Speak 是什麼？
Speak 總部位於美國舊金山，是一款由國際專業教學團隊設計的英文學習 App。透過影音課程、反覆練習慣用詞及單字、AI 實境對話等步驟化學習，跟著我們設計的學習路徑，真正有意識練習英文口說。

---- 

如果您有任何意見或問題，請聯絡我們：feedback@usespeak.com。 

---- 

SPEAK 會員 
Speak 提供自動續期的月度和年度訂閱。成為 Speak 會員，無限制存取 Speak 的所有課程、獨立課程、複習教材及其他內容。 除非在當前有效期結束前至少 24 小時在「iTunes 帳戶設定」中提前關閉，否則，訂閱將自動續期。您可以進入「iTunes 帳戶設定」頁面管理您的訂閱，並關閉自動續期功能。在確認購買後，我們將從您的 iTunes 帳戶中扣費。
如果您在免費試用期結束前訂閱，您剩餘的免費試用天數將在您確認購買後歸零。 

服務條款： https://usespeak.com/tos 
隱私權政策： https://usespeak.com/privacy

評論.內容: I’ve tried to learn Spanish many times with no success. I’m still not great after a few days of this course, but I feel better about speaking Spanish than ever.

Using for Spanish. Lesson plan is pretty scattered, need to supplement with other resources imo. I have to frequently switch to a simple translate app for quick reference. Hard to know where you are or to review lessons(still figuring that out). I have to constantly save “lines” to have the ability to review. No way to organize the saved lines. Saving “phrases” in the AI ends up in a completely different place. I only bought this because of the AI feature, which as a beginner I really don’t use much yet. Super expensive. Overall it’s good, and I enjoy the lessons. The AI seems amazing. You can have spontaneous conversations and it will suggest corrections. You can create any kind of custom lesson. In the long run I think it will work for me. Just removing one star for price and disorganization.

應用名稱: Microsoft 365 Copilot
應用描述:
Microsoft 365 Copilot 應用程式是您日常工作與生活所需的生產力應用程式，可協助您尋找與編輯檔案、掃瞄文件，並隨時建立內容，您可在一個應用程式中存取 Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat*、Word、Excel、PowerPoint 和 PDF。(前身為 Microsoft 365 (Office) 應用程式)
有了公司用 Copilot，您可以在簡化的聊天體驗中輕鬆提出問題、建立訊息和撰寫草稿，以提高生產力。

*Microsoft 365 Copilot 應用程式中的 Copilot 聊天適用於 Microsoft 365 企業版、學術版和具有工作或教育帳戶的 SMB 訂閱者。Microsoft 365 個人版和家庭訂閱者以及免費帳戶可以在 copilot.microsoft.com 和 Copilot 行動裝置應用程式上存取 Microsoft Copilot。其可在下列特定市場中使用: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/supported-languages-for-microsoft-copilot-94518d61-644b-4118-9492-617eea4801d8。

單一應用程式中的 Word、Excel、PowerPoint 和 Copilot：
• 與您的 AI 助理 Copilot 合作，追蹤、提問和草擬內容。
• 使用 Word 以專業範本撰寫和編輯履歷表等文件。
• 使用 PowerPoint 搭配簡報者教練等工具來練習您的簡報。
• 使用 Excel 試算表範本管理您的預算。
• 嘗試 Designer，使用 AI 的強大功能，在數秒內建立設計和編輯相片。
*Designer 僅適用於個人 Microsoft 帳戶。需要訂閱 Microsoft 365 個人版和家庭版才能繼續使用進階功能。

PDF 功能：
• 使用 PDF 轉換工具掃描 PDF 檔案並將其轉換為 Word 文件。
• 隨時隨地在您的裝置上快速輕鬆地編輯 PDF 檔案。
• PDF 閱讀程式可讓您存取和簽署 PDF。

任何人均可免費下載 Microsoft 365 Copilot 應用程式。透過連線 Microsoft 帳戶 (OneDrive 或 SharePoint) 或第三方雲端儲存供應商，存取並儲存文件至雲端。使用個人 Microsoft 帳戶或連線至 Microsoft 365 訂閱的工作或學校帳戶登入，即可解鎖應用程式內的進階功能。
訂閱及資料隱私權免責聲明

從應用程式購買的 Microsoft 365 個人版與家庭版按月訂閱將從您的 App Store 帳戶收費，除非已事先停用自動續約功能，否則將在目前訂閱期間結束之前的 24 小時內自動為您續約。您可以在 App Store 帳戶設定中管理您的訂閱。

此應用程式由 Microsoft 或第三方應用程式發行者提供，並受個別隱私權聲明和條款及條件所限制。Microsoft 或第三方應用程式發行者可能會視需要存取用於此 Microsoft Store 和此應用程式所提供的資料，以及在美國轉移、儲存和處理資料，或者在 Microsoft 或應用程式發行者及其關係企業或服務提供者維護設備所在的其他任何國家/地區轉移、儲存和處理資料。
請參閱 Microsoft 的 EULA，以取得 Microsoft 365 之服務條款。安裝應用程式即表示您同意這些條款與條件：https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-gb&aid=SoftwareLicensingTerms_en-gb.htm

I use Read Out Loud to review documents, as it helps me hear missing words or improperly structured sentences.  

If I attempt to edit a document, I am able to press the backspace once, then nothing happens.  

There a pause of up to 30 seconds before the document updates.  Then it applies any updates I attempted while the application was hung.  This initially caused me to have correct more than a single word.  Now I know it will hang, and I wait, but it frustrating.

There is no option to disable Copilot, it continually asks if I want the document summarized.  I do not, especially since it costs me a credit if I tap it by mistake.

You didn’t know that?  Well, now you do!  You get 30 ‘free’ credits each month, then you need to purchase additional credits - IF you use Copilot.

Yep!  You PAY monthly to use Office 365, and you PAY to use Copilot!

Additionally, the logo changed, which is annoying, since I am used to old logo. 

I am very close to looking for another document editor!  These ‘advances’ have slowed down my production - greatly!

Has Word just become too top-heavy with predictive text, auto-correct, and now Copilot to function as a word processor?

評論.內容:
Hello. I really like the app and it’s pretty easy to use. I just wanted to share some improvement and ideas. 

1. Reimbursement and refund. It would be a great feature to add a refund or reimbursement option to apply on a different account. For example if I pay with my credit card for a bill but I get refunded or reimbursed with cash. There should be an option to apply the refund into my bank account instead of original payment. 

2. When making future payments to credit accounts the bank and credit balance is adjusted automatically even before the payment date. This shows inaccurate current balances for both credit and bank. 

3. Future balance. It would be great to be able to time travel and check past or future balances of accounts. For example if I want to check what my card and bank balances will be in 3 weeks or what it was a month ago. This can help plan with budgeting for future purchases.

使用这款记账软件已经差不多一年了吧，之前试过至少五款不同的记账软件，包括mint 鲨鱼等，但是没有一款产品能够同时满足我的所有需求，我甚至还想过自己开发一款记账工具，不过幸好找到了Daak。

我的主要诉求以及Daak的优点如下：
1.亲手记账，不与任何银行数据同步。只有亲手记账才能对花出去的钱有所感知，更清楚地知道自己每段时间花了多少钱。个人并不喜欢mint一类的与银行数据同步的应用。
2.多种货币友好。有很多中国app都只是对rmb友好，就算记账时设置了记美金，最后看数据也全部都换算成rmb计算，对于有多国银行卡和持有好几种货币的人来说非常不方便。Daak在这方面已经比很多国内app做得更好，但还有提升空间。
3.界面简单，使用逻辑清晰。Daak这点做的挺好的，而且小图标很可爱，看着很顺眼。除了不同消费类型的图标，还有各银行的图标供选择。
4.能够记录A钱，退款之类的操作。很多app都有这个功能，但个人觉得Daak做的特别好。不仅会单独显示一条退款的entry，还会在原来那条消费的entry上同时显示，感觉非常的直观。
5.导出数据方便，主要是为了偶尔做一些自定义visualization和分析看看自己的消费习惯，但并不常用。

Daak还有一些其他功能我从来没有用过，比如存钱罐。以后会考虑尝试使用一下这些功能。

还有一些建议：
- 提供可选的银行图标可以再加入一些其他银行，目前wells fargo，discover，sofi之类的都没有。
- 如何一次定义budget后每个月都用同样的budget？也许这个功能已经存在，但我没找到。
- 在资产界面，将不同货币单位的资产分开显示，比如美金净资产xxx，人民币净资产xxx

There should be a way to create or import new currencies and handle multi-currency per account. 

Support for GTQ, COP Latin American Currency

I chose this app to keep a simple log of transactions with a running account balance. The icons are cute, and I like being able to name accounts whatever I want. I don’t have to register on an external website, which is good. I purchased the premium version. 

Then I started using it. After I reset everything twice and started over again. I think I set up everything correctly. The next day, I still couldn’t balance my account and had to use a spreadsheet to get my balance. Where are the tutorial videos to help with this confusing UI? Uninstalled.

應用名稱: TalkMe-與 AI 機器人真實聊天，練習英語日語韓語對話
開發者: Beijing Tiantian Jinbu Intelligence Technology Co., Ltd.
應用描述:
你是否學習了很久外語，但口語依然很糟糕？

你覺得自己會的單字很多，但還是無法與外國人溝通超過3分鐘？

其實我們普遍都有這個問題：無法說一口流利的外語！

問題在於我們從來沒有機會練習口語！

如果你想學游泳，最好的方式是去游泳池，而不是讀游泳的書；同樣的，如果你想學好一門外語，最好的方式是開口說！

“想學好一門外語，最好的方式就是與母語使用者聊天！”

但不是每個人都有外國朋友！也不是每個人面對外國人都敢開口！

或許TalkMe可以幫到你！

全球已經有10萬+外語學習者在透過TalkMe學習英語、日語、韓語、西語、中文等語言！

非常建議你能花5分鐘的時間來體驗一下！一定會讓你眼前一亮！

我將為您詳細描述我們的產品特色！

◆產品特色◆

【跨時代的外語練習軟體】

與傳統產品不同，TalkMe底層基於多款大模型並基於語言學習場景進行模型訓練，利用尖端的人工智能技術，讓您可以與AI機器人進行真實的對話，AI能聽懂你的話，並且像一個真正的母語人士回覆你！

【沉浸式的母語環境】

1、支持學習6種語言，60+位來自世界各地的AI夥伴，他們具有真實且標準的聲音！
2、從商務職場到日常生活再到感情經歷，您可以在150多個話題和100多個真實情景中進行選擇！
3、您還可以與AI自由的對話亦或是透過AI幫您創造任何真實且有趣的情景！

【輕鬆無壓力的練習】

因為是與AI對話練習，你不必擔心說錯也不用感到尷尬！ 放心大膽的說任何你想說的，可以主動輸出大量的內容，AI會給你完全不一樣的回饋！ 幫你徹底掌握如何使用單字、文法、表達方式等外語的各個面向！

【隨時隨地練習】

忘記與家教排課的麻煩吧，您可以隨時隨地的練習外語，而無需預約和等待！ 為了提升你的會話能力，經常開口是最重要的，即使每天只說5分鐘！

【簡潔美觀的多語言介面】

我們支援10+APP顯示語言，並且做了針對性的適配，您可以自由切換，對於新手您可以選擇顯示自己的母語，但是對於進階的同學您可以試試切換成目標語言（例如學習英語，可以將APP語言切成英語）更沉浸在外語環境中！

【學習更多實用單字】

透過對話，您不懂的單字、片語和句型，都可以使用我們的AI學習功能隨時進行翻譯、解釋和收藏，單字還有更高階的字根拓展能力，句子有更高階的句型解析能力！

【練習更多陌生表達】

透過對話，您可以聽到AI講的語音，遇到陌生的表達，可以隨時使用我們的口語練習功能進行跟讀練習！

【獨創的任務目標機制】

在我們的情境練習中，AI會即時偵測完成情況，判斷你說的每一句話是否達成了目標，支持提前完成課程！不用擔心沒有達到規定對話數量而畫好！全球產品中僅有TalkMe支援！

【獨創的情境自由創造能力】

我們支援自訂任何情境/主題，但與其他產品不同的是，我們獨家支援了AI智慧生成功能，您甚至可以填寫一部分，剩下的AI會幫您寫！也可以寫出你想扮演的角色，AI會根據你的角色自動幫你產生有趣的情境！

【針對日文獨家優化】

我們非常理解日語學習中的難點，針對日語我們貼心的做了很多額外優化，例如針對日文漢字我們增加了假名標註，幫助您口說！甚至為了剛入門的學習者，我們增加了羅馬注音的功能，快來試試看日語吧！你一定會很喜歡！

【超強的即時回饋】

我們深知即時回饋對語言學習的重要性，所以做了特殊的優化，區別於其他所有產品，我們不僅提供了比較常規的語法、發音的即時回饋，還新增了針對語法錯誤的詳細解釋，以及透過AI幫你潤飾成更道地的表達方式（支持潤飾成口語化與正式化的表達）！

【清晰的學習計劃】

我們會自適應的安排每天的學習內容，每日一課只要5分鐘！如果您覺得不夠，您也可以選擇進行額外的練習！我們提供的內容非常豐富！


當然，我們的特色絕不只有這些，希望您可以體驗一下，就會感受到我們是真的用心在做這款產品，考慮了特別多的細節！

◆遇見更好的自己◆

- 取得優異成績：您是否打算參加托福、雅思、TOIEC、JLPT、TOPIK、HSK等考試？ TalkMe 可顯著提高您的口語技能，提高您的學業成功率，並且非常適合準備考試。
- 拓展您的職業可能性：夢想加入跨國公司或向海外擴張？ TalkMe 提升您在面試、談判、銷售等方面的關鍵業務演講技巧，將您的職業生涯推向新的高度。
- 日常社交場合：無論是與鄰居聊天、逛商場、出國旅遊，TalkMe都能幫助你掌握自然的表達方式，擁有更好的社交生活。
- 發現文化見解：透過與 TalkMe 進行真實對話，發現語言背後的文化價值。 我們將幫助您提升跨文化溝通技巧。

◆誰創造了TalkMe◆

我們是一個8人的創業團隊，團隊核心成員來自哈佛大學（Harvard）教育科技專業以及帝國理工學院（IC）的碩士留學生，均畢業了5年以上，積累了豐富的產品設計與教育經驗，現在匯合在一起創造這款產品，相信會為您帶來很好的體驗！我們的理想是用科技讓普惠教育受益於更多人，現在，我們最重要的事情就是幫助使用者建立開口自信。

評論.內容:
This is the best language app I have ever used! I am learning so much, both Spanish and French. 

The best way to learn a language is to practice with native speakers, and with this app you can practice conversing with the AI tutors any time, who will correct your pronunciation and grammar, as well as providing translations as needed. 

There are so many amazing features in this app, and it is great fun as well as educational. I am glad I subscribed, and look forward to practicing every day!

我學習英文已經很長很長的一段時間，也買過許多軟體甚至去實體教室裡跟著老師學習，但是學習成效非常差..自從接觸TalkMe..我整個口語進步神速，現在面對我的老外老師更快能說出來我想表達的事物….TalkMe裡面有大量的教學…就像有一個真的老師幫妳一步步解開妳的疑惑….但是卻沒有任何學習的壓力..可以問到妳懂為止..我真的很喜歡..非常感謝幕後開發團隊.妳們真的做到學習著會遇到的困難..讓學習更簡單更無壓力！現在我的小孩正在學習韓語，我會推薦她TalkMe!

評論.標題: Great idea, needs better free talk and more suggested lesson plans.
評論.內容:
I can’t save my role play sessions, nor can the AI analyze the whole conversation like it does with my “lesson plan” convos. I paid for the premium version so that I could get access to that type of analysis. Keep in mind I can use ChatGPT to do the same thing, so if I’m paying for a GPT wrapper I want the additional convenience to be worth it. Overall the UI is very nice and I like the main lesson plans. I just want the same summary analysis to be available on the private convos and I want to be able to save these private conversations. Look forward to seeing how this app improves.

Edit: Today I had a convo based on the challenge and was extremely confused because the answers were super complicated and didn’t seem to make sense based on the setup. For example, the AI was asking me if I had advice, yet I was supposed to be a student asking the teacher questions. The AI kept answering in third person saying “the teacher” instead of “I…” Then, I was given two stars instead of three because I didn’t give details on the grading criteria of a hypothetical assignment…when I was the one asking the teacher about the assignment. So because the teacher didn’t explain the grading criteria when I asked, I’m the one who gets a lower score? 

Looks like the prompt needs tuning.

Its role play is free to create any scenarios, and every sentences you speak will be judged by ai and give you better ideas ,up to now this function is better than Elsa speak. But Elsa is improving too , so TalkMe needs to keep up

The best app so far to help cover “output” when learning a language. It’s great to speak to a person but with this there is no need to set up an appointment or be in a relationship. You can speak anytime you want complete with translations and alternative responses. A bit pricey tbh but still a great app.
i wish it had furigana on the top of the kanji characters! it would make it a lot easier.
This software effectively overcame my social fears, allowing me to practice English anytime and anywhere, and improve my speaking skills.
I have greatly improved my spoken English within a year, and now I have the courage to speak English to foreigners. I will continue to use it consistently. Thank you, talkme

Update: 
After some feedback and time, the makers have updated the app to fix some issues quite promptly. I believe eventually this app will have enough kinks fixed to be quite useful.  I’ve seen other developers try to launch AI language robots and fail so let’s hope this one succeeds.  Communicating vocally and fluidly really helps stimulate authentic communicative learning. 

Original:
I thought the idea of it was so good that I paid for a subscription too quickly. Then right when I started using it, the glitches started coming out of all orifices. I’m set at native English speaker learning Japanese, but the translate button on the AI’s sentences translates from Japanese into Japanese, yeah it translates nothing. lol Then I tap on a specific word in the Japanese text and it gives me the definition in Chinese hahahaha No pronunciation in English or romaji, just Chinese. Where did the Chinese come from all of the sudden? Then the feedback for my own sentence doesn’t make sense. It shows incorrect and revised sentences, but they don’t match up with the rationale. The revised example makes a change that isn’t a correction at all, and the rationale explains a mistake that wasn’t demonstrated in the revision. I’ve barely started using it and already the glitches and inconsistencies are every two seconds. Allowing companies to charge money for things that absolutely don’t work at all should be a crime lol. On second thought, it probably already is …. hmmmmmm

Once you get the hang of all of the various tools on this app, there is really no limit to what you can do.  It is updated and expanded very frequently, and very affordable for the full “pro” version (also definitely worth it IMO).  When paired with other editing apps for other more specific things such as face swaps, or certain AI cut/replace tools, it really makes for the perfect finishing touch tool.  Can’t wait for more updates!

Some suggestions; 

on the AI enhance tool, add some sliders to adjust exactly how it is enhancing (background vs faces.. smoothing vs adding details.. whole photo vs specific areas.. etc..) the app Remini used to be my go-to for AI enhancing(upscaling), and has a some good examples of this, but they have kinda ruined the app over the last few years unfortunately.

on AI enhance/outpainting(“expand”) tools.. offer multiple iterations with each result (app called Fotor is a good example, but it has its own limitations)

Add an AI cut and replace tool (similar to Fotor app), where you can highlight an object/area, and give a text prompt for what to put in its place. 

The “reshape” tool is awesome, and underrated IMO.. would love to see more features added in this for more controlled deformation.  If it could somehow distort the image while updating lighting(highlights/shadows) at the same time that would be incredible, tho I know this would be really hard to do accurately in reality haha.

Photoshop Express 提供廣泛且多樣化的精選功能和美感設計，任你隨手使用。建立脫穎而出的相片拼貼影像，修復並增強值得分享的時刻，創造令人驚豔的社交內容。你甚至可以使用自己的 AI 相片生成器，輕鬆按一下即可產生相片創作。使用 Photoshop Express Premium 解鎖無限可能！

== PHOTOSHOP EXPRESS 功能 ==

「AI 相片生成器」
- 建立自訂的吸睛貼圖
- 試穿你使用文字提示創作的服裝或配件

- 從手機相簿中新增多個影片以合併為單一影片

「AI 相片增強工具」
- 選取各種相片編輯工具和預設集
- 套用紅眼修正、相片除霧和美感濾鏡功能

- 只要滑動幾下，即可擦除背景雜訊並讓瑕疵部分變得更平滑
- 只要輕觸一下即可潤飾相片，在短短幾秒內潤飾及修復人像照和自拍照
- 使用立即可用的格線版面，創作精彩的相片拼貼

「個人化影像設計」
- 從各式各樣的字體和版面中選擇，在你的相片中加入文字
- 使用影像編輯軟體為相片加入個人化的潤飾效果
- 使用相機濾鏡、印章、自訂浮水印等效果來創作相片設計

「輕鬆上傳及分享相片」
- 可上傳多種來源格式的影像 (包括 RAW 和 TIFF)
- 使用此相片編輯應用程式編輯要用於社交和 Instagram 的相片
- 分享並匯出到你慣用的所有社交媒體管道，包括 Instagram、TikTok、Snapchat、Facebook、Line和 Telegram ，為其他人帶來靈感

== PREMIUM ==
升級至 Photoshop Express Premium，即可享有額外專屬功能和更精確的編輯控制項。
Photoshop Express 是適合各種經驗程度使用者的相片和影片編輯應用程式。使用 Adobe 的 Photoshop Express 相片編輯應用程式，對相片施展魔法，Photoshop 是 Adobe 引以為傲的系列產品。建立並修正有趣且值得分享的梗圖、個人風格的相片拼貼和貼圖。

評論.標題: Has NOTHING in common with Photoshop
評論.內容:
It keeps asking me to rate, so here I am.

Short version:
Extremely lacking compared to Photoshop; Many, downright essential tools are completely missing, the project and layer management is very obtuse and asinine, and overall the app heavily caters to mobile amateur photographers (think Instagram selfie taker) while neglecting non-standard, non-photography use cases. Overall, I think it is misleading to even have Photoshop in the name, as that implies it shares a connection to Photoshop in any way, which is not the case. 

Long Version:
Obviously compared to desktop Photoshop this app pales. Though, to start on the positive side, they have actually managed to fit a lot of features into this mobile app, especially if you are focused on quick and easy photograph editing. I think this app is meant for the Instagram selfie takers, so i'm already not in their target market. However, it is missing a LOT of very basic features when compared to desktop photoshop. I already hear your thoughts: "Of course it is lacking features compared to desktop photoshop, this is on a mobile phone!" and I understand this point, however, I would consider the features that it lacks to be extremely basic features that pretty much make this worthless for nearly anything that isn't editing Instagram selfies. I will list a few below.

Firstly, HERE ARE NO SELECTIONS AT ALL. No marquee tool, no lasso, nothing. Hidden under "Combine" > "Cutout" is a masking tool. Yes, MASKING tool. You can "Cutout" what the AI detects as objects or "Add" and "Remove". It never explicitly states what you are adding and removing, but I'll tell you, it's a layer mask. It's styled as a selection with the marching ants, but nope, layer mask. That means you can't simply select an area of your image and apply edits to the selection only, you have to duplicate your image and then apply a mask to the part you want "selected". Speaking of application, there is no marquee tool, rectangle tool, lasso tool, or free draw tool under the cutout section, there is only "Smartcut" (magic wand tool) and brush. Smartcut selection actually did pretty well in my use cases, but I don't see a reason why a marquee selection isn't an option. Smartcut already draws a rectangular selection before object detection, but whatever. The brush tool will have to do, assuming weird masking lines isn't an issue for you. I also thought that there was no way to transform your "selection"/layers, of course there's no transforming a selection, but to transform a layer you need to go out of the tool that looks like a selection and into another tool, it won't let you drag or pinch while in "Cutout". However, calling it transform is... optimistic at best, it's more like a 'move and scale' tool. You can only change the scale and position of the layer, oh, and flip it, but that's it. You are locked to the aspect ratio of the original layer, trying to change it only changes the canvas aspect ratio. Now, your natural instinct may be to crop, export, then import the cropped image into your original project, not an option here. Why not? USING CUTOUT DISABLES MOST EDIT OPTIONS. Including most image manipulation and retouching options. As well as crop. Why? Because using the cutout tool converts your project into a "mix" project rather than an "edit" project. Oh, and doing this IS DESTRUCTIVE! It doesn't save a copy before converting to a mix project, and all of your previous edits are baked in with no way of undoing the edits or conversion. In addition, most edits in this "mix" mode are destructive if you leave the editor, with the exception of cutout edits. 

Yes, completely bizarre decisions here by Adobe. I have no idea about the backend of this app so I can't necessarily say that it would be easy or hard to add the "cutout" masking in edit mode, but all project types have full layer control and the Lightroom app does this fairly well, so I can't see why not. 

If your goal is to edit a selfie, instagram beach picture, or something similar, then this app is definitely tailored for you! However, if you are expecting, or even hoping that this app is even 1% as capable as Photoshop desktop, then you will be severely disappointed. They should not have even kept the Photoshop name as it is completely misleading, this is a completely separate image retoucher and has nothing to do with "Photoshop", save for the option to send to Photoshop, which never worked for me.

Even something as simple as cutting out the middle of a screenshot was overly encumbered in Photoshop Express. I opened the app because I had a screenshot of a text message and wanted to blank and cut a portion of it out, but from the middle. Apple Photos proved difficult to even blank a portion of the image out, yet impossible to cut the middle out. With my only other option being importing the photo to my desktop for a very simple, quick, 2 minute edit, I decided to try this app for the first time. Even finding cutout was hard since all of the retouching features come up first, and I was looking for a selection tool. Anyways, you get into cutout and then you need to manually draw the area you want to cut out. Then, duplicate the image, use the brush to mask top part of the image that you want to move down, click out of the tool and drag the layer down. Oh, and if I forgot to mention it earlier, there's literally NO SNAPPING. None. Anyways, you can't crop at this point because that would give you the finished image and be too easy. Now you need to export the (uncropped) image, just import the exported image back into Express so you can get into edit mode and access the cropping tool. Why isn't there a cropping tool in mix mode? Or better yet, why can't I just rasterize and convert the project from mix to edit mode when you can the other way around? Many of the methods to do things in this app are just very asinine and don’t make sense.

As compared to a desktop version of Photoshop it’s a streamlined version. I would love for it to add more text features such as shadow and definitely more fonts.Still having worked with thePhotoshop program for more than a decade this is a good tablet edition for artists. Oh and add Background erase!
There is no reason this app should eat space the way it does when it is running.

Adobe had photoshop fix for 10 years that you paid a single price and your had it for life. It was ten times better then express which is clunky and downright aggravating to use compared to photoshop fix. They removed all users from fix to then make them pay a monthly fee for express which was also something you had for life for 10$.  They betrayed their customers and this app is trash.

Very good app! I know it’s probably impossible to put all the features of Photoshop in a phone app but this is pretty close, in my opinion, and I’ve been using Photoshop since version 6. Love this app!!!

The collection of mobile Photoshop apps used to be great. I used Photoshop Mix and Photoshop Fix all the time. They were free, but also not as powerful as the original Photoshop, so it balanced out well. Now they’ve discontinued those other two and lumped a few of their features into Express. Express was clearly not made for those features, it was made for edits like text and filters on images. They just don’t quite fit. Express is also much less capable than Fix and Mix. For example, I have not found a way to change the canvas size on Express, but it was quite easy to do that in the other ones. To make it even worse, so many feature are now payed “Premium” features, including basic things like cloning! It’s just pure greed.
My photos look just as ugly. You can’t fully cover impactions. This has better be fixed because I hate seeing imperfections in my photos . The whole point is to get rid of imperfections.
Most features you’d like to use are in a $10 a month (at least) payment.
Paying $9 a month for lack of tools is ridiculous

評論.標題: BRING BACK MIX, This is greed driven garbage
評論.內容: I was inspired to write a review as this is the most obvious example of devolution and worsening a product to extort money. Photoshop Mix was an incredible app that worked for years as the most user friendly, efficient, responsive application that did NOT charge a subscription fee for most basic functions. Using Mix is now impossible because of the greed of adobe. Express is a slow, unresponsive, less user friendly mess of an app that corrals you to the most narrow functions of photo editing without a PAID SUBSCRIPTION. Talk about a middle finger to the user base- if you don’t want to use their bloated, slow, paid app with AI tools no one wants or asked for, too bad! They got rid of your other option that worked, so no you don’t have a choice. Bring back mix, this app is an abomination and an insult.

If I could write this app zero stars I would. This app is a scam. There is no way to contact customer support. Despite paying for premium service, I am unable to use any premium features. I cannot get my money back, and I hope this review serves to keep others from losing their money. This app was excellent two years ago. It is absolutely useless now.
Great app. Just Trying to unsubscribe to app but theirs is no unsubscribe button nor is there a place in the app to chat or any number to call
When I’m away from my computer, this is my main tool!!!
Whenever I load into the app it just keeps loading and I can’t even use it super useless. Now I don’t know if this is only me but please fix it.
So I bought the full version for 1 year but the app is very sluggish on my NEW iPad I have to close the app and reopen it every time I try a filter apps with this issue should be free

I use photoshop almost everyday for my needs my major complaint is fonts I’ve downloaded not syncing when saving photos. It’s a hit or a miss I can never trouble shoot what the problem is sometimes they load and sometimes they don’t. What really upsets me is when photoshop will kick me out of the app only for all of my progress to be removed or it will save with the font removed.
It’s amazing!
So much fun

評論.標題: Glad to have been an unpaid tester
評論.內容: I used to love this app, used with mix and fix was a nice limited functionality set of apps. But as most apps do they killed them, merged them and now want a subscription to use.
Does a decent job editing and is a lot of fun to play with

We can’t open/add a photo without agreeing to a “free” trial. I was surprised by this. Usually an app, like ANY app, will allow people to explore at least a few basic options. Welp, not Adobe, apparently. They must be struggling to keep the lights on over there. Or something.
Even though you pay the premium price, they still put a limit on it. After you’re out of credits you can’t use it again till a month later.

評論.標題: Need to get the basics down
評論.內容: Video editing is constantly closing - I have new issues almost every time I use this for video edits. These seem like basics.

Love love love the app. And I do realize this is the newest drop of features. But the Auto background selection and then the AI generated backgrounds need improvement on a major level. Specifically when I use an AI background it messes with the original image itself/the original subject.

Worst background removal  - poorly developed low level image / edge detection. I had a black garment on a white background! And I had already on desktop PSD made adjustments to make background editing easy by  increasing contrast bw garment and background , removed any midtones so it’s easy  on iPhone app. Despite these factors it selected  around the edges inside the garment  all over , then there were tiny pixels in areas inside the garment which are faded / not visible unless you zoom in extreme up close . I ended up spending over 1 hr to refine selection and several times the app got stuck and didn’t even save the updated background selection. The AI generator provides no relevant backgrounds despite entering  photoshop background fill options . Even the stamp tool is horrible ! After you select source it will sample from that area for one or two click then sample from some random part and the source picker doesn’t even move so you don’t get to know when it starts to change until it messes up ! Basically the selection source stays in the same location and pick up sample from random places .

Will this make the interrupting pop-ups stop in the app if I rate & review it? I certainly hope so, as they get in the way of my use of the app on a regular basis. Otherwise, the app is good, I guess.

評論.標題: There are better apps not user friendly
評論.內容: I can’t shrink or rotate an image for the life of me, I’m trying to edit some text boxes and I’ve been here for 40 minutes just trying to rotate and resize four words. The interface is unresponsive and they could just have a slide bar for the size but no I have to hold down on a little circle for 20 minutes trying to get it to shrink and not just move around. I’ve had other photoshop apps in the past that were much better but got taken down do to them not making profit.
I would recommend this app to anyone. I love it.
Since they made the ability to cut out images a paid thing the app is completely useless to me lol I’ll be on ibis

應用名稱: SnapEdit - AI 移除物件
應用描述:
SnapEdit 是 AI 最佳影像編輯應用程式之一，其使命是讓您的編輯變得輕鬆、流暢和有趣。

使用 SnapEdit讓您的照片編輯帶來前所未有的體驗。這款終極影像編輯應用程式讓您輕鬆刪除不需要的物件、提高影像品質並創建令人驚嘆的視覺傑作。 立即下載 SnapEdit，為您的影像開啟無限可能的世界！

主要功能：

一鍵式物件移除：告別圖片中的模糊區域、不需要的元素或分散注意力的物件。 只需輕輕輕一按，SnapEdit 即可智慧分析您的照片並無縫刪除任何不需要的元素，留下乾淨、精美的影像。

超級擦除（需要專業版）：專門模型設計於消除較大的干擾。 讓它們瞬間消失，只留下時尚、乾淨、不受干擾的照片。

影像增強：使用 SnapEdit 影像增強工具提高您的照片品質。 調整亮度、對比度、飽和度等，以顯示隱藏的細節，讓您的影像真正迷人。 增強色彩、銳利化邊緣並輕鬆打造專業效果。

天空替換：陰沉的天氣不是你想要的嗎？ 使用我們的天空替換充分展現您照片的最美。 用全新的天空替換照片中的灰色、陰沉的天空。 選擇晴朗的藍天、晴天、日落、暴風雨，甚至幻想的天空。

视频增强器：随意记录您的回忆，无需担心视频模糊或低质量，SnapEdit 将是您正在寻找的在几秒钟内增强视频的解决方案。

輕鬆移除背景：需要更改照片的背景嗎？ 沒問題！ SnapEdit 提供無縫背景移除功能，讓您能夠以令人難以置信的精準度隔離主要主體。 將背景替換為純色、自訂圖像或透明背景，以獲得無限的創意可能性。

藝術濾鏡和動漫效果：透過各種濾鏡和效果釋放您的藝術才華。 只需輕輕一按即可將您的照片變成令人驚嘆的藝術作品。 從復古到現代，從黑白到鮮豔的色彩，SnapEdit 提供了大量選項來滿足您的獨特風格。

簡易使用：SnapEdit 的使用者友善介面確保為初學者和專業人士提供無縫的編輯體驗。 輕鬆瀏覽應用程式的功能、應用程式編輯並立即預覽變更。 直覺的設計使編輯照片變得輕而易舉。

輕鬆保存和分享：對自己的傑作感到滿意後，即可將編輯後的高解析度照片儲存到裝置的圖庫中。 直接從應用程式將您的創作分享到 Instagram、Facebook 等社交媒體平台，並用您令人驚嘆的圖像給您的朋友和追蹤者留下深刻的印象。

高品質結果：SnapEdit 使用尖端演算法提供高品質結果，而不影響細節或解析度。 您編輯後的照片將保持其清晰度和解析度，確保每個細節都閃閃發光。

輕鬆儲存與分享：一旦您對自己的傑作感到滿意後，即可將編輯後的高解析度照片儲存到設備裝置的圖庫中。 直接從應用程式將您的創作分享到 Instagram、Facebook 等社交媒體平台，並用您令人驚嘆的圖像給您的朋友和追蹤者留下深刻的印象。

使用 SnapEdit 釋放照片的真正潛力。 立即下載並體驗一鍵式物件刪除、影像增強、背景移除和一系列藝術濾鏡的強大功能。 創造令人著迷的視覺效果，給人留下持久的印象並展示您獨特的審美觀。 立即取得 SnapEdit，像影像專業人士一樣改造您的照片！

使用條款：https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

評論.標題: Used to Be Good, But They Broke It
評論.內容: I paid for a year subscription a few months back because I really liked their photo enhancer. You get three “results” to choose from and get to pick the one that looks the best. A recent update (within the last week or two) broke the enhancement results. “Result 1” usually tried to keep the image as close to the original, but typically always looked horrible for old photos (and still does), so I really relied in the past on “Result 2” or “Result 3.”  In the past, “Result 2” was the most complementary to enhancing faces with nice straight teeth, smooth but realistic skin, symmetrical eyes, etc., and “Result 3” was still good, but more likely to make people look older.  NOW, “Result 2” is pretty much complete GARBAGE (basically just changes the shading of “Result 1” and gives people gunk in between their teeth…I’m not kidding - it makes people smiling look like they haven’t brushed their teeth in years) and “Result 3” is really the only truly AI enhanced image.  Ugh, I regret buying this app. If you fix it back to the way it used to work a couple weeks ago, I’ll update this review.  BOTTOM LINE:  PLEASE FIX “RESULT 2” IN THE PHOTO ENHANCER TO BE LIKE IT USED TO BE FOR ALL THE MONTHS I USED IT PRIOR TO WHATEVER YOU DID TO BREAK IT RECENTLY.  I’M SO TIRED OF PAYING GOOD MONEY AND ENDING UP WITH SOMETHING I WOULD HAVE NEVER BOUGHT TO BEGIN WITH.

評論.標題: Frustrating Billing Issue and Unclear Subscription System
評論.內容:
I’ve been a loyal user of Meitu for years now, but I’m extremely disappointed with the recent experience I’ve had. I’ve always been logged into my Meitu account, but in January 2025, I was logged out without my knowledge. When I opened the app again, I was hit with a prompt saying I needed to subscribe to use features I already had access to. Without realizing it, I accidentally ended up subscribing again, resulting in me having two active subscriptions.

The second subscription, which I did not intend to sign up for, is now marked as “Not eligible for refund” despite the fact that it was an accidental charge due to the system logging me out. Apple support chat was also unable to help me. I’ve always been a paying customer, and this situation feels like a technical glitch that is being unfairly penalized. It’s incredibly frustrating to be out the equivalent of seven months of subscription fees for something I wasn’t aware I had to be vigilant of. 

Please improve your login system and refund policy to prevent this from happening to other users. It’s hard to feel loyal to an app that causes this kind of unnecessary hassle.

應用名稱: Notion: 筆記、任務、AI
應用描述:
寫作、計劃、整理，由 AI 助一臂之力。筆記、文件、任務和專案 — 全部集於一處。

「AI 全能應用程式」— 富比世

個人可免費使用
• 建立任意數量的筆記、文件和內容。
• 數千個範本可供使用，容易上手。

歡迎你的團隊免費使用
• 不論是下一代新創公司還是老牌企業，每天有數百萬使用者使用 Notion。
• 可以立即從 Google 文件、PDF 等匯入你的內容來開始。
• 將 Figma、Slack 和 GitHub 等工具連接到 Notion。

筆記和文件
• 使用圖片、待辦事項和 50 多種內容類型，創作出美觀的文件。
• 使用具有強大篩選功能的快速尋找，在整個工作空間中準確地查找需要的內容。

任務和專案
• 選擇想追蹤的具體資訊。建立自己的優先標記、狀態標籤和自動化項目等，以打造完美的工作流程。
• 透過表格一覽所有細節。將專案拆解成易於管理的部分來完成工作。

AI
• 文采出眾。使用 Notion AI 來幫助寫作和腦力激盪。
• 獲取答案。詢問 Notion AI 有關你所有內容的問題，並在幾秒鐘內獲取答案。
• 自動填寫表格。Notion AI 將大量資料轉換為清晰、可採取行動的資訊 — 皆能自動完成。

與瀏覽器、MAC 和 WINDOWS 應用程式進行同步。
• 在行動裝置裡接續完成桌面上未完成的工作。

用更少的工具，實現更高的生產力。
• 在已連接的工作空間中追蹤待辦事項、撰寫筆記、建立文件並管理專案。

評論.標題: I was a very early adopter in the first few thousand - sry I waited so long to review…
評論.內容:
Years ago I tried to make this myself trying to get away from Evernote - searched around for open source projects to modify - found Notion in my search and switched to Notion 

My note sub pages went so deep - I’m talking Schizo mode deep - to the point of hundreds of nested subpages inside of 1 subject note - engineering projects - lots of web clipped articles - scientific papers - PDFs - YouTube transcripts - highlighted - hoarding data - HOARDING data - knowing that one day years into the future the AI would arrive and compute everything hyper customized to the collected dataset organized under categories - subpages and subpages under more categories and sub categories and side thoughts etc 

(Fast forward years later to today and the notion AI can now reference everything and all my notes and ask a question from all previous conscious versions of me - referencing previous thought chains long forgotten - it’s amazing - it is my brain indexed )  

The ability to link to notes and subnotes is extremely useful - I got easily lost in the stacks trying to context switch on different projects - to the point I made a support request years ago - where I actually had a live chat with someone real who actually listened to my feature request and submitted it to the team 

I requested to add a breadcrumb trail of atleast 10-15 recently opened notes -  and to my surprise a few months later - they actually implemented it on the iOS app!! You are absolutely awesome for that - best customer support experience - (plz do it on web version as well I will be eternally grateful ) 

Another idea -> if I could have a mind map like obsidian notes except better and it works as a notion mind map for all my subpages - If I could open one note project page and have a mind map displaying all the correlated concepts that could be tagged / color coded 

I could organize and see the hundreds of stacks in some kind of infinite canvas mind map which helps see everything in a way which helps connect the dots via all the tags with different colors on different notes - even a search feature embedded on the mind map that focuses on the correlated thought chains / tagged blocks 

 - If you implemented this I would be eternally grateful 🙏

Thank you - I love your whole team 🚀

I have problems when using the search option. When I search for a specific word I know is written somewhere I don’t get any results. Also could you please provide a search for word option in the document itself instead of having to search through alll the documents?

from being depressed struggling my adhd and ability to accomplish goals, notion my my personal growth so easy and fun. this will be my 3rd year using it and i use it everyday to manage my life, thoughts, and projects.

I made the mistake of subscribing to Notion plus on iOS. However, notion AI (more than one message) is not included and must be added separately, which I’m actually ok with, but it’s unable to be added on iOS. When I tried to add this on the website, it says I can’t add it because I subscribed via the app. 

When you google this issue, you will find that people have complained about this with no resolution for over 18 months. 

The current workaround is canceling the iOS subscription, waiting for the month or year to expire (or some sketchy refund tactics), and then subscribing online. I don’t understand what decision makers decided that is acceptable. I can only assume incompetence since it’s literally counterproductive to the profitability, but that incompetence makes me apprehensive to use the platform, as my data in Notion is proprietary, so if the poor execution is systemic, it could be potentially harmful.

應用名稱: 美顏相機-復古拍照&照片影片編輯
應用描述:
美顏相機 BeautyCam，拍出最美的你
| 超多種相機機款，拍出高清單眼與復古膠片氛圍
| AI智能偵測，自動修飾臉型身形
| AI創意玩法，讓你的照片與影片更加生動

=== 相機模式 ===
· iPhone模式: 拍出韓系清透肌，自然呈現無修容感
· 復古膠片機: 復古機款隨你挑，拍出CCD感氛圍大片
· 單眼相機: 變焦、景深、白平衡等功能，熱門相機款式等你來探索
· 拍貼機: 多款韓系、日系拍貼款式，隨時隨地都能拍貼
· 氛圍補光燈: 暗處自拍神救援，超多色系可任選

=== 圖片精修 ===
· 畫質修復: 高清畫質還原美貌，模糊廢片不再有
· 智慧去背: 消除畫面邊界感，完美去除背景
· 濾鏡: 替照片增添不同色彩，記錄你的專屬時刻
· 光線矯正: 解決逆光、過曝等光線問題，輕鬆還原美照
· 美髮: 一鍵切換多變造型，輕鬆換髮型髮色

=== AI 功能 ===
· AI 形象照:各種寫真應有盡有，在家也能擁有專業棚拍效果
· AI 換表情:尷尬人救星，幫你修正照片表情
· AI 消除 :雜物消失術，成為照片裡的唯一主角
· AI 擴圖: 智能延伸照片畫面，完美匹配多種尺寸比例
· AI 影片特效: 變裝、長頭髮等，一張照片即可做出酷炫影片

=== 人像美容===
· 一鍵減肥: 瘦臉、塑身，瞬間顯瘦不失真
· 一鍵美顏: 濃顏淡顏皆適用，精緻、減齡妝容一鍵擁有
· 遮瑕筆:不可或缺的完美神器，打造無瑕感肌膚
· 智慧去皺:撫平肌膚紋理，瞬間顯嫩好氣色
· 去雙下巴: 輕鬆去除雙下巴，展現完美下顎線
· 風格妝容: 各國流行趨勢妝容一鍵套用

=== 影片功能 ===
· 讀稿機: 最佳拍片助理，輕鬆讀稿不忘詞
· 影片人像美容：智能修飾身型五官，動態影片也能呈現完美自己

評論.標題: Don’t waste your money. It’s not worth it!
評論.內容: i bought a one time purchase for one year of vip membership. the only reason i bought it was for the ai animate feature. and now all of a sudden i have to pay again every time to use it. at first i thought the payment undid itself so i looked for a restore button (this app for some reason doesn’t have a restore button which is a red flag). but it turns out that my payment did go through, but even if you have a vip membership you still have to pay to use this feature, mind you it informed me of this only after i bought the membership. the fact that you still have to pay for certain things even if you have a vip subscription is stupid and pathetic. it’s a disgusting and greedy cash grab that tricks you into it. i bought the subscription with the assumption that i would be able to use the ai animation feature freely as when i clicked to upload video it took me to that payment screen, so i bought it. this app does not inform its members that there is a “free limit” that you have after paying. nor does it inform you that you then have to pay 1.99 each time you want to animate a clip. don’t spend your money on this app, it’s a greedy company who has about three other apps exactly the same as this one to squeeze as much money out of you as possible. the fact that you have to pay for a free limit is telling enough. it’s a scam

應用名稱: PicCollage 拼貼趣
應用描述:
『 Pic Collage 拼貼趣 』
台灣團隊開發設計，最在乎使用者體驗的超人氣拼貼神器，目前全球已突破兩億次的下載量，用戶遍佈世界各地。趕快點擊下載，使用過我們直覺又美感滿分的設計，保證以後製圖再也離不開！

FEATURES
+ 最齊全的原創素材庫：文青、可愛、美式、節日風格的貼圖背景樣樣不缺
+ 動態拼貼 : 添加小短片，讓創作更活潑有趣

+ 社群連結 : 可選用自拍相簿、Facebook、Instagram照片組圖，還有Story限時動態專用全螢幕拼貼尺寸，一鍵分享至ig、fb、WhatsApp當個時尚網紅

+ 拼貼趣VIP訂閱會員制
 訂閱VIP訂閱會員的用戶將能開通專屬功能並且移除廣告及浮水印。我們現在更提供七天 VIP 免費試用方案，讓你能無壓力的體驗 PicCollage 的魅力！

VIP 專屬功能
－解鎖數千個精緻的貼圖跟背景
－VIP獨家精選字型跟主題模板
－移除浮水印跟廣告的優質體驗

應用名稱: 名片全能王-名片掃描識別管理
應用描述:
加入全球超多用戶信任的CamCard，輕鬆創建數位名片，高效掃描紙質名片。

主要功能：
【可自訂模板】
個性化設計您的數位名片，添加頭像、企業標誌，並選擇精美設計模板。

【多樣化分享方式】
通過個性化簡訊、電子郵件或專屬URL分享名片。利用二維碼功能，實現輕鬆、即時分享。

【電子郵件簽名與虛擬背景】
創建專業的電子郵件簽名，與您的數位名片連結，設計展示品牌形象的虛擬背景。

【名片掃描】
依托CamCard的先進掃描技術，精準讀取名片，配合專業人工校對，確保更高準確性。

【名片管理】
使用備註和標籤整理聯絡人，並將其同步至您的CRM系統。

【資料安全】
CamCard通過ISO/IEC 27001認證，保障頂級資料保護與隱私合規。

升級至CamCard Premium，享受更多專屬功能：

無限次名片掃描
匯出名片為Excel/Vcf格式
與Salesforce及其他CRM同步
無廣告體驗
秘書掃描模式，用於委託名片掃描
人工校對

高級訂閱價格：
每月$9.99
每年$49.99

訂閱詳情：
1. 確認購買時，將從您的iTunes帳戶扣費。
2. 訂閱在當前週期結束前24小時內自動續訂，除非您取消。
3. 購買後，可在iTunes帳戶設定中管理訂閱並關閉自動續訂。

提升您的社交網絡，立即下載CamCard，輕鬆建立人脈！

隱私政策請訪問：https://static-cdn-p.camcard.com/policy/camcard_iOS/privacy_en-us.html
服務條款請訪問：https://static-cdn-p.camcard.com/policy/camcard_iOS/service_en-us.html

識別語言：
繁體中文、簡體中文、丹麥語、荷蘭語、芬蘭語、韓語、挪威語、日語、英語、法語、德語、西班牙語、葡萄牙語、匈牙利語、義大利語、瑞典語。

聯絡我們： isupport@intsig.com
關注我們： Facebook | X (Twitter) | Google+: CamCard

I would love to rate this a lot higher.  What they call AI is far from
Intelligent when transposing from the card to the file.  Seriously, just buy someone’s OCR engine and incorporate it to this and it
Would be better at the conversions.    Otherwise the app works as a central repository for the pictures of the card.
They made changes to the app that rendered all the stored cards unreadable.
The app works quite well, until you want to bulk export your data. The only way to do this is to pay for a premium plan.  You should not have to pay to get your own data.
This is a joke. It can’t do anything special and there isn’t a free trial. Total scam. Get a free one please.

If you are lucky, this app will get 50% of the info correct. I gave it a month to see if the kinks would work out, but no go. I canceled my subscription, but of course you don’t get your money back! Don’t waste your $50

Not user friendly

I have used CamCard for years and never had an issue until I upgraded to iPhone 16 pro.  The camera will not focus on the card when at the recommended distance.  All I get now are blurry scans.   Hopefully someone will see this and do an update to correct the issue. Otherwise the app is 5 stars.
When I first got this app I was pleased. Did everything I wanted it to. No worth the $50 to me. Sorry. Deleted
A yearly subscription just to scan business cards? Insane. These business card apps are all a rip off.

I downloaded CamCard app and signed up for a free 3-day trial followed by $50 annually.  I have about 100 business cards I need to record and sync with my Apple IOS contacts.  I took photos of 5 business cards as a start. CamCard made serious mistakes on all 5 of them. I ended up spending a few minutes editing each card, which is not a significant time saver over typing the day myself to my Apple contacts app.  I deleted the app after using it for 20 minutes.  This is a long way from being a timesaver.

Been using this app for years, but it’s been ruined by the incessant requests to pay more money for pro.  Interestingly the text recognition hasn’t improved at all over the last 3-5 years.

I genuinely don’t like the way the technology has to be linked to your apple card. When using this for company purposes, you don’t get the option so charging this to the company card. I don’t think it’s appropriate to have to connect your company card to your account to do this. It has charged my personal account and I’m not happy with this.

I thought I had a lot of nem cards, but one day they went to a paid version and my collected name cards were stolen like hostages.

I canceled my subscription after one hour, but, there is no mechanism to get back the money that you have paid. I have now paid for a full year for something that I am not using.

There is an easy solution that doesn’t scam your customers on the first payment. Hyperlink Apple subs or show a dialog with this info instead of waiting for a support ticket response. It makes me wonder if that little delay is just enough to squeeze the 24 hour window for cancellation and charge cards at least once. Needless to say I’m not about to upgrade to premium if you kill my entire backlog of data. How am I supposed to get this back? Doesn’t leave me with a warm and fuzzy feeling.

評論.標題: Very useful app, one major problem
評論.內容: I find this a useful app, but the only problem, and in my case, a major problem, is the app Does not automatically rotate with the iPad.  I use the app on travel, scan the cards, etc., but I have to edit in the browser, and not the native app, so I can rotate the screen to work with my Bluetooth keyboard.

Don’t get me wrong as an app developer. I truly like to support app developers but I’ve been using this app for years now and as soon as I downloaded it on my iPhone and andriod, I got drastic limitations as to where I cannot even any longer scan business cards without buying a monthly membership or yearly membership. I've bought this app twice before I will not be buying it again. So I guess I’ll just be taking photos of business cards and saving them in my photo files.

Love the app that it is easy to use and adds into my contact list. Also, really like being able to add notes. The negative is that there frequently needs to be tweaking because the fields don't match well with the cards.

Updated the application and it asked me to create s login to SAVE my cards. Now they are all gone. 
This is a bad issue when the goal is saving that information.

評論.內容:
I bought this App years ago as the free version.  I loved it so much that I bought the paid version, which allowed me to add many more cards!  
Then recently, I tried to add a new card and when I tried to save it, the App wouldn't let me unless I bought one of the subscriptions!!  I don't need the features of the subscriptions... I just want to scan and save the cards into the App on my phone.  
What happened????

評論.標題: Couldn’t edit business card category mistakes
評論.內容:

This shouldn’t be a problem to fix, I thought, and so when it showed the initial assignments, I thought I could just edit them. Lo, although it showed the hover “insert” cursor over the text input fields, I couldn’t actually click in the letters to edit them.

Odd, I think. Maybe I need to restart my phone or maybe there’s an incompatibility with the latest iOS revision, or …?

I just bought and there is no way to pull up a keyboard/access keyboard to edit the info for my own card in the app. It could t capture the correct info on my card. I can’t send this issue to them because… no keyboard
When I input biz card info it writes it in jibberish. Unrecognizable characters so this app is unusable.

I’ve been using this app for years. It has been extremely useful. But all of a sudden I’m not allowed to add more entries unless I pay because I have more than 100 cards loaded.  I actually have 167 and never had an issue. Those were not the rules when I signed up.

評論.標題: Good App but VERY HARD to cancel subscription
評論.內容: I bought this when business cards rule, but now everything is digital. The few business cards I receive now are easy to enter. I’ve tried to cancel my subscription, but there is no cancel option in iCloud or elsewhere. Evil!

Had to edit almost every card I ordered. OCR constantly mistook t for i. Really struggled with colored cards. Unless you only want to scan basic white business cards, don’t bother.  Asking for my money back!
Disappointing ap. Requires a lot of editing to be useful.  Does not save me time.  Cancellation is difficult too.

I’ve been using this app for several years only to discover today that they are now requiring $46.00 dollars a year.  If you choose to use this app understand the developers have no problem changing their price.
Long time user with a significant investment of business cards inside the app, and now they won’t allow me to add additional cards without paying $48 a year.

評論.標題: Why is cancelling this account so difficult ???
評論.內容: It should not be this difficult to cancel an account

Great card scanner.  It’s not perfect but the majority of the cards are scanned perfectly.  I still proof each one before saving but overall I’m very happy.  Just be sure to review their renewal/subscription fine print.

I’ve used this over the years to get random people into my contacts fairly quickly. It’s 80-90% accurate and saves a few minutes of manual labor. However, today I apparently reached 100 total business cards of scanning over the past 6 years or so, and now it will cost me $47.00 per year to continue using it. Sorry, good program, but for that rate I’ll spend a few minutes a month manually entering data. Too bad no “consumer” version of this with a purchase (not subscription) price of ten bucks or so, they could limit it to 15 cards a month and I’d be fine with this. Apparently they are also data mining, which is concerning but so typical. 

It is about 10 percent inaccurate, which is pretty good in my estimation considering all the different typefaces, lighting concerns, etc. One bummer is it requires you to use their camera app and it’s automatic- meaning they trigger the photo, not you. I’d rather import, including batch from my photo album, so I can be sure it’s not a blurry photo. At least give me control over the trigger!

So it seems 100 total cards per lifetime is the maximum limit of before  the $47.00 per year subscription is required. I’m just an average fool on a limited income without an expense account, so I’ll be deleting this and back to manually entering doctor details straight into my contacts. It’s a shame there’s no “stripped down” version for regular people using their technology but I understand the restraints of capitalism and needing “scarcity” to survive.
The scanner fails to accurately scan my cards almost 100% of the time.  “Ain’t nobody got time for that”!  Waste of money and time I’ll never get back.

The app stoped syncing to mac outlook 365 some time back. Despite paying for the app, it is impossible to get help or speak to someone.

My recommendation is to look for a better app, since even the OCR text recognition always requires manual corrections.

What a waste of my time downloading and installing this app. Everyone on the Internet recommends it and it seems to have a very high rating. But this is why I give it a one star.

Do you have to take a photo of the card with your camera app. This is not built into the cc app why is this not already built into the app?

I scanned one card and it picked up nothing on the card. And they want me to pay $50 a year for this?

I’ve been a paid Camcard user for nearly ten years. They changed to a subscription format which I chose not to participate. I later added Camcard for Salesforce which is a subscription service. I moved my business to a different CRM but forgot about the subscription. I’ve contacted Camcard 5 times through their support and email channels to attempt to move my Salesforce subscription to the premier. I have had zero response from them regarding this. I have received 3 marketing emails which is frustrating.  Good product, but just don’t rely on their service.

I’m glad I don’t pay for this app. Every time I try to make alterations to a scanned image, it seems to refuse to save it! If I try to start over, I lose all the information (that I usually need to input manually anyway because of all the cards that use unusual fonts). Thankfully I don’t have hundreds of cards that I need to save, otherwise this would drive me bonkers, or drive me to find a different app to use.

應用名稱: Quizlet：使用單詞卡學習
應用描述:
Quizlet是學習、練習和成為你所學項目的專家最輕鬆的方法。你可以建立單詞卡，或從其他師生建立的五億多個學習集中找一些來學習。有了我們源自科學的學習工具組，你可以牢記字彙、熟習課程中的關鍵概念、在考試之日來臨前練習考題。我們有一座寶庫可供你探索熱門科目的學習材料，像是語言學習、醫學、法律、數學、社會科學等等。

有了Quizlet應用程式，教師與學生可以：
製作單詞卡學習集
學習由其他師生或建立的單詞卡
將單詞卡分類，以便快速複習和練習回想
將單詞卡作為形成性評估工具或互動式課堂遊戲
進行練習測試，為考試之日做準備 
利用學習模式的間隔性重複和智能評分來學習
與你的朋友、同學分享單詞卡
學習來自歷屆試卷的問題
向詳細、逐步漸進的教科書解答學習

Quizlet是最有助於學習的單詞卡應用程式。無論是自行建立或選用現有的單詞卡，都能輕鬆完成。立即下載應用程式，加入利用Quizlet掌握課程的六千多萬名學生吧。升級至Quizlet Plus即可利用教科書解答、零廣告、離線存取進行學習，還有多種高級功能會幫助你更聰明地學習。

看看給我們五顆星的學生留下什麼評價：

「史上最棒的學習應用程式！！」
「當我需要認真學習，這是我唯一會用的應用程式。」
「Quizlet是我所下載過最棒的學習應用程式。它有好幾種方式能為即將到來的考試溫習！」

Quizlet Plus訂閱會向你的iTunes帳號收取費用。你的月度或年度訂閱會自動續訂，除非在效期屆滿至少24小時前取消。購買後可到你的帳戶設定中管理訂閱。 

服務條款：https://quizlet.com/tos
隱私政策：https://quizlet.com/privacy

評論.內容: When I was trying to do the flash cards it was showing the answer and not the question first.

I created a deck for learning Japanese. This deck has hundreds of words in it. I’m trying to search for a word to see if it’s already in the deck. To my surprise there is no search button. 

When you’re outside of a deck, like at the main screen. There’s a search button BUT when you type in the word you’re looking for it brings up random decks.

Now let’s say I find the card I’m looking for. It’s in a deck called “All Words” I want to copy the card and paste it into a deck called “New Words”. There is no way to do that.

Let’s say I accidentally created a duplicate card in the same deck. There’s no way to know unless you come across it.

Overall I like this app. It has a good UI but for a paid subscription I do expect for them to add these basic features.

評論.內容:
Part of my assignments require me to use this app, so I downloaded it. It worked alright the first day, nothing outstanding, just OK.
Unfortunately, now the app just KEEPS ON CRASHING.
When I open the app, it works until I open ‘sets’  or ‘library’ Then it freezes for a few seconds before crashing.

This is incredibly irritating, especially as the only reason I downloaded this app is the feature that DOESN’T WORK. (However, ironically enough, the ‘upgrade to Quizlet plus’ button works perfectly fine, and I still get ads)

I have tried the normal fixes: Updating(both the app and my device) Resetting everything, better Wi-Fi, ( the Wi-Fi in our house only works in some rooms ) and it still crashes.
Slow. Buggy. Impossible to study on without premium. Get any other app and it would work better.

評論.內容: I used to love Quizlet, to be honest it is practical for reviewing after actually studying for a test, quiz etc. It’s not beneficial enough for me to pay premium so I can just learn on all the terms I wrote! Thanks for raising my blood pressure Quizlet.

I think Quizlet is a wonderful app for people to study for tests/quizzes and they have fun while doing it, in my opinion. I use this myself for my tests/quizzes and it helps me so much, that is one reason I am a straight A student. 
	The thing is that is sometimes corrects you for spelling something slightly wrong, like adding an s at the end of the word. It’s not that bad though because it helps me to spell something so I can learn and that’s great for spelling tests. Also, you can only do that test once, unless you get Quizlet Plus, which is a little thing you have to pay for. It lets you do that same test as many times as you want. If you don’t have Quizlet Plus, you can either find a new test from someone else or if you think you’ve had enough, you can stop.
	I highly recommend this app for students, teachers, and parents of students so you, your student, or child can have excellent grades. It helps with your studies and you can make your own Quizlet as well. It is 100% safe for kids and it has no adds.

應用名稱: Whoscall 反詐騙騷擾來電辨識
應用描述:
Whoscall 全球下載量已突破 1 億，擁有全球各地超過 26 億筆電話號碼資料庫，具備通話與簡訊功能，是一款深受用戶信賴的通訊 APP，讓您輕鬆擁有安全的通訊生活。

◆台灣警政署 165 反詐騙專線認證及官方合作
◆亞洲知名科技媒體 TechinAsia 讚許為十大台灣創新 APP！
◆2015 獲選為 App Store 最佳應用程式

【主要功能特色】
◆辨識陌生來電：來電顯示對方資訊，來電方是誰，一目瞭然。
◆查詢電話號碼：未接來電不再神秘，回撥電話前先查詢號碼。
◆連結風險檢查：不誤點釣魚網站，一鍵確認連結風險程度。
NEW! ◆詐騙訊息檢查：是不是詐騙，用 Whoscall AI 幫你！只要截圖、上傳，輕鬆識破是不是詐騙！
NEW! ◆自動網站檢查：誤入詐騙網站？Whoscall 自動秒示警！
◆個資外洩偵測：等到身份被盜用才檢查就來不及了，只要電話號碼或email電子郵件，就能檢查個資是否外洩，守護你的個資安全！
◆封鎖騷擾電話：客製個人封鎖名冊，手動封鎖特定電話號碼。
◆WhatsApp來電辨識：秒識別WhatsApp陌生來電，不再猶豫接不接。
◆Whoscall 認證號碼：來電顯示綠勾勾認證標章，讓電話號碼更值得信任。

【 Whoscall 進階版】 
4 大功能強化通訊防護力，不僅電話，簡訊也替您把關！
◆自動封鎖騷擾號碼：自動為您阻擋高頻騷擾電話，好省時。
◆自動更新號碼資料庫：定期自動更新資料庫，讓您告別週週手動更新，常保高效來電辨識率。
◆智慧簡訊管家
 - 自動過濾簡訊：自動將簡訊分類至四大訊息匣，所有訊息一目瞭然。
 - 自訂關鍵字過濾簡訊：打造專屬自己的過濾系統，自訂「不想收到的簡訊」中的關鍵字，讓分類更彈性！
◆移除廣告：和廣告說掰掰！清爽介面，使用更順暢。

* 個資外洩偵測、自動網站檢查僅支援 iOS 16 及以上版本使用

更詳細的進階版功能介紹：
https://whoscall.com/zh-hant/premium

應用名稱: Google 相簿 - 相片和影片儲存空間
應用描述:
Google 相簿可讓你用更聰明的方式集中存放所有相片和影片，是依據現代人的拍照需求量身訂做的智慧型服務。

「地球上最棒的相片產品」– The Verge
「Google 相簿是你必備的最新相片應用程式」– Wired
「只要上傳相片，其餘工作就交給 Google 相簿」– 紐約時報

• 釋出空間：不必再擔心手機空間即將用盡。只要輕觸一下，已妥善備份的相片就會從裝置上的儲存空間中移除。

• 視覺化搜尋：現在可以依相片中的人物、地點和事物來搜尋相片，就算沒有任何標記也沒問題。

• 自動為你製作電影和 GIF 動畫：Google 相簿會自動採用你的相片製作電影、美術拼貼和 GIF 動畫等內容。如果你想自行製作這些內容，步驟也很簡單。

• 進階編輯功能：用手指輕觸即可改造相片。使用簡單好用且功能強大的相片和影片編輯工具，就能套用可感知內容的濾鏡、調整光線，以及執行其他作業。

• 聰明的自動化相簿：不必動手就能讓故事精彩重現。在活動或旅行結束後，即可自動取得 Google 相簿運用你的最佳相片製作的新相簿。你還可以邀請其他人在相簿中新增相片。

• 即時相簿：透過即時相簿共享最新相片。只要指定你想瀏覽的人物和寵物，不必手動更新相簿，Google 相簿就會自動新增你為這些對象拍攝的相片。

• 共享相片庫：不必手動操作即可共享。授權讓你信任的使用者存取你的所有相片。

• 重溫這一天：Google 相簿會選用你在一年前同一天拍攝的相片，自動為你製作美術拼貼。

• 投放：透過 Chromecast 支援功能在電視上欣賞相片和影片。

• 免費儲存空間：每個 Google 帳戶都提供了 15 GB 的免費儲存空間，你可以選擇要使用「高畫質」或「原始畫質」選項自動備份所有相片和影片。你的相片不僅安全無虞，而且只有你才能看到。2021 年 6 月 1 日前，以「高畫質」選項備份的所有相片和影片不會計入 Google 帳戶儲存空間。

你也可以訂閱 Google One (加大儲存空間方案) 來升級 Google 帳戶的儲存空間，供原始畫質的相片和影片、Google 雲端硬碟和 Gmail 使用。美國地區的訂閱費用為每個月 $1.99 起，使用者可獲得 100 GB 的儲存空間。價格和可用的功能因區域而異。

如果你是在應用程式內訂閱儲存空間，費用將透過你的 iTunes 帳戶收取。如果你最晚未在目前週期結束前 24 小時關閉自動續訂功能，系統將自動續訂。購買方案後，你可以前往「iTunes 帳戶設定」頁面管理訂閱項目和自動續訂功能。

《Google 隱私權政策》：https://google.com/intl/zh-TW/policies/privacy
《Google One 服務條款》：https://one.google.com/terms-of-service

注意：部分國家/地區的使用者無法使用臉孔特徵分組功能。

持續在背景執行 GPS 會大幅降低電池續航力。除非你授予相關權限 (即開啟需要使用 GPS 的選用功能)，否則 Google 相簿不會在背景執行 GPS。

應用名稱: Lightroom 攝影和照片編輯 | 影片編輯和調色
應用描述:
輕鬆讓您的照片和影片脫穎而出！

加入數百萬信賴 Adobe Photoshop Lightroom的用戶的行列，共同以專業效果打造令人驚豔的照片和影片。

無論您是初出茅廬的攝影師、經驗豐富的專業人士，還是喜歡捕捉生活時刻的愛好者，Lightroom 的照片和影片編輯器可幫助您輕鬆編輯任何照片或影片並與世界分享。立即開始，註冊免費帳戶。

透過 AI 輔助增強功能節省時間
• 使用「自動化」一鍵提升照片效果
• 使用鏡頭模糊功能迅速添加背景虛化效果，增加美感
• 快速修飾人像、突顯主體，或使用最適化預設集變換天空
• 使用 AI 建議預設集選擇完美的照片濾鏡
• 使用遮罩輕鬆選擇照片中的主體或天空，進行精確編輯
• 進入編輯模式之前，尋找群組中的最佳照片，或簡單搜尋它們當中包含的內容

簡單易用且功能強大的照片編輯器
• 從 iCloud 帳戶中快速尋找欲編輯的照片和影片
• 透過快速直觀的照片編輯器和影片編輯器開始編輯
• 使用精準滑桿編輯曝光、高光、陰影、對比、顏色、曲線等，調整任何照片或影片的光影
• 透過編輯色調、飽和度、亮度和顏色分級，完全掌握照片或影片的色彩
• 使用修復功能去除照片中的雜質、修飾和移除物件
• 透過編輯清晰度、紋理、去霧、顆粒和暈影滑感為影片或照片更添質感
• 裁切、旋轉或加入邊框並分享至社群平台
• 以 HDR 模式編輯並匯出相片

照片、影片和 Reels 的專屬預設集和濾鏡
• 使用免費預設集和相機濾鏡進行快速簡單的編輯
• 建立並保存自己的預設集或濾鏡，可用於後續編輯
• 探索由專業攝影師和網紅建立的 200 多個專屬進階預設集

快速的影片編輯器和 Reels 創作工具
• 使用 Lightroom 的編輯器建立前後對比 Reels 短片，適用於社交媒體，分享創意過程
• 套用預設集立即提升影片或 Reels 質感，為所有作品集打造相同的外觀和風格
• 使用精準滑桿調整對比、高光、自然飽和度、影片效果等功能來編輯和修飾影片
• 快速剪輯和旋轉影片

專業相機
• 使用 Lightroom 內建相機捕捉完美照片，提供全手動控制、RAW 拍攝和 HDR 模式
• 拍攝時使用照片的預設集或濾鏡

升級至進階會籍，提升照片和影片質感
升級以解鎖更多易用和進階的照片和影片編輯工具：
• AI 輔助工具使搜尋照片和影片更快速、編輯更輕鬆
• 套用由專業攝影師建立的 200 多個專屬進階預設集濾鏡
• 修復、遮罩和變形等精準編輯功能
• 編輯、修飾 RAW 格式的照片
• 輕鬆將相同的編輯效果套用於多張照片
• 在照片編輯器中找到使用者編輯影片時喜愛的同款優異功能
• 在 Lightroom 社群了解編輯提示和技巧、收藏新的預設集、展示照片，並與攝影師互動
• 同步照片和影片編輯進度，先在手機上開始編輯，接著輕鬆切換到平板電腦或在筆記型電腦上線上編輯
• 100GB 雲端儲存空間

條款與條件：
您對本應用程式的使用受到 Adobe 一般使用條款 http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_linkfree_tw 和 Adobe 隱私權政策 http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_linkfree_tw 的規範

應用名稱: PhotoGrid - 照片拼貼 & 影片編輯
應用描述:
IG網美必備，不管Po文或IG Story，各種社群比例hen容易！臉部貼圖、美顏自拍、梗圖、幻燈片、長條圖、Pattern動態壁紙全都有！一個APP，就滿足所有照片和影片拼貼及編輯的需求，再也不用下載一堆APP還怕空間不夠！你，就是P圖大師。

-- 獨家功能 --
• 相片拼接：快速編排照片並調整相框寬度，輕鬆完成拼貼
• 影片拼貼：迅速拼出質感影片，音樂、文字、邊框等工具都支援
• 美化：內含豐富強大的相片編輯工具，快速製作令人驚豔作品
• 剪貼簿：自由拼貼不被既有格線拘束，高度還原剪貼簿效果
• 海報：多元風格模板，一套用就馬上生成美麗作品，不需再編輯
• 長條圖：輕鬆製出橫及豎的長條圖，也可一鍵成為素描圖
• 趣味相機：火紅AR臉部貼圖，拍照或錄影，一人兩人多人都行
• 梗圖：創作網路當紅梗圖和GIF，社群梗圖表情包大戰就靠它
• 幻燈片：把相片做成音樂回憶相冊，微電影大師就是你
• Pattern：一秒製作可愛的動態壁紙，自製桌布好簡單
• 商店：豐富素材週週更新，貼紙、背景、濾鏡、海報、臉部貼圖用不膩

-- 產品亮點 --
• 拼接：20000+款拼貼模板，更支援16張照片同時拼貼
• 剪貼簿：隨意調整照片大小及位置，支援16張照片同時自由拼貼
• 濾鏡：100+種效果，包含希臘藍、巴黎粉、美顏、黑白等濾鏡
• 海報：200+款海報模板，節慶、畫中畫、雜誌等系列應有盡有

應用名稱: Microsoft Word
應用描述:
令人信賴的 Word 應用程式可讓您快速且輕鬆地建立、編輯、檢視及與其他人共用檔案。您可以使用這款功能強大的 Microsoft 文書處理應用程式，從手機上傳送、檢視和編輯附加至電子郵件的 Office 文件。

有了 Word，Office 即無所不在。無論您是部落客、作家、記者、專欄作家、學生或處理文件的專案經理，都能在 Word 中獲得所需的實用功能。

製作具說服力的文字文件、劇本、部落格、報刊評論或履歷表。運用功能強大的工具來自訂文件、信件、履歷表或筆記，讓您以最佳格式選項和範本完成最佳寫作。

登入您的 Microsoft 365 訂閱後，就能取得完整的 Microsoft Office 體驗。立即下載 Microsoft Word 後，就能輕鬆建立和編輯文件、共同作業和共用。

建立文件
• 使用設計精美的現代化範本，迅速建立專案、作業、信件、部落格、劇本、筆記、報刊評論或履歷表。
• 使用豐富的格式設定和版面配置選項，記下您的想法並透過寫作呈現。
• 無論您使用哪種裝置，皆可保持簡潔俐落且美觀的文件格式和版面配置。

閱讀、撰寫和編輯文件
• 閱讀檢視可讓您在裝置上輕鬆地閱讀篇幅較長的文件、信件、劇本等內容。
• 使用熟悉的撰寫和編輯工具，如同您在電腦上使用的文書處理軟體。

隨時隨地共同作業
• 直接在文件中討論的文字旁新增註解以分享您的想法。
• 所有人都能共同合作，隨時掌握文字、版面配置和格式設定變更。
• 當您與小組成員進行變更時，您可以使用改良的 Word 版本歷程記錄功能，還原到舊版草稿進行檢視。

簡化共用
• 只要點選幾下就能共用檔案，快速邀請其他人編輯或檢視您的文件。
• 輕鬆管理權限並查看有哪些人正在使用文件。
• 將 Word 檔案內容直接複製到電子郵件訊息內文並保持其完整格式，或將文件附加到電子郵件，以簡化共用流程。

立即下載 Microsoft Word，並取得從 iPhone 或 iPad 上建立、共用和編輯文件的最佳方式。

若要建立或編輯文件，請在螢幕大小小於 10.1 英吋的裝置上使用免費的 Microsoft 帳戶登入。
使用符合資格的 Microsoft 365 訂閱，在手機、平板電腦、PC 和 Mac 中充分發揮完整的 Microsoft Office 體驗。

從應用程式購買的 Microsoft 365 每月訂閱將向您的 App Store 帳戶收取費用，除非事先停用自動續約功能，否則會在目前訂閱期間結束之前的 24 小時內自動續約。您可以在 App Store 帳戶設定中管理您的訂閱。

此應用程式是由 Microsoft 或協力廠商應用程式發行者所提供，並且受到不同隱私權聲明、條款及條件的規範。Microsoft 或協力廠商應用程式發行者可能會視需要存取用於此市集及此應用程式所提供的資料，以及在美國或是 Microsoft 或應用程式發行者，及其關係企業或服務提供者維護設備所在的其他任何國家/地區轉移、儲存和處理資料。

請參閱 Microsoft 365 的 Microsoft 軟體授權條款。請參閱資訊底下的「授權合約」連結。安裝應用程式即表示您同意這些條款及條件。

評論.內容: Comments have become more difficult to use and apply. Comments still lack important features (commenting within footnotes is not possible) and some are complicated (editing past comments is different in app vs online). Sharing actual files (not just links) has been tumultuous throughout the last versions alternating between being disabled, moved, partially reinstated. Constant logging in to the app is very challenging if you travel, often leaving the user unable to use the app at the most crucial moments when access to data/hotspot is not readily available (f.e. a subway ride; a presentation in a different country, etc).
Forces Copilot on you and as Microsoft has shown time and again, they have no interest in supporting their Office suite on an Apple device. Maybe OpenOffice or LibreOffice will craft an iOS app.

評論.標題: Great in the past, turning into an annoyance
評論.內容:
Word has been great in the past, but subscription costs are now rising with the justification that their plagiarism machine, “Copilot”, is now included baseline. There’s an intrusive Copilot button right next to the bold/italic/underline buttons now, which is easy to accidentally push. It doesn’t do anything if you’ve disabled “connected experiences” but the button is still there for some reason. 

Overall, a nice push toward finding an alternative. Thanks, Microsoft.

評論.標題: Get rid of the Copilot icons NOW.
評論.內容: I am about to drop Microsoft as a company entirely. I opened Word today and found that there is a persistent Copilot icon that appears in the margin of every single line as I type, regardless of having Copilot turned off or not. This is incredibly distracting, I do not want an icon popping up constantly. A pop up also appears every single time I open Word, begging me to try Copilot. No. No. No. Remove it or I’m out.

With moderately complex documents (embedded objects, comments, track changes, 100+ pages), the app often quits before fully opening each document. For the documents that do open, the app will regularly quit at the same places in each document while scrolling through the pages or while scrolling through the comments. I stopped before attempting any edits. I might be able to use word iOS for short personal documents. But not for the ones I get paid to work on.

Update - crashes even more with the copilot menu item in the toolbar. Please add an option to disable copilot.

It doesn’t work! Recent changes have taken away my ability to search my library files on my phone. This is a serious screw up! 

Please put it back the way it was. It worked just fine and did not need fixing.
File takes a little too long to open.

評論.標題: Old and always less than it was
評論.內容: How do companies like Microsoft become so successful, they cannot fail? Monopoly. One the government isn’t willing or able to tackle. Customers try to get away from them, but it requires a constant elevation toward new and different, and also not as good. Microsoft itself, is not so good as it once was, but it grinds on, mostly on those of us who just want to type a page and hit print, or save. They have an answer for that, save here, no there, or in this format, oh no, not that one, this new format. There is always an evolution, toward something that isn’t about good, it is about away. Away from where they were. They aren’t alone, google is there with them, then there is apple. Too much to say. Just this then, Microsoft Word is a predatory platform of mediocrity. It was never GREAT, but it was pretty good. Now after we’ve paid for it, and paid for it, and continue to pay for it….
