評論.標題: Been using it for many years now.
評論.內容:
Started off using this app on Android years ago and now iOS. The interface has come along way and the tools have too. As a yearly subscriber I would like to see an upgrade to the color grading and audio tools. We could use a color wheel option to color the highlights, midtones and shadows individually for a more cinematic look. 

The new Ai audio tools are cool, but it would be even better with if you could dial in the voice changer with sliders. The stock audio is decent; would be great if audio loops were included that you could drop in and set the length to play for as long as you want instead of having to duplicate the track over and over again. 

Either way it’s still my go to app and worth the annual payment.

A few issues.  First is that I signed up for the free 7 day trial and was immediately charged for a membership.  Dishonest.  Second, I downloaded this app to make a 90 second cartoon video.  It says you need a premium acct to do that, and I now had that (see above). But, once you sign up, when you try to create a video it tells you that IN ADDITION to the premium membership, you have to buy credits to make videos, depending on how long your video is. To make a 30 sec video, you need 120 credits and that costs $18, which is listed as a temporary special for $9.  Still, that’s $9 as long as the sale lasts for 30 seconds in addition to the premium monthly fee. I would not have downloaded this app if making a 90 second video would cost me $34.  If they’d been upfront about costs, I could have save a lot of time also.  At the end of the day, I’m out the monthly fee of $7, and I’m disappointed but wiser.  So I thought I’d let others know.
Great tools

應用名稱: Google Gemini
應用描述:
Google Gemini 應用程式是你的 AI 助理，可以大幅提高工作效率並激發創意。

只要在 iPhone 安裝 Gemini，你就能執行下列動作：

- Gemini 可以連結你喜愛的 Google 應用程式，像是搜尋、YouTube、Google 地圖、Gmail 等
- 透過互動式影像內容和真實範例，提高學習成效並盡情探索各種主題
- 瞭解專業知識，並視需求取得各種主題的相關資訊
- 更輕鬆快速地規劃行程
- 在幾秒內生成 AI 圖像
- 站式獲取摘要、深度分析和來源連結
- 激發全新構想，或調整既有概念

透過 Gemini Advanced 使用 Google 新一代的 AI。享有 Gemini 的所有功能，並能使用 Google 最強大的 AI 模型，以及搶先體驗各項新功能。歡迎開始免費試用 1 個月。已經訂閱？太好了！你可以直接在 Gemini 應用程式使用 Gemini Advanced。

如要使用 Gemini Advanced，請訂閱 Google One AI 進階版方案。 隨時可以取消。 訂閱即代表您同意 Google One 和相關優惠的條款。 必須年滿 18 歲，才能使用 Gemini Advanced 與 Gemini 版 Gmail 和 Google 文件等服務。

Google Gemini 行動應用程式只在部分國家/地區推出，而且僅支援特定語言。瞭解詳情：
g.co/gemini/iosrequirements

Gemini Live 功能的可用性會因語言而異。
g.co/gemini/ioslanguages

Gemini 可以幫你查詢天氣、導航、搜尋網路與應用程式中的資訊及生成摘要等，但在 iOS 裝置還沒有支援設定鬧鐘、傳送簡訊等功能。

詳閱《Gemini 系列應用程式隱私權聲明》：
g.co/gemini/privacynotice

評論.標題: Request to Enable Gemini Services in Afghanistan
評論.內容:
Dear Gemini Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to express my interest in your platform and to kindly request the activation of Gemini services in Afghanistan.

As a growing community of tech-savvy individuals and cryptocurrency enthusiasts in Afghanistan, we are eager to access secure and reliable platforms like Gemini for trading and investing in digital assets. Having access to your platform would not only enhance our financial opportunities but also promote the adoption of regulated and transparent financial systems in our country.

Your commitment to providing a safe and user-friendly experience aligns with the needs of many in Afghanistan who are looking for secure cryptocurrency services. We would greatly appreciate it if you could consider enabling Gemini services in our region.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Mudasir Ziayi
Kabul, Afghanistan

應用名稱: Adobe Express：AI 相片影片
應用描述:
一款能快速簡便地製作一切創意內容的應用程式。快速製作驚豔的社群媒體貼文、圖像、短片、宣傳單等。

「構想、創作、輕而易舉」
借助生成式 AI 力量的 Generate Image（生圖）功能讓你的創意泉湧。用我們的 AI 相片生成器可以把文字提示快速轉化為出色的攝影藝術，彈指間讓你心想成真。

「化不可能為可能」
用 Generative Fill（生成式填充）功能，只要鍵入一個提示就可以插入、刪除或替換人物、物體等。

「酷炫吸睛的頭條」
無論你是要製作傳單還是下一個抖音短片，用 Generate Text Effects（生成文字特效）讓每個字都呼之欲出，活靈活現。你只需鍵入一個提示，就可看到你的文字化身成為你所想像的任何形式。

「短片製作簡單方便」
從出色的範本著手，結合短影片、圖像和音樂。將設計元素動漫化，再配上音效來製作與眾不同的短片。

「讓你的創意振翅高飛」
用借助生成式 AI 力量的  Generate Template（生成範本）讓你想像的內容躍然紙上。只要鍵入一個提示，就能生成令人讚歎不已而且可編輯的社群媒體貼文、傳單、卡片等的範本。

「更容易保持一致的品牌風格」
使用品牌風格工具包輕鬆制作品牌風格統一的創意內容。讓所有字體、顏色和徽標隨手可得，並能立即運用到任何構圖中。輕輕點一下，就可把品牌風格運用到你所有的社羣媒體創意內容中。

「簡化張貼創意內容的時間安排」
使用創意內容張貼工具，你只要輕點幾下即可輕鬆地規劃、預覽、安排時間並把創意內容張貼在你所有的社群媒體管道上。隨時隨地、做你想做。

「一鍵摳圖」
用 Quick Actions（快速操作）功能，只要輕輕點一下就能輕鬆刪除背景、添加短片字幕、產生二維碼、把圖像轉為 GIF 文檔、調整短片圖像大小等。

「快速操作工具」
· 為所有平臺進行修剪和調整大小
· 為多個平臺刪除背景、轉換影像文件、裁剪圖像等
· 把圖片和短片轉成 GIF 圖像
· 生成不同樣式和顏色的二維碼
· 用你的聲音讓角色動漫化
· 生成和編輯短片字幕

某些功能目前並非在所有設備上都受支援，但我們即將推出更多好功能，並陸續為更多設備提供支援。

「若有疑問」
你的回饋和互動將幫助我們讓 Adobe Express 更適合所有人使用。
· 請加入我們的 Discord 社區
[https://discord.gg/adobeexpress] 來分享你的想法、與其他人互動，並參與有創意的挑戰
· 請訪問 Uservoice（使用者意見）[https://adobeexpress.uservoice.com/forums/951181-adobe-express] 來要求添加新功能
· 請在 Adobe 社區論壇中讓我們知道你遇到的任何程式錯誤或問題[https://community.adobe.com/t5/adobe-express/ct-p/ct-adobe-express]

「進階版會員資格」
你的 Adobe Express 進階版會員資格可解鎖進階版專享的功能：
· 有2 億多個免版稅的Adobe Stock照片、視頻、音樂曲目、設計項目和字體任你挑選
· 有250 點生成式服務積分，可用于生成圖像、範本等
· 移除視頻背景、為多個管道用一鍵式操作調整大小、使用品牌風格套組工具等
在桌面瀏覽器和手機上都可使用 Adobe Express 進階版計劃。還包括在移動設備上的 Adobe Photoshop Express.

Taking time out of my workday to say that the recent update has made my experience go from glowing to absolutely miserable. As other Reviewers mention, there are so many bugs, drop-downs that disappear, reduced functionality, it only can be used in landscape mode, useless pop-ups that take up the entire work screen, and repeated crashing while working. There was a period where I could not access any fonts, because the drop-down only showed a sliver of the name of each font, Meaning, I could barely see what I was scrolling to find. At another point, I used the blending tool and wanted to revert to another effect in the drop-down screen which showed a ghost of a screen, then disappeared and I was unable to fix the layer. What’s most upsetting is that I worked on a post that I wanted to turn into a flyer and the resize feature would not stop sending error codes. I contacted support- their name was Mushafiq, and they told me to use Chrome. Chrome just has a landing page that takes you back to the app. I sent them a screenshot and they ended the chat with no further comment or resolution. I’m tired of wasting my time and energy on this Adobe product and will be finding an alternative ASAP.

I’m actively looking at cancelling my subscription and finding something else.

This was an incredible tool, 5 stars.  One that I used frequently and it was so intuitive.  

Now, this new IPad version that came out in mid-December 2024 is terrible!  Not intuitive, freezes up, and user interface is just awful!  Thankfully, it allows me to revert to the previous version when I launch the app, but even the old version is struggling since this latest update came out.  I assume this option to go back to the previous version will eventually go away when Adobe decides they want to force this disaster of a version upon us.  Why screw with something that was working and was simple to use and understand.  At this point, I am looking for an alternate that is no frills and easy to use.

評論.標題: Adobe - The Greediest company in the WORLD
評論.內容: This app is simply a marketing tool to get you to buy their overly expensive products. You can get absolutely everything in this app for free elsewhere. You can also just pirate the software on Android/Windows and get it all absolutely free. Don’t waste your time on their nonexistent ‘free’ tier, and don’t feed the obnoxious pricing structure they have.

I like Adobe and I am trying my hardest to get familiar with the process and doing more for our church since my husband had a stroke and I had to step into position of caring for him and our church. We are a very small church and just a few dedicated people and we need to be able to do things that are really important to our church.
I am so tired of this company updating its app and increasing the price AND then messing up the app I’ve already bought so that it is effectively unusable.
Easy to use and didn’t cost money. 10/10
Adobe Express has SO many great templates and so easy to use! Removing a fall background from a picture was done so effortlessly. Will never go back to the other tool I used.

This recent update has truly ruined the reason I used this app. It lags, it’s complicated, buttons and features and hidden all over the place, and much more. They completely ripped the layout of Canva, but made it worse. I like Canva, but I preferred Express for the quick and snappy layout. Now I have to wait after I click a button because of this clunky unpolished system. I will be switching to Canva.
I love this app and I think every single person in the world should use it!:)

應用名稱: Microsoft PowerPoint
應用描述:
PowerPoint 應用程式可讓您存取熟悉的投影片放映製作程式工具。隨時隨地快速且輕鬆地建立、編輯、檢視、發表簡報，或共用簡報。

隨時隨地自信流暢地向任何人進行簡報。從專題簡報到辦公室投影片放映都可以使用 PowerPoint 製作完成。

PowerPoint 讓您透過功能強大且可自訂的投影片和簡報讓觀眾留下深刻印象，並且讓您脫穎而出。隨時隨地建立投影片並自信流暢地進行簡報。

使用簡報者教練來掌控您的簡報，這是專為協助公開演講的全新 AI 工具。練習您的簡報並取得即時建議來調整您的節奏，避免「嗯」並自信地演講。需要有效的 Microsoft 365 訂閱。

隨時隨地自訂您的簡報，即時與其他人共同作業。透過 OneDrive 同步處理您的 PowerPoint 文件、與同事共用，並以小組形式建立令人讚嘆的簡報。

登入您的 Microsoft 365 訂閱後，就能取得完整的 Microsoft Office 體驗。立即下載 Microsoft PowerPoint 後，就能輕鬆建立、編輯和共用簡報。

自信流暢地進行簡報
• 隨時隨地使用 PowerPoint，絕不錯過任何資訊。您可以製作新的簡報或繼續使用現有簡報。
• PowerPoint 會將您的簡報同步處理到 OneDrive，因此您可以在電腦上開始簡報，然後使用 PowerPoint 行動裝置版編輯。
• 新的簡報者教練功能專為您的簡報提供意見反應和協助所設計。

可自訂的投影片放映製作程式
• PowerPoint 提供功能強大且可高度自訂的體驗，建立令人印象深刻的簡報，讓您輕鬆脫穎而出。
• 從範本建立投影片放映，或是從頭開始建立簡報。

在簡報上共同作業
• PowerPoint 可讓您輕鬆地與其他人共同作業。
• 透過按一下便能共用的功能，可快速邀請其他人對投影片進行編輯、檢視或提供意見反應。
• 輕鬆管理權限並查看有哪些人正在使用簡報。
• 使用投影片中的整合註解，隨時掌握變更和意見反應。
• 比較變更來查看簡報一段時期內的演變情況。

立即下載 Microsoft PowerPoint，並取得從 iPhone 或 iPad 上建立、編輯以及共用投影片和簡報的最佳方式。

若要建立或編輯文件，請在螢幕大小小於 10.1 英吋的裝置上使用免費的 Microsoft 帳戶登入。
使用符合資格的 Microsoft 365 訂閱，在手機、平板電腦、PC 和 Mac 中充分發揮完整的 Microsoft Office 體驗。

從應用程式購買的 Microsoft 365 每月訂閱將向您的 App Store 帳戶收取費用，除非事先停用自動續約功能，否則會在目前訂閱期間結束之前的 24 小時內自動續約。您可以在 App Store 帳戶設定中管理您的訂閱。

此應用程式是由 Microsoft 或協力廠商應用程式發行者所提供，並且受到不同隱私權聲明、條款及條件的規範。Microsoft 或協力廠商應用程式發行者可能會視需要存取用於此市集及此應用程式所提供的資料，以及在美國或是 Microsoft 或應用程式發行者，及其關係企業或服務提供者維護設備所在的其他任何國家/地區轉移、儲存和處理資料。

請參閱 Microsoft 365 的 Microsoft 軟體授權條款。請參閱資訊底下的「授權合約」連結。安裝應用程式即表示您同意這些條款及條件。

應用名稱: StressWatch: 壓力即時監測 & 健康管理
應用描述:
StressWatch 已被全球 171 個國家/地區蘋果應用商店推薦——
◎ 八月最佳 APP
◎ The Best Apps for iOS 18
◎ 首頁主打推薦
◎ Apple Watch 必備
◎ 新 APP 推薦
◎ 本周編輯推薦

StressWatch透過分析蘋果手錶HRV心率變異性和靜息心率等數據，幫助你理解當前身體疲勞和心理壓力程度，及時提醒壓力狀態，幫助你更好地感知、管理與應對壓力。StressWatch透過讀取蘋果手錶存儲到蘋果健康內的心率數據來檢測你的HRV（Heart Rate Variability，心率變異性）和靜息心率，及時提醒你的壓力狀態，通過統計分析給出相關洞察，讓身心更平靜輕鬆。生活慢一點也可以溫柔閃亮！

StressWatch可以怎樣幫到你

當我們在深夜加班的時候，StressWatch可以在手錶上提醒我HRV偏低注意壓力——我意識到我今天不需要再卷了，工作留到明天做吧；
當社恐的我們混在派對裡強顏歡笑的時候，提醒我HRV偏低注意壓力——我意識到我不需要迎合他人，於是換個讓自己更開心的社交方式；
當我們在喝悶酒時候，提醒我HRV過低壓力過載，我意識到喝酒並不是排解壓力的好辦法，於是會少喝一些更愛惜自己身體；
把HRV讀數放在手錶表盤上，一抬腕就知道最近的壓力狀況，決定接下來是要卷還是躺；
堅持良好作息、運動一段時間後，通過每周、每月的統計告訴我這段時間的壓力值比上個月明顯有所下降，整個人狀態都好了很多。
為什麼做這個產品
這是一個內卷又焦慮的時代，AI每天都在爆炸性的發展，彷彿要取代我們所有人的工作。每家公司都在996，每個人都活在一不努力就可能被時代抛棄的巨大壓力中。曾經我們也是公司裡的卷王，經常為了公司項目從早上八點一直卷到晚上十二點，跨時區會議多數還拖堂到凌晨。週末彷彿變成了一個遙遠的概念，為了產品能按時上線，放棄週末去加班變成了基本操作。卷得太劇烈，壓力過大，身體都默默承受了，後移的髮際線是身體的求救信號。於是我們開始思考，有沒有更及時的方式能讓我們了解身體的壓力水平。偶然機會了解到HRV這個概念，借助它可以很好地量化我們自身的壓力。

設計理念
做StressWatch這個App的初衷是想幫助大家在這個焦慮的時代減少壓力慢下來。StressWatch的科學依據是基於HRV（心率變異性）數值的靜息心率的壓力測量，但僅僅告訴用戶冰冷數字容易營造出悲壯的「壓力過載」氛圍（我們不希望大家比慘），生活中也已經有太多的數字了，OKR、KPI、NPS。我們一直在思考，如何給理性的數據注入一些溫度？應該用什麼樣的情感化表達，幫助大家更好的和產品連接以產生共情。
於是，就有了「壓力泡泡」這個產品形象，「泡泡」就是我們克服壓力緩解焦慮的夥伴，他會隨著你的壓力狀態變化改變自己的顏色，但是無論壓力如何都能泰然處之。我們沒法控制外在的環境，就像我們沒法控制天氣一樣。但無論外面是晴天、雨天、甚至暴風雨，當不同壓力狀態的你每次打開app，都能看到一個神情自如、可愛輕鬆的泡泡。TA提醒你慢一些，在你最慌亂的時候給你的心一個柔軟的擁抱。

未來產品功能規劃

- 更豐富的手錶表盤掛件
- 手機桌面小組件
- 快速HRV測量
- HRV和靜息心率趨勢
- 每日恢復狀態評估
- 歡迎聯繫我們

你可以通過以下方式找到我們
電子郵箱: badideas100@hotmail.com
小紅書 @StressWatch App

非常期待聽到你的建議，你的支持和建議是我們不斷迭代的動力來源！
蘋果健康整合
StressWatch通過蘋果健康讀取來自蘋果手錶的心率健康數據。StressWatch需要獲取蘋果健康的讀取授權，以提醒、統計壓力時刻、提供建議，否則無法正常使用。請放心，你的健康數據僅儲存在本地，我們不上傳任何你的健康數據。

訂閱價格和條款
StressWatch可以免費下載，若選擇升級到StressWatch Pro版本，則可以解鎖所有付費功能。
我們提供一次性購買、按月和按年自動續訂三種不同的購買選項。

按月或按年訂閱的說明：確認並支付後，將通過你的蘋果iTunes帳號自動續訂。扣費成功後，順延一個訂閱周期。若需退訂，請在當前訂閱期結束前至少24小時內，手動在iTunes / Apple ID設置管理中關閉自動續費功能。試用期內，如不取消訂閱，則會在試用期結束時自動開通訂閱並扣款。本服務由您自助選擇是否取消，若您選擇不取消，將為您開通下一個計費周期的續費服務。

健康建議的免責聲明
StressWatch提供的所有信息和建議不可以被視作醫療建議或診斷，請勿替代專業的診斷和治療。如果感覺壓力過大無法調節，以及做出任何醫療決定之前，請及時尋求專業醫生幫助。

評論.內容: Really nice app

If I sit too long, say watching a movie, I get warned that my HRV is too low. But I’ve recently been in car accident, my husband just found out he needs major surgery, and my father in law is in the hospital and may not be able to live at home anymore. I have a tension headache to end all headaches. Plus, I didn’t sleep much last night due to all the anxiety. 

But according to this app, my realtime stress is low and I’m going great. Yeah, what a joke. I gotta say I don’t think it works.

評論.標題: Don’t waste your money and use free version, or don’t use at all. Wildly Innacurate.
評論.內容: Keep in mind, I have not been diagnosed with any heart conditions nor ever had one. This app is wildly inaccurate, mostly because of when exactly apple watch makes the measurements. When I am fully at rest, I keep getting notification of “Pay attention” and overload, but I feel absolutely fine. Free version might be fine for some ease of analyzing the HRV readings, but do not waste your money for the only useful paid feature, realtime stress, as it’s inaccurate and useless.

Update - now the watch faces are no longer compatible with 18.2. I will have to cancel my subscription and find one that does. 
I absolutely loved this app and relied upon it. After iOS 18 came out and I updated my watch, it has been sporadic at best. I have followed all the online suggestions. Settings on both the watch and the app are correct. Watch and phone have both been restarted. App has been uninstalled and reinstalled and it still does not properly work.

I have been using this app for a while on my watch and just had to take it off. When I am relaxed and happy it will tell me to check myself and when I am upset or anxious about something it will tell me I’m in the good range. I then will get even more annoyed because as soon as I get upset my watch sends an alert to tell me I’m doing good. It’s like telling someone when they are angry to calm down.

I love this app and am a paying member for the time being. This has been helpful in training me to tune into my body and recognize what stress feels like. I’ve even started to notice high stress levels on my own a few times now which is a really big deal for me. 

I’m giving 3 stars because the data analysis is just not where it needs to be in my opinion. In the paid version you can see historical data back as far as it goes and you have the option to log how you are feeling mentally and physically at the time of a stress notification. You can also associate that notification with things like work, fitness, and alcohol and you can add your own custom ones as well. While logging these things has been helpful for personal reflection and recognition on my own, there is zero analysis of this data in the app. Here are examples of what would be useful:
-Your HRV is lower and more controlled on days you have not logged alcohol.
-Your reported feeling focused or energized more on days you have logged fitness.
- On average you log feeling tense and overwhelmed between 2-5 pm on weekdays 40% of the time. 
- or 60% of your highest stress levels last month were logged between 2-5pm on weekdays. 

I want it to recognize patterns in the data so that I can make changes to my life that prevent stress BEFORE it happens, not just while it is happening. 
For now, I’m going to keep using the app to continue building my skills in recognizing my own body sensations. But after another month or so I will likely cancel my subscription because $13 a month or $40 per year is too expensive just to be able to log how you are feeling and view historical data that has no helpful analysis or pattern recognition.
Free bits are not very helpful and paid portion is too expensive.
It’s always wrong. Telling me my stress level is low when I’m drowning in my own stress!

An excellent companion to the data Watch is already collecting, making it even more useful and accessible in realtime.  The accurate metrics and anlysis have given me actionable items to further improve my health and had made a measurable difference in the couple of weeks I have been using it already.  I wear Watch mainly in Airplane mode and this is still functional as a standalone app, which is fundamental to my use.  Thank you for developing such an important service, sincerely!

I’ve been using this app for about 10 days and it honestly INCREASES my stress level. There are so many variables that can affect HRV that are just part of living … have a heavy meal? Have a glass of wine? Have a cold? Drink a cup of coffee? You’ll get alerts. I’m aware these things have a physical impact on my body, but if I can’t eat a normal meal at a restaurant without 3 hours of being panicked by “overload” readings, there’s an issue. Plus my Apple Watch essentially allows me access to similar data. For the record, I’m active (runner, yoga, etc) and hydrated and generally careful with what I put in my body … but this had me in a constant panic … discussed issue with my physician, but testing shows I’m fine. Also, pretty overpriced given I can get most of the data free.

Well I will use the free days but the watch interface is not available for any of them. Which makes this app useless to me. I don’t need real time updates but I would like to use the watch to annotate my day. Seems like false advertising to me.

評論.標題: Useful for those who lack interoception
評論.內容: I’m an autistic adult and I have a hard time monitoring my body for signs of stress. This means that by the time I realize there’s a problem, I’m already panicking or melting down. This watch has been helping me keep track of signs of stress and I’ve found it to be pretty accurate. Correlation doesn’t equal causation but there are a lot of trends to my data that I never would have seen if I hadn’t used the app to track it. It works and I love the addition of real time tracking now, too.
Every time I’ve been actually stressed since I’ve had this app, it tells me I’m not. But when I’m relaxing it tells me I’m deeply stressed. Seems like a scam.

At first I believed whatever it showed but later on tried testing it out with my therapist. It kept telling me I was “overload” and high stress when I felt great, but kept wondering what if I was stressed and didn’t know it. Then when I was going through one of the worst most stressful moments the app notified me right then on my watch that my stress level was “great,” that’s when I realized the app was a gimmick and didn’t actually work! Don’t waste your time believing this can track your stress! In fact it’s way more stressful to get the notification that you “are stressed” then being stressed without it. Do yourself a favor and free yourself of this wasteful product, go outside, take a deep breath and go for a walk!

評論.內容: I switched to istress, I can see my stress on the watch without paying.
Adding custom watch themes don’t work. complications fail to appear. This App doesn’t even show up in the Watch app.

When you are in the middle of freaking out and having a meltdown, it’s bad enough , BUT when the little face happily pops up and tells you that your stress is normal, it creates the stress of ripping off the watch, letting it learn to fly, and then finally feeling satisfaction while deleting the app. 
It looks nice, but you have a lot of work to do. You must better understand that simple statistics and graphics will not present a true picture of one’s state. Maybe some day.

I initially downloaded this app to help manage my severe anxiety attacks after being hospitalized a few months ago. I was hoping it would provide insights into my episodes since I hadn’t experienced much anxiety before my hospitalization. Despite the high ratings, my experience was disappointing. I used the free version for some time but kept running into glitches, so I was desperate enough to try the free trial. Unfortunately, it was to no avail. The data was hours behind, alerts didn’t come in real time, and it glitched frequently with my watch. After the trial was over, it glitched even more. I tried to fix and repair it, but nothing worked, and deleted the app from my watch and phone. 

I requested a refund after a day of trying, but it was unsuccessful. The most frustrating part was the lack of customer support. Despite reaching out multiple times, I received no assistance or satisfactory explanations for the issues I encountered. This was an expensive mistake, and I hope my review helps others avoid a similar error in judgment.
I never write reviews, but I felt compelled to warn others before purchasing this product. While it wasn’t the most expensive app, having something that doesn’t work as it should shouldn’t be the customer’s burden. Despite the high star rating, consider this app a fraud, even more so after my experience. As a few other people like me have had the same issue, I hope this review helps others avoid a similar mistake.

應用名稱: Microsoft Edge：AI瀏覽器
應用描述:
Microsoft Edge，您的 AI 驅動瀏覽器，旨在提升您的瀏覽體驗。透過 Edge 上的 AI 驅動功能，讓您隨時掌握最新消息、在購物時搜尋食譜、研究新的健身計畫，或探索本地活動。Microsoft Edge 是一種更智能的瀏覽方式，讓您隨時隨地輕鬆瀏覽、搜尋、執行任務、購物並保持安全。

無論您是在購買最新的科技產品、時尚必需品或日常雜貨，Edge 提供智能工具，幫助您輕鬆省錢，自信購物並輕鬆省下更多金錢。

同時，您的密碼和電子錢包將隨時安全隨行，讓您在購物或管理支付時倍感安心。

使用 Microsoft Edge 瀏覽網頁時，可透過智能安全工具（例如追蹤防護、Microsoft Defender Smartscreen、AdBlock、InPrivate 瀏覽和 InPrivate 搜尋）保障您的隱私與安全。保護您的瀏覽記錄，讓您的在線體驗更加安全和私密。

在您的行動裝置上體驗效率與便捷，Microsoft Edge 為您提供與桌面裝置同步的功能，打造更緊密的瀏覽體驗。使用 Drop 輕鬆在裝置間傳輸檔案，並快速將文件和照片從手機上傳至桌面。

立即下載並體驗 Microsoft Edge，隨時隨地享受更智能、更直覺的瀏覽體驗。

MICROSOFT EDGE 功能亮點：
更智能的搜尋方式
• 使用內建的智能功能強化您的搜尋體驗，幫助您精確找到所需資訊，提供綜合答案，並輕鬆總結文件與網頁內容。

更智能的購物方式
• 使用內建工具節省時間和金錢，自信購物。
• Edge 掃描網頁上的可用優惠券，輕鬆將其應用於購物車中，幫助您最大化節省。
• 透過 Microsoft Rewards*，輕鬆從領先的零售商和超市購物中賺取現金回饋。這是一項免費計畫，可讓 Microsoft Rewards 會員在參與的零售商購物時獲得現金回饋或折扣。
• 無縫同步至桌面裝置，隨時隨地使用 Microsoft 的安全功能，例如 Wallet。Wallet 安全儲存支付方式與密碼，並提供虛擬卡以增強購物保護。

更智能的操作方式
• 透過強大的擴展功能自訂您的瀏覽體驗，重新定義您的瀏覽方式。
• 在執行其他任務時聆聽內容，或使用「朗讀功能」提升閱讀理解能力，支援多種自然語音和口音的語言選項。

更智能的安全方式
• 使用 InPrivate 瀏覽，防止敏感資訊被追蹤。
• InPrivate 模式增強隱私保護，不會將搜尋歷史記錄保存至 Microsoft Bing 或與您的 Microsoft 帳戶相關聯。
• 密碼監控功能在您儲存於瀏覽器的憑據被偵測到出現在暗網時提供警示。
• 預設追蹤防護，提供更私密的瀏覽體驗。
• 安全同步收藏夾、密碼和其他資料。
• 廣告攔截器 – 使用 AdBlock Plus 阻擋不必要的廣告，提升專注力並移除分散注意力的內容。
• 使用 Microsoft Defender Smartscreen 阻擋網路釣魚和惡意軟體攻擊，讓您安心瀏覽。

立即下載 Microsoft Edge，您的 AI 驅動瀏覽器，探索更智能的瀏覽、搜尋、操作和購物方式，超越您的想像。快速且安全的網頁瀏覽器，將安全性、隱私與保護置於首位。

此購物功能目前僅在美國提供，需使用 Microsoft 帳戶。

應用名稱: Fotor-圖片編輯器&海報設計制作&拼圖工具
開發者: Chengdu Everimaging Science and Technology Co., Ltd
應用描述:
Fotor是一款全能的AI修圖工具箱，只需簡單的操作，就能讓您的照片與眾不同。無論您是藝術家，還是攝影愛好者，亦或者只是喜歡編輯和創作的個人用戶，Fotor 都能為您提供無限創意，滿足您的各種照片編輯需求。

在Fotor App中，您可以：

‒ 使用 AI Photo Enhancer功能，讓模糊照片瞬間變得清晰，只需輕點一下，即可修復顆粒狀、像素化、損壞和低分辨率的照片。
‒ 使用Magic Eraser功能，即可快速消除照片中您不想要的路人、水印、簽名、粉刺、建築物等，並與原背景完美融合。
‒ 使用Bg Remover功能，一鍵扣出圖片中的人物、動物、產品、圖章等內容，快速替換照片背景，助您打造出極具個性的照片。
‒ 使用AI Retouch，一鍵讓您擁有無瑕肌膚，磨皮、祛斑自然而細緻，輕鬆塑造精緻容顏。
‒ 使用AI Headshot為Linkedin、Instagram等社交媒體平台定制專業頭像和個人資料圖片。
‒ 將文字轉變為精美的圖片！ 只需描述您想要的內容，如「魔法師在廚房烤麵包」或「蜘蛛俠在酒吧」，選擇一種風格，就能在幾秒鐘內將您的想法變為現實，從逼真的照片和徽標到3D角色和數字插圖，您可以隨心所欲地創作。
‒ 想看看您和伴侶未來寶寶的模樣？或是與您喜歡的名人有了孩子會是什麼樣子？有了AI寶寶生成器，輕鬆滿足您的好奇心。
‒ 使用AI Face Mimic，上傳一張照片，就可以讓您的朋友唱出您最喜歡的歌曲或者做出搞笑表情，還可以為您的老照片製作動畫，讓黑白照片重現生機。
‒ 使用緊跟潮流的3D Cartoon、Anime 等AI卡通藝術特效，輕鬆將您的自拍照轉變為生動的卡通漫畫。

探索 Fotor 更多功能，釋放您的創意。

AI工具：
‒ 使用 AI Replace，通過替換人物服裝、改變髮型髮色等瞬間改變照片，幫助您找到最適合自己的風格。
‒ 使用 AI Expand 探索無限可能，通過擴展照片主題內容、背景和紋理，讓其適應不同的尺寸要求，更突出主體或達到更平衡的視覺效果。
‒ 上傳自拍照，生成風格各異、獨一無二的AI頭像，無論是簡歷中的專業頭像，還是想為您的照片添加奢華背景，或者想將自己置身於標誌性的旅遊勝地，都可以實現，非常簡單。
‒ 在照片上應用風格化的 AI 滤鏡，創造出令人驚嘆的照片效果。
‒ 修復模糊、損壞的家庭老照片並為其著色，讓您的家庭老照片變成繽紛的高清照片，讓它們看起來更現代、更生動，讓您重溫美好回憶！
‒ 使用face swap 的影視角色、80年代等模板，體驗成為自己喜歡的影視人物和復古風格的獨特魅力，創造出屬於您的精彩瞬間。
‒ 使用AI Sketch，將粗糙的線條草圖轉化為各種風格的數字藝術作品。
‒ 使用AI藝術特效，將您的照片變成像梵高、莫奈、畢加索等藝術大師的畫作。

照片編輯：
‒ 使用我們獨一無二的照片濾鏡來營造氣氛，讓您的照片更具吸引力。
‒ 調整亮度、清晰度、對比度、飽和度、HSL、曲線、色調、膠卷顆粒等。
‒ 自動對焦，模糊背景，銳化照片主體。
‒ 將圖片裁剪成任意形狀，玩轉圖片視角，實現更多創意。
‒ 使用Overlay功能，將多張圖片或效果疊加在一起，使其更具創意和吸引力。
‒ 輸入比例，自由調整圖片尺寸，同時保持長寬比不變。
‒ 為照片添加文字和貼紙，讓您的照片增加趣味和層次感。
‒ 只需一鍵，即可將模糊的人像照片變清晰。

布局：
‒ 使用collage Maker，記錄朋友聚會、家庭活動、假期旅行等精彩瞬間，拼貼成一張生動的合影，為您帶來最美好時刻的回憶！
‒ 從海量設計模板中選擇，為您的企業創建專業的社交媒體帖子、傳單或海報等營銷宣傳物料。
‒ 嘗試照片網格拼貼或自由式拼貼，為自拍照和照片製作心情版和相框。
‒ 拼接工具，將多張圖片，拼接成一張圖片，創造有趣效果。

智能扣圖：
‒ 使用雙重曝光創建超現實藝術效果，打造大片特效。
‒ 使用AI Background功能，為您的產品照片即時創建令人驚嘆的背景，多種場景一鍵體驗，以獲得完美且專業的產品照片。
‒ 使用color spansh，將圖片的特定區域保留為彩色，其餘部分變為黑白，形成強烈的對比效果，突出您想要強調的彩色區域，使照片更具視覺衝擊力。
‒ 使用背景虛化，可以增強照片主體和減少雜亂的背景細節，從而提高整體照片的美觀度。

Fotor Pro訂閱費用，根據不同的方案按月或按年收取。購買Fotor Pro的賬號，會在確認購買後支付相關費用。訂閱到期後將自動續訂，除非您在當前訂閱週期結束前至少24小時關閉自動續訂。一旦確認訂閱，將根據您選擇的套餐從您的iTunes賬戶扣費。購買後，可前往iTunes設置來管理訂閱，以及關掉自動更新操作。本月取消，次月生效。

應用名稱: Foodie - 捕捉生活風味
應用描述:
享受更美味豐富的生活！
身為社群饕客，絕不能少了foodie！
用更有趣更快速的方法，點綴完美饗宴的無瑕回憶。
 
+超過30種專業級濾鏡
美味、波西塔諾、清涼、野餐、甜蜜、新鮮、鮮美烤肉、浪漫、香脆與Q彈等各種濾鏡。
+簡單又準確的智慧指南功能，讓您輕鬆拍出俯瞰角度的美食照
讓您在由上往下拍攝照片時，能夠捕捉到最完美的氣氛與色調。
+用漂亮的濾鏡為影片添加風味
用影片紀錄您的美食之旅。
+編輯乏味鏡頭，變成可口傑作
使用各樣濾鏡與進階編輯，讓您的照片充滿可愛魅力，同時營造底片相機的溫暖色澤。
+捕捉完美瞬間的定時器功能
活用定時器功能，拍下最美的自拍照。
+「靜音」選項 
如果要在安靜的餐廳裡自拍或拍攝美食，就啟用此選項吧！
+輕鬆將照片分享至社群網站
不管是Instagram還是LINE、Facebook、KakaoTalk、WeChat、VSCO、微博，都能輕鬆分享照片！
+相關應用程式 
除了Foodie，也試試B612和Snow吧！一定能滿足您的各種照相需求。"

I would absolutely understand a one-time purchase (much like procreate) to support the developers, but a subscription to a non-essential app (who’s now made their free version considerably worse) I can’t bring myself to support.

應用名稱: 愛分享 - GPS定位 查找 家庭, 朋友
應用描述:
愛分享是一款提供實時定位服務的應用程式，讓家人和朋友們私下分享他們的位置訊息和互相溝通。
 
愛分享的特色功能：
•在地圖上查看朋友或家人的實時位置
•當家人或朋友到達或離開家、公司和學校時，接收實時通知
•查看您朋友或家人的以前的位置記錄
•在緊急情況下發送警報
•在地圖上發送訊息
 
愛分享是一款位置跟踪應用程序，可讓您輕鬆地檢查和共享父母、孩子和朋友之間的實時位置。而且，愛分享的目標是通過地點警報、位置記錄和緊急警報等服務讓您保持心中的平安，保護您的親人安全。此外，即使父母不了解定位服務的先前知識和技能，兒童和老年父母也可以實時準確、快速地看到對方。
愛分享也是追踪孩子位置的最佳方式。父母通過愛分享能檢查他們的孩子是否安全地生活，所以可以保持平穩的心態，讓他們更容易專注於工作和日常生活。
 
“因為有愛分享的緊急通知，我總覺得安全！在緊急情況下，我只需要搖動手機就可發送緊急訊息。愛分享是最好的安全應用程式” - 瑪麗
“我可以通過愛分享實時追踪我的孩子。愛分享是非常有用的程式，當我的孩子到達或離開該區域時它會提醒我。愛分享是最好的家庭定位器” - 艾比
 
雖然我們的免費會員仍提供許多功能，但我們的高級服務將為您提供更多的功能！
•無限制的地點 - 您可以設置無限制的地點，並在朋友進入或離開某個地方時自動獲得通知
•無限朋友 - 添加無限制的朋友
•街景 - 查看3D街景的位置
•位置記錄 - 位置記錄使您可以查看過去30天內朋友的移動情況
 
高級服務訂閱提供7天免費試用，並自動續訂成付費訂閱。價格可能因地點而有所不同。除非自動續訂關閉，否則免費試用期的訂閱將自動續訂為付費訂閱。付款將在確認購買時從iTunes帳戶中扣款。除非在當期結束前至少24小時關閉自動續訂，否則訂閱會自動續訂。帳戶將在當期結束前24小時內收取續訂費用。購買後，可以通過手機的“帳戶設置”來管理訂閱並關閉自動續訂。當用戶購買另一個訂閱時，免費試用期的任何未使用部分將失效。
 
請注意，在後台必須開著通知和GPS才能使程式正常工作。這樣會大大降低電池壽命。
但您不用擔心。愛分享利用全球專利和專有技術創建了特殊的定位技術和算法，使電池使用量最小化。因此，您可以有用地使用我們的應用程序，而無需擔心電池問題。
 
*使用條款：http://isharingsoft.com/terms_of_use   
*隱私政策：http://isharingsoft.com/privacy_policy  
 
請分享您的回饋和建議：contact@isharingsoft.com

應用名稱: EF Hello 英文學習：AI 家教陪你輕鬆提升口說和聽力
應用描述:
你是不是一開口說英文就緊張？
超想學好英文，但沒時間和精力去上實體課？試了很多方法，但每次跟外國人說幾句不是很緊張就是就開始恍神？
我們懂你，因為我們也走過同樣的挫折之路。

隆重介紹 EF Hello：2024年 App Store Award 文化影響力獎得主！
來看看為什麼 EF Hello 是全球數百萬英文學習者的學習首選吧。

每個人都有自己的學習步調，傳統教學不見得適合所有人。
但別擔心，有我們挺你！

為你介紹我們的 EF Hello 小夥伴 - Addi，讓你隨時隨地擁有一位專屬 AI 英文家教！Addi 運用 AI 技術和機器學習，能根據你的需求和學習目標，為你量身打造最適合的課程，讓你自信開口說英文，發揮你的口語潛能！

想像一下，不管何時何地，都能自信說英文，輕鬆融入任何對話。選對 app 不只能提升你的英文程度，還能幫你建立自信心、拓展見識和交友圈、開啟更多的機會，讓你的生活變得多彩多姿！

我們精心設計了多個可以快速完成的小課程，完美融入你的日常生活，幫你有效利用碎片時間 - 無論是喝咖啡、通勤、還是排隊空檔都能抽空學英文。和 Addi 一起練習，獲得即時回饋，拋開焦慮，不用怕犯錯，讓我們一起每天進步一點點！

現在就加入吧！每天只需5分鐘，透過有趣的英文練習，循序漸進地學習，和 AI 小伙伴一起在真實場景中實戰對話，從簡單的點杯咖啡到自信面試都能游刃有餘。還會針對你的發音、單字和文法弱點，Addi 幫你即時講解錯誤，助你全面提升。

立即開始英文提升之旅，享受語言帶來的無限可能。你的流利未來正等著你，讓我們一起打破語言障礙吧！

喜歡 EF Hello？快來試試 Hello Pro，現在送你 7 天免費試用！解鎖所有課程和功能，盡情享受英文學習的樂趣。

遇到問題不用怕，在 EF Hello App 中搖一搖手機，打開回饋頁面，或者發送郵件至 efhello@ef.com，跟我們分享你的問題和建議，我們保證會用心聆聽。

隱私權政策：http://hello.ef.com/privacy-policy

應用名稱: 小影 - 影片剪輯&一鍵製作&視頻編輯
開發者: Hangzhou Xiaoying Innovation Technology Co., Ltd.
應用描述:
小影（VivaVideo）是一款功能強大，簡單易用的高清影片編輯軟體。爆款影片主题、海量贴图素材、炫酷濾鏡特效等你來探索！更有語音轉繁体字幕、文字涂鸦笔刷、AI 音乐、AI 抱抱、畫中畫、智能摳圖、關鍵幀等功能，現在就用小影，記錄你的精彩，分享你的故事！

【全能視頻剪輯】
全新多軌道操作佈局，剪輯步驟更清晰~
-「剪切」0.1秒精準剪切，好片不拖拉
-「變速」強大的0.1-10倍視頻變速效果，自由變換輕鬆改變視頻節奏
-「倒放」超酷視頻倒放功能，邀你一起乘坐時光機
-「比例」專業視頻比例：1:1、4:3、3:4、4:5、16:9、9:16⋯⋯
-「參數調節」高級視頻調色，支持亮度、對比度、飽和度、銳度、色溫、暗角、色調、陰影、高光、褪色
-「畫中畫」內置摳像、關鍵幀功能，輕鬆實現自定義動畫效果，剪輯創意視頻
-「自訂水印」在視頻中加入自己的logo，讓視頻更有個性

【貼紙和文本】
-「獨家貼紙」超丰富的場景化可愛動畫貼紙，讓視頻裝飾有趣味
-「自動字幕」一鍵識別字幕，自動添加文本，支持字幕翻译，滿足日常視頻後期
-「字幕风格」花字特效、KTV字幕、繽紛氣泡、Vlog標題等樣式隨心選
-「字體樣式」手繪、黑體、圓體、宋體等，字型陰影、對齊、多色描邊等定制專屬字幕
-「字幕動畫」入場、循環、出場多種動畫效果自由切換

【音樂曲庫】
-「AI 音乐」把你的靈感化為獨一無二的專屬歌曲，簡單又有趣！
-「音頻」場景音樂庫/音效庫，契合視頻主題
-「音樂鏡頭」一鍵添加視頻配樂，跟著音樂舞動、歌唱或律動節拍

【濾鏡、特效、转场和主题】
-「濾鏡」復古膠片濾鏡，提升視頻畫質、色彩韻味，彷彿漫步膠片復興年代
-「特效」飄雪、煙花、夢幻、漫畫風、glitch（故障藝術）、VHS、浪漫愛情、電影特效，讓生活秒變大片
-「轉場」1000+ 電影級影片转场設計，讓影片銜接更酷炫丝滑
-「主題」文藝、旅行、新年、浪漫、親子、生日、Vlog、畢業季、復古、時尚，多種風格主題任你挑選，轻松創作高級感影片

【畫中畫】
- 內置摳像、關鍵幀功能，輕鬆實現自定義動畫效果，剪輯創意視頻

【關鍵幀】
- 精準控制視頻效果變化，打造更專業、更具創意的視頻

【智慧工具箱】
-「高清修復」恢復視頻細節，讓畫面更生動
-「文字笔刷涂鸦」自訂文字，在图片上画出你的创意文字涂鸦
-「照片變漫畫」定制頭像，秒變漫畫人物
-「智能裁剪」動態捕捉，剪輯智能化
-「提詞器」口播神器
-「塗鴉錄屏」實現邊畫邊拍

【快速保存/分享】
-「保存」一鍵導出4K超高清畫質大片，更能製作趣味表情GIF
-「畫質/視頻規格」支持GIF/480p/720p/全高清1080p/超高清4K的高分辨率的視頻輸出，滿足您的需求
-「分享」輕鬆分享至微信、抖音、快手、微博等社交媒體

【小影VIP會員權益】
1. 訂閱小影VIP會員包含以下功能：去除水印、4k高清導出、去除視頻時長限製、去除廣告、視頻參數調節、動畫字幕以及所有付費視頻素材。
2. 根據您的選擇，小影VIP會員提供「月費」、「年費」兩種時間周期訂閱。
3. 根據App Store自動續約規則，小影VIP會員將在您會員過期後進行自動續約（含免費試用），除非您在小影VIP會員到期日24小時前取消。
4. 會員條款：http://rc.xiaoying.tv/web/h5template/0f88b262-0e82-4f23-89af-8551db44197b-language=zh-CN/dist/index.html
5. 隱私政策：https://rc.veresource.com/web/h5template/9b808c1d-df92-4dea-8488-0bcb41c7aca7-language=en/dist/index.html

應用名稱: 愛料理
應用描述:
美食自己做，愛料理，排名第一的食譜 App，超過 270,000 道食譜任你逛，天天都有料理新靈感！美食烹飪秘訣、圖文步驟詳解、即時問答交流，健康美食親手做，分享美味與幸福時刻。

升級愛料理 VIP ，獨享更貼心的七大服務：依熱門精選瀏覽食譜、 一週菜單、全站無廣告、了解食譜卡路里、搜尋已收藏食譜、獨家食譜、不定期超值優惠，享受更美好的料理時光。

* 快速搜尋
* 搜尋食譜名稱與食材關鍵字，找到想嘗試的美食料理，不怕食材用不完。
* VIP 獨享熱門精選，更快找到零失敗的人氣食譜。

* 圖文步驟
* 跟著詳細圖文步驟，一步步完成料理。
* VIP 獨享全站無廣告，專注料理不受干擾。

* 盡情收藏
* 輕鬆收藏喜歡的食譜，建立專屬的收藏清單，如「一週減重菜單」、「健康輕食餐」等。
* VIP 輕鬆搜尋已收藏食譜功能，收藏再多不怕找不到。

* 百大分類
* 從烤肉、焗烤、涼拌等每日菜色、到蛋糕、餅乾等人氣烘焙，輕鬆變化每日菜單。
* VIP 獨家企劃內容，人氣作者食譜結合營養師專業指南，提供「主題健康吃」、「高纖清腸」、「上班族快速料理」等內容。

* 編寫食譜
* 輕鬆編寫你的私房料理，分享美食給更多人。

* 採買提醒
* 貼心的食材採買清單與提醒功能，買菜時不漏掉任何一項食材。

* 留言互動
* 上傳跟著做的照片，分享你的試做心得
* 即時留言詢問作者，解決你的烹飪大小事

你可以付費成為愛料理 VIP，享受更貼心的服務。之後將自動每月收取費用，直到取消訂閱為止，費用將透過你的 iTunes 帳戶收取，並於每個訂閱期結束前 24 小時自動續訂，你可以隨時至 iTunes Store 取消，若未在訂閱期結束前 24 小時取消，即會自動續訂。

However, the developers changed the app so now you have to pay for "VIP" status monthly in order to sort by popularity or even just to see some of the recipes. I wouldn't have minded paying a dollar or two for the app, but I resent the idea of monthly payment as this makes it possible for developers to change the price whenever they want; if you didn't catch their notification, they could essentially start withdrawing much higher amount from your bank every month without you realizing. For such reasons I will not be using iCook anymore.

應用名稱: Adobe Acrobat Reader：PDF 編輯及簽名
應用描述:
Adobe Acrobat Reader 是世界上最受信赖的 PDF 阅读器和 PDF 编辑器，安装人数已突破 6.35 亿。查看、共享，以及为文档添加注释、评论和电子签名等功能——一应俱全。您可以随时随地联机保存和查阅文档。



**内容更新**
Adobe Fill & Sign 应用程序的各种功能现已加入 Adobe Acrobat Reader。填表、签名、发送各类表单等操作快捷可靠。您甚至可以拍下纸质表单并通过手机或平板设备进行填写，并在添加电子签名后再发送。操作流程十分简单：无需实物表单、无需打印、无需传真。


获取 7 天免费试用资格，全面体验 Acrobat Reader 的所有功能。


订阅高级会员服务后，您还可以编辑 PDF 扫描文档中的文本和图片，甚至能够使用 PDF 转换器合并或组织文档及转换 PDF 文件等等。功能多多，等您体验。


高级会员功能：


编辑 PDF
• 使用我们的 PDF 编辑器直接在 PDF 中编辑文本和图像（仅限移动设备）。
• 利用 PDF 编辑器功能修正拼写错误或添加段落。
• 轻松添加、删除或旋转图像。


利用 PDF 转换器合并和组织 PDF 文档
• 使用 PDF 转换器拆分文件或合并多个文件。
• 使用 PDF 编辑器在 PDF 文件中插入、删除、旋转、裁剪和重排页面。


创建、转换和导出 PDF 文件
• 轻松将各类文档转换为 PDF 文件——包括 Microsoft 文件、 Google Docs 和图像。
• 导出 PDF 文件并将其转换为 Microsoft Word、Excel、PowerPoint 或图像文件（jpg 和 png 等格式）。


压缩 PDF 文件 安全性高
• 压缩 PDF 文件以减小文件大小，便于保存和共享。
• 通过添加独立密码保护 PDF 文档。


立即订阅即可访问以上所有功能，跨手机和网站平台畅快体验 Acrobat。


免费功能：


查看和打印 PDF
• 使用 PDF 阅读器打开并查看 PDF。
• 选择单页或连续滚动模式。
• 可直接从您的设备打印文档。


共享 PDF 并展开协作
• 共享文件以进行评论或查看。
• 收集和回应多人在同一文档中添加的评论。
• 接收共享文件的活动通知。
• 使用 @mention 标签邀请和添加非合作者。


在 PDF 中添加注释
• 添加个性化便利贴、评论，以及高亮显示文本。
• 直接在 PDF 文档中编写和手绘内容。 
• 与他人共享文档以在同一处收集所有评论。


填写与签署表单
• 使用表单填写功能轻松填写 PDF 表单。
• 使用手指或触控笔为文档添加电子签名。


存储和管理文件
• 登录您的免费帐户，以跨设备存储和访问文件。
• 关联 Microsoft OneDrive、Dropbox、Google 云端硬盘等联机存储帐户，以访问所有文件。
• 为文件添加星标以快速打开重要文档。


PDF 阅读器关联 Google 云端硬盘
• 轻松访问 PDF 和其他文件。
• 查看、共享 Google 云端硬盘文件并为其添加星标。
• 订阅后，可创建、编辑、压缩和导出 Google 云端硬盘文件。


处理已扫描的文档
• 访问使用免费的 Adobe Scan 应用程序捕获的扫描 PDF。
• 在 Adobe Acrobat PDF 阅读器中打开扫描文档，以填写、签名、添加评论和共享。


Acrobat Reader 移动设备应用程序旨在为已启用企业移动管理 (EMM) 的用户服务。


條款與條件：
此應用程式的使用受 Adobe 一般使用條款 http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_linkfree_tw 及 Adobe 隱私條款 http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_linkfree_tw


約束 請勿販售或分享我的個人資訊 www.adobe.com/go/ca-rights-linkfree


Adobe Acrobat Reader PDF 檔案建立和編輯應用程式，讓您隨時隨地輕鬆處理文件。使用免費 Adobe PDF Reader 檢視、註解、填寫、簽署和共用 PDF 檔案。其他功能包含將 JPG 轉換成 PDF、建立和簽署可填寫的 PDF 表格，以及在共用的文件上加入您的電子簽名等。處理 PDF 檔案，從未如此輕易無比。

應用名稱: Zoom Workplace
應用描述:
Reimagine teamwork with Zoom Workplace, an AI-first, open collaboration platform that combines team chat, meetings, phone*, whiteboard, calendar, mail, docs, and more. Use Zoom Workplace for iOS with any free or paid Zoom license.

And with your Pro or Business Zoom license you have access to AI Companion woven throughout Zoom Workplace. You can get caught up quickly with a summary and key points from your unread messages, draft new content, and keep conversations focused and impactful. It’s your personal assistant across Zoom Workplace, available at no additional cost with your paid Zoom license, available wherever you are from your mobile device. 

BE MORE PRODUCTIVE ON THE GO WITH AI COMPANION* ON YOUR MOBILE DEVICE
Quickly get prepared for upcoming meetings
Have AI Companion* generate a first draft of content 
Get a summary of your unread Team Chat messages


STREAMLINE COMMUNICATIONS WITH A SINGLE APP
Schedule or join a video meeting with one tap
Chat with colleagues and external contacts
Place and receive phone calls or send SMS text messages*

IMPROVE PRODUCTIVITY
Organize and share information at scale with Zoom Docs 
Receive automated meeting summaries with AI Companion*
Brainstorm on virtual whiteboards

BOUNCE BETWEEN LOCATIONS
Move a live meeting or call seamlessly between devices with one tap
Start a Zoom Rooms meeting and share content*
Multitask with Picture in Picture on iPhone or Split View on iPad

WORK SAFELY ON THE GO
Stay focused on the road with Apple CarPlay support
Customize Siri Shortcuts for hands-free voice commands
Keep your data secure with enterprise-grade security and SSO*


* A paid Zoom Workplace subscription or other license may be required to use certain product features. Upgrade your free account today to start gaining these benefits. AI Companion may not be available for all regions and industry verticals. Some features not currently available across all regions or plans and are subject to change.

UPGRADE YOUR FREE ACCOUNT TO ZOOM WORKPLACE PRO AND GET AI COMPANION INCLUDED 
Host unlimited meetings up to 30 hours each
Record meetings to the cloud (up to 5GB)
Assign meeting co-hosts and schedulers

Your Zoom Workplace Pro subscription will automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial or the plan billing period. After you start your subscription, you can manage it from either App Store settings or iOS settings. The amount charged to the payment method in your App Store account will vary by the plan you select and your country. The plan price will be displayed before you start your free trial or confirm your purchase.

Follow us on social media @zoom

Privacy Statement: https://explore.zoom.us/privacy/

應用名稱: InstaSize AI圖片編輯照片拼圖修圖軟件圖片處理
應用描述:
Instasize 是專爲創意人士打造的圖片和影片編輯應用。我們的高級照片濾鏡、獨特邊框、拼圖功能、美顔和調整工具將幫助你輕鬆 P 出靚圖。

與 #Instasize 分享你的照片、影片，還有機會登上我們的動態哦！

免費圖片編輯器
用我們的免費圖片編輯器一鍵美化圖片。利用對比度、曝光度、飽和度、清晰度等工具提升照片的視覺效果。使用裁剪工具調整圖片尺寸，獲得適合 Instagram、TikTok 和 Snapchat 等社群媒體平台的完美圖片尺寸。

免費影片編輯器
有了我們的專業影片濾鏡和效果，毫不費力就能做出吸睛影片並隨時共享。輕鬆將影片裁剪爲適合 Instagram Stories、TikTok 和 Snapchat 等平台的尺寸並匯出。

圖片邊框
超過 100 款新穎照片和影片邊框任君選擇，完美「造」出任何風格！作爲 Instagram 邊框的鼻祖，我們深知你想要的效果。從經典白框到最潮的前衛設計，應有盡有。

照片中添加文本
超過 20 款獨特字體可選，爲照片影片畫龍點睛。可調整字體樣式、顔色、對齊和邊框，烘托出你想要的效果。

拼圖工具
我們的拼圖工具簡約易用，拼凑多張圖片從未如此簡單。上百種拼圖佈局、背景和文本任選，激發你的無限創意。

高級訂閱

成爲 Instasize 高級訂閱會員，釋放你的創意能量，訪問我們的完整濾鏡庫並尊享 130+ 款超讚濾鏡。從優雅復古風，到原始自然風，隨心所欲用濾鏡 P 出美感。我們也提供精准美顔工具，美白、美黑、祛痘等效果出眾，還有更多工具待你探索。每月更新高級會員獨享工具。

訂閱條款
Instasize 高級訂閱將自動續訂，除非用戶在當前訂閱期結束的至少 24 小時前取消訂閱。確認購買時，訂閱費用將從用戶的 iTunes 帳戶扣除。訂閱後，您可以前往「賬戶設定」頁面管理訂閱和關閉自動續訂功能。

應用名稱: Google
應用描述:
Google 應用程式在手，不論你關注什麼，都能及時獲得資訊。探索功能有助快速找出解答、深入瞭解感興趣的主題，隨時掌握最新動態。越常使用，Google 應用程式就越能掌握你的需求。

主要功能：
• 運用鏡頭辨識所見之物，無論是五彩斑斕的蝴蝶、不知名的帶刺植物，還是任何有趣的生物，都能立即揭曉。
• 遇到不懂的路標、菜單或任何外文內容時，將鏡頭對準文字就能查看翻譯；支援超過 100 種語言。
• 看到喜歡的東西時，使用相機搜尋功能即可尋找購買管道。
• 可添加文字來修正相機搜尋範圍，比如指定尋找「藍色」的同款鞋，或瞭解如何「修理」自行車的損壞部件。
• 支援用歌聲尋找歌曲，即使忘記歌詞也沒問題。只要對著 Google 應用程式哼出旋律，即可找出相符曲目。
• 讓相機成為寫作業的好幫手。觀看逐步指南和影片，學習數學、化學、生物和物理題目的解題技巧。


在探索專區查看個人化動態消息：
• 隨時掌握感興趣主題的最新資訊。
• 每天一早就能看到天氣預報和頭條新聞。
• 即時接收體育賽事、電影和各類活動的最新消息。
• 第一時間掌握喜愛藝人的新專輯情報。
• 閱讀符合個人興趣和嗜好的報導。
• 直接從搜尋結果中追蹤有趣的主題。


享有安全搜尋體驗：
• 裝置與 Google 之間的連線經過加密，確保 Google 應用程式中的所有搜尋內容安全無虞。
• 隱私權控制項不僅容易找到，而且操作簡單。輕觸個人資料相片即可存取選單，一鍵刪除帳戶中的近期搜尋記錄。
• Google 搜尋會主動過濾垃圾內容，確保使用者看到安全優質的搜尋結果。


你還可以透過下列方法使用 Google：
• Google 搜尋小工具 - 使用全新的 Google 小工具在主畫面或螢幕鎖定畫面上執行搜尋。有 2 種尺寸的小工具可以選擇，兩者皆附快速搜尋列；中型尺寸小工具也支援設定捷徑，方便選用智慧鏡頭、語音搜尋和無痕模式執行搜尋。


進一步瞭解 Google 應用程式的強大功能：http://www.google.com/search/about

隱私權政策：https://www.google.com/policies/privacy

你的意見可以幫助我們打造更讓人滿意的產品。如有意參加使用者研究，請前往：

https://goo.gl/kKQn99

評論.標題: Giant Snakes:  Anaconda’s, Boa’s, Pythons of the world
評論.內容: Great info-one of the most few who show correct information on snakes.  Only suggestion is the Indian Rock python of central Asia.  It rarely attains a length of 12 feet in length  although ,  15’ is  a possibility .  Python m molurus was called the Light Phase and the Burmese Python was called the dark phase Indian Python.  Another sub species , Python m pimbura, from Sir Lanka -previously the island nation of Ceylon, is almost identicacl to the Python m molurus.  Difference is in length and girth, where pimbura is brighter in color, more defind in colour of pattern on skin, with the head being more reddish in nature.  I believe that this snake-once thought to be a separate species will soon be included in being the same species.

應用名稱: Remini - AI Photo Enhancer
應用描述:
輕輕一按，即可將老舊模糊的照片變成漂亮、清晰的高清影像，就像魔術一樣！

Remini 可將顆粒粗糙、像素低、損壞、解析度差的照片煥然一新。看看它們清晰銳利的高清畫質，怎麼呈現出令人驚艷的效果吧。

至今已有超過 1 億張的照片重獲新生。Remini 是一款廣泛使用的照片優化應用程式。

修復父母的古董相簿來讓他們開心。Remini 絕佳的電影等級 AI 技術會處理所有困難的作業。您可以一起享受成果。

-------- 使用 Remini …… --------
• 將臉部照片轉為高清畫質
• 將日常人像照和自拍照優化為網紅風格的驚艷影像
• 修復老舊 / 模糊 / 刮傷的照片
• 用前後比較來製作值得分享的爆紅貼文

• 全部皆以先進的 AI 技術完成
• 更多精彩功能籌備中！

本 App 具備以下語言的版本：英語、印度語、日語、韓語、葡萄牙語、俄語、簡體和繁體中文、西班牙語，以及泰語。

評論.標題: Really good but not entirely reliable
評論.內容:
This is the premium AI platform that I have used (others tried Copilot Pro, ChatGPT Plus, Perplexity Pro, and Grok on X thus far, and various models on Poe) that is the most advanced in terms of feature set and utility. There’s a lot that it can (sometimes try to) do. Real-time Internet search capability and ability to ingest private data directly is where this bot platform really excels. As my previous sentence alluded to, however, it also has been the most unreliable in terms of availability.

I frequently get issues where a chat prompt or multi step task fails to complete or times out. Sometimes errors are returned that are API related. Sometimes the app is waiting for a response forever as there doesn’t seem to be a local timeout to make the prompt error out after a long time of waiting for a response. It just spins or shows a loading animation of some sort forever. I’ve seen this behavior across their other apps like for desktop and in a web browser so I don’t believe the issues I am seeing are localized to the iOS app. During the times Monica doesn’t respond or errors out, the other third party AI services I mentioned previously all work fine so I know I don’t have a general Internet connectivity issue. This is across multiple Internet connections as well including cellular. Sometimes connecting to a distant VPN server can fix the issue which I am guessing implicates that there is geographical load balancing going on where an issue for one region doesn’t impact the other because they are in separate geographical regions.

If the Monica team can fix these sporadic system or connectivity failures to make the platform more stable across various Monica user interfaces, then my review would be all 5 stars.

評論.標題: DO NOT DOWNLOAD WILL NOT LET YOU CANCEL
評論.內容: SCAM!!!!! I downloaded the app and selected the free 7-day trial. It said I would get 30 free credits and did not get them. I was going to use the app for hair AI which said it requires no credits. So I got into the hair AI and guess what?! You need credits. Two lies so far. So I went to cancel it right away because it did not have the feature I wanted at a reasonable price (credits are separate from the member ship and not only are they required for EVERYTHING you do, but they are EXPENSIVE) and you do not get many). Apparently they charge you through a third party in which I do not have an account. It does not show up under Apple subscriptions due to this third party and there is no way to cancel through the app directly. I have since seen past reviews that say the same thing, with some people going into their third year being charged after they have attempted to contact the company multiple times. Looks like it is time for an attorney because it is misleading and against the law to say that it is free and you can cancel anytime, yet they provide no way to do that. I have screen shot every interaction I have had with this app and they will be sued if they touch my bank account. Bottom line, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!

There’s no way to change the true size of an image. You cannot measure the pixels you cannot measure the length and width of a photo on a mobile device. What this app can do for mobile you can get for free and dozens of other applications! UPDATE: I wish I could give the developer zero stars after their response. These people actually just wrote that I could use the crop feature to resize a photo. Well OBVIOUSLY. If you want to JUST CROP, you can do that with any app! That’s trimming and removing part of the photo! I’m talking about changing the true size of a FINISHED IMAGE and NOT ALTERING THE CONTENT OF THE IMAGE! OR - being able to create and image or image collage INSIDE OF CERTAIN SET OF DIMENSIONS!! You cannot do that with this app! AS I ORIGINALLY WROTE- BASIC TOOLS ONLY! That you can get in other places for FREE!!

評論.標題: TAKING the reservation is the easy part...
評論.內容:
“HOLDING the reservation” is the point, as Seinfeld said. Similarly, buying a subscription is easy, but USING the subscription requires BUYING THE TOOLS TO USE IT — while USING it is the point... 

Unfortunately, such “scams” (as another user pointed out)—perhaps especially with Microsoft and Adobe, the latter of which has been honing their system for the past decade—indicate a burgeoning wave of such “subscriptions” and other fees to “use” (piecemeal parts of) apps (and games) that we’ve already bought, without any features, leaving the “subscriber” to buy add-ons in or to use the app/subscription.

However, WITHOUT OUR SUPPORT—as with gambling boxes and leasing ready-made DLC (sometimes already on the Ubisoft disc you’d bought, which means you’re leasing second key to the content you’ve already bought but don’t have the right to use)—“MONETIZATION STRUCTURES” like this (PR-speak for “how to use psychological insights to chip ever more money from consumers”) SIMPLY CAN’T MAKE IT. SO, if you’d not like to help make such bait-and-switch tactics the order of the day, *don’t give the people who would use it to do so the money to make it happen.*

Meantime, I’ll be happy to feedback about opening performance and interface if the developer agrees to buy it from before having any idea what I’m charging or how much I have to say about it. Doing so might raise the score, as a function of my score for how much I may have liked those parts, averaged in with my review, so far, about the way it’s sold...

I didn’t authorize this purchase… I contacted Apple & told them this subscription was done by a minor without my permission. After explaining, they told me I wasn’t eligible for a refund but I could dispute their decision. 

I explained again I didn’t authorize the transaction, this charge was done by a minor without my permission. Their response again was that I was not eligible for a refund and that their decision was final. 

Trying to dispute the charge with my credit card, AE said per Apple’s policy they are unable to investigate the charge and to contact Apple directly. 

So, the lesson is don’t put your credit card in your apple wallet… or if you really hate someone you can borrow their phone & download a bunch of apps so they’ll be stuck with the bill because Apple won’t help you at all.

應用名稱: Airbnb
應用描述:
與Airbnb一起踏上難忘之旅。不管是在家附近或遙遠異地，都能找到您的精彩旅程。Airbnb帶您入住獨特房源、享受精彩體驗、看盡世界風景。您可以透過Airbnb預訂旅程中所需的一切，或在Airbnb上出租房源、舉辦體驗賺取收入。

預訂房源
700多萬個度假屋，遍布191個國家／地區，任您挑選。 依價格、街區、設備與服務等條件進行搜尋。

預訂體驗
參加當地達人舉辦的體驗，體驗時間長則多日，短則只需一個下午，方便您依照自己的旅程規劃安排。您可以探索首爾的地下音樂圈、在托斯卡尼森林裡採集松露，或透過社會服務體驗回饋社區。

預訂餐廳
在Airbnb應用程式中直接搜尋預訂Resy精選的美國熱門餐廳。（僅限美國用戶使用）

用戶可以：
•為下一次獨自出遊、家庭假期或商務差旅預訂住宿及體驗
•搜尋晚鳥住宿或長期租屋
•儲存您最愛的房源、體驗和目的地，邀請親友與您一同規劃旅程
•提前或現場預訂熱門餐廳（僅限美國用戶使用）
•新增體驗和活動到您的行程表
•傳送訊息給您的房東，了解前往房源的路線

房東或體驗達人可以：
•分享家中的閒置空間，或選擇舉辦體驗，與世界分享您城市的獨有特色
•輕鬆更新房源和日曆的可訂狀態
•在房東指南中分享附近區域的特色或景點
•發送訊息給房客與管理預訂

評論.標題: Terrible customer service for hosts and guests
評論.內容: The app itself is good. However, it has become extremely sad and terrible being a host on Airbnb due to their policies and mediocre customer service.

We had an awful experience renting a house for our wedding. We left our bags the last day of our stay and headed out to marriage registry. When we came back to pick up the bags, the house was locked with our bags in it and the host who was in the US, called me and in a rude, offensive manner claimed that we stole his small tv and a fan from the ceiling. A nonsense. We called AirBnb and asked them what we should do. After waiting a couple of ours in front of the house we entered it from the back, the house keeper left the back door open, likely intentionally. We got our bags, noticed missing bottle of Moet, sunglasses. When we called the host and explained that all the things were in place, he started asking for an extra day payment as we entered his house. He again was using offensive words.
After I explained everything to airbnb and provided pictures, they reviewed the case within 2-3 days. After which they blocked my account 😊
Crazy story on my wedding day. I do not wish anyone such experience.
The search filter doesnt work! I want whole homes, not lofts and apartments. Stop feeding me the wrong things.

評論.標題: 酷いカスタマーサービス
評論.內容:
最悪なホストに最悪なカスタマーサービス。
知人と宿泊した家は明らかに欠陥があったのに、それを自分達の責任と決め付けられました。
特に誰かの家などに滞在する場合は水回りに気をつけて下さいね。
次の被害者が出ることは確実です。
もう2度とこのサービスは利用しません。
ホテルの方が断然素晴らしい。
Please I would like to suggest if there’d be a way to add bank accounts as payment method

評論.標題: Software errors lead to rapid price increases
評論.內容: I attempted to add a new credit card on my iPad, but AirBnB would neither accept it nor provide any errors. So I moved to my phone, where I could add it successfully. However, in the few short minutes I did that, the price went up by about 20%. I wonder if the software errors were by design? Hmmmm…..
This app can’t be trust especially when you need to make last minute booking. It will literally cancels your reservation whilst you and the host already set up. Also take days to get your refund back
The app wouldn’t let me get a full home for some reason and the customer service is horrible. This will not be my go to app for Airbnb.

If you want Airbnb to take money out your account without your consent before even hearing your side of the story, then by all means, go through them. I will never use their services again. Worst experience of my life.
Company values profit over any kind of user experience. Horrible customer service.

評論.評論者: don't want to choose a nickname
評論.標題: AirBnB provides no help to 5 star host
評論.內容: On Airbnb, I offered my house up to people avoiding the fires in LA at a greatly discounted rate. I got a request from someone who said that she and her fiancé wanted to come visit her in-laws. Airbnb had a very discounted rate for their stay and said they were waiving their fees, but they did not explain why. I thought Airbnb should give me a little bit more information about this situation, So I contacted Airbnb. I spoke to two people who were totally unable to help me. I was told that a third person was going to call me. They never called me. I’m thinking about switching to Vrbo because I think that Airbnb should be way more responsive to a five star host. From my perspective, Airbnb is a big liar. Be forewarned

Unresponsive customer service, hosts are allowed to lie about what their property looks like and distort the photos making it look like a nice place. When you complain Airbnb sends you on an infinite loop with a call center that is designed to never give you your money back. I WILL NEVER STAY IN AN AIRBNB AGAIN AND I WILL NEVER LIST A RENTAL WITH AIRBNB.

I’m am in absolute disbelief how horrible this app is run. I was hoping on having a girls weekend in the mountains and was approved previously for a different cabin. Unfortunately I had two extra guests that wanted to attend as well so I asked the host if she could accommodate, which she could not. That was no problem so I decided to cancel and get a bigger Airbnb to fix the problem. For starters, they only gave me a partial refund so kept almost $300 from me when trying to get a new Airbnb. Then they only have options for a refund, either wait 15 business days to get a refund or keep the money in the account and use it right away so I decided to do that so I could book an Airbnb as soon as possible since my trip was in a week away. When I tried to do so I kept getting an error message saying I’m suspected of throwing a party. Which I am 100% not I just have a large larger group of people. Our intentions were to hot tub and go sledding, Nothing more. No matter how many times I tried I would always get this error message so I decided to call Airbnb. When I did so not only did they tell me my account would be blocked from being able to get an Airbnb for a month, they also told me they wouldn’t be able to transfer my $400 to me and it would be stuck in an app that I can’t use. They also said it’s an automated thing and happens all the time so beware if you’re trying to book something in a rush you could be banned for a month randomly. Their attempt to remedy the problem was that I could use my $400 stuck in the account to get a hotel room. What hotel room would fit 10 people? So they won’t give me my money back and they won’t give me the Airbnb. Absolutely horrible customer service do not recommend.

I did the whole ID check and have even stayed at one or two Airbnbs in the past but never was given a review of my stay. I don’t leave a review either but each stay was decent. For the past year or two though now. The owners always stay because I don’t have reviews and haven’t left reviews they won’t provide stay. So currently deleting app after this review.

No consequences whatsoever for hosts who cancel on you at the last second. You can’t even leave a review. This isn’t some isolated situation where an emergency comes up and they can’t host, it’s a widespread strategy to maximize their profit by hosting on multiple sites and seeing if they can get better rates. 

Until Airbnb institutes even a tiny countermeasure to host fraud, it will never be a service you can plan around with confidence.
Can’t find and book anything from mobile app due to recent redesign that has lost its desktop like ability to filter for houses/rooms, hot tubs and swimming pools etc.
Host failed to check me in on time so I went to rent a hotel near by Airbnb did not return my money I’m deleting this app immediately

I made a reservation and then I requested a rescheduling. The host approved the rescheduling and I paid the difference. But then the host said they did not get the money and referred me to Airbnb. After calling them multiple times and showing them the screenshots from the emails confirming the host approval and the payment, they refused what I said. Then I asked for cancellation they said they won’t refund me at all!
I am totally disappointed and will never use Airbnb again!
I hate it that you can’t cancel even a day after you make the booking. That’s why hotels are much better.

評論.標題: Another reason to stay at hotels
評論.內容:
We booked at house in Kansas for the Chief wild card game. We chose our first option; it was approved and paid for with confirmation. 

To our surprise the host canceled, stating that the current guests were going to extend their stay. They accepted and took our payment and all they could say was sorry. According, to Airbnb hosts are allowed to advertise and then select which option is better for them and not the end user. Meaning they can run two booking scams and screw people over. 

When we attempt to go with our second option. The price had gone up by $50-100 as a whole to market to the Wild Card Game. Supply and demand. 

This is one of my grievances with Airbnb and the host. In our last stay; the host continued to watch us through the ring doorbell. Likewise, after we booked that house; she posted a two-page rule book of; “Don't do this or that. “ She continued to state that this was their house and guests would be charged an astronomical amount of money should we break anything. It was like staying at your grandparent's house in the 80s that had plastic on everything.  

I can go on and on - the host needs to disclose everything before accepting a request to stay. 

Respectfully, 

Staying at a hotel rather than staying at an Airbnb

評論.標題: It’s amizing don’t listen to them
評論.內容: Owner please listen your app is amazing but we have been robed

評論.標題: Fraudulent hosts no help from Airbnb
評論.內容:
An accidental booking while scrolling on the app is costing my family over $3200. We cancelled immediately and were only provided a partial refund of the full price which was just under $6000 for the dates we were researching at the time. The host claims they don’t have the authority to refund, Airbnb claims to be helpless in this situation, there is no contact information provided to us to work directly with the owner. It has been 4 days of high stress and talking in circles with no remedy. DO NOT USE THIS APP!! Airbnb and their host has basically stolen over $3200 from us for a mistaken booking that lasted a few minutes at most- we received no services and the dates we were looking at were still out more than 10 days. 
I will update if Airbnb steps up to  remedy this situation, if not we’ll be looking into legal action.

I’ve had airbnb for years now. My profile has booked over 25 airbnb’s with zero complaints and all 5 star reviews. They removed my account for no reason. I’ve called them numerous times and no one understands what’s going on.

評論.標題: Support staff is of little to no help.
評論.內容: Great concept, support staff is non-functional. Switching to Vrbo.

I have been using Air b&b for 4 years. I recently booked a trip for New Year’s Eve. I have an amazing record and have never caused damage or been a nuisance. Their system automatically banned my account thinking that I was throwing a party. I called tech support and they said they couldn’t help me. 

I recently started using Vrbo, which has been a much much better experience so far.

評論.標題: Not to be trusted, terrible data protection
評論.內容: My account was hacked and the details changed to someone else. I caught it almost immediately and it took two days to get it reversed. Now Airbnb won’t tell me what happened, the contact info belongs to someone I know who didn’t do it and Airbnb only sends inaccurate copy pastas as a response. I called, they said they’d investigate and call me back and never did, they close the cases without responding. And now to why the app gets one star, it’s insanely difficult to navigate the conversations in the app due to the UI. I’ve had this account for probably a decade and I don’t think I will be using Airbnb ever again now that I’ve learned their true (shady) character

評論.標題: Will never use it for travel again
評論.內容:
My first Airbnb experience was awful. The host was super friendly before and during my stay, likely to secure a good review. But right after the review period ended, they turned around and made an unreasonable claim for extra cleaning fees. Their evidence was weak and exaggerated, yet Airbnb didn’t help resolve the issue at all.

It’s clear the system favors hosts, leaving guests unprotected against unfair claims. This has completely ruined my trust in Airbnb.
Travel insurance is a fraud. It’s advertised as covering flight delays/cancelations. I have had horrible experience with this app and trying to get a refund.

評論.標題: super lame if you are under 21
評論.內容: Good luck trying to book something between the ages of 18-20. It will stop me anytime I try to book something because I get flagged for “trying to throw a party” or something, which is absolutely diabolical. I’m not a party person at all, but good luck trying to convince their support staff that. If you are 18 and older but under 21, you’re better off getting a hotel. Super lame.

評論.標題: Terrrible customer service against a 14 year host.
評論.內容:
Airbnb will not call you or warn you for anything. They will just cancel a reservation without even seeing proof from your side. 

I lost 1600$ because of this. Very unfair , very disappointing .

評論.標題: Air bnb is charging $729 for things I am not responsible for
評論.內容: I stayed at a place for 6 nights and everything was going just fine. Until the host submitted a reimbursement request. She claimed I had inflicted damages to things that i am not responsible for at all. After days and weeks dodgy phone calls with support on the issue. They told me that Air bnb will automatically WITHDRAW $729 out of my account. This to me is absolutely criminal and is a total ROBBERY. This is how Airbnb treats repeat customers. It’s just another company run by corporate greed.

The filter button is missing from the landing page. This makes it difficult to ensure entire home is selected. We got to a place once and discovered it wasn’t the entire home and were very uncomfortable so it is important that this filter is available from the start.

I travel a lot so I decided to use the service this company provides. I booked a property that was falsely advertised. Upon arrival I quickly realized it was not remotely close to what was advertised. I left 15 minutes later. Being the busy person I am, I never got around to review the property and the host. I didn’t get a refund which I had no problem with but they wanted to charge me extra for supposed “damage fees” claiming I had smoked in the property. The host left a review that doesn’t speak well of me and they refuse to remove it or investigate it. For that reason I am done with this service.
Heartless, disgusting customer “support”! Avoid this crappy company and app!!!

Airbnb really did me wrong.  They don’t give a care in the world for anything except their bottom line. When things are going well Airbnb is great.  But when you have issues they become hard to understand, hard to get ahold of, and hardest of all to deal with.  I’ve had Airbnb support lie to me on numerous occasions.  I’m looking into options so I don’t have to go through Airbnb anymore.
For a huge platform, the messaging feature is absolutely a mess. Scrolling is choppy, and photos are low resolution, messages don’t refresh until you re-open the app. Honestly, how is this passable?

I had the worst nightmare staying with an illegal listing in London over the summer for 4 weeks, which I paid over $8K to only find out the “owner” of the property was subleasing the flat and were months behind his rent payment. My wife and I later found out the property clearly didn’t allow any forms of Airbnb via onsite property managers but Airbnb support team treated me like it’s none of their business after multiple attempts asking for termination of our stay.   We were so close to press legal action on this particular case.  However, we found out Airbnb granted their host all the power in determination of the situation vs. consumers were left in the open to be slaughtered.Thanks for ruining my trip and overall impression of another country Airbnb. Absolutely 100% churned from the platform and would encourage anyone else who is planning to use the service to exhaust all other options before proceeding.

I highly recommend Airbnb for its exceptional platform that allows users to explore and discover accommodations that best suit their preferences. If any issues arise, Airbnb's customer support is responsive and dedicated to resolving concerns. Some hosts on the platform are incredibly welcoming, providing a positive experience that deserves a 5/5 rating. Overall, my experience has been highly satisfactory.

評論.標題: This company should be sued into the ground.
評論.內容: Been seeing lots of complaints that they won’t let people cancel reservations that are IN THE PATH OF THE LA WILDFIRES! They would rather see people burn to death than get a refund. They have done this same thing for other natural disasters like hurricanes.

評論.標題: Multiple Cancellations & Issues with Customer Service
評論.內容: I have never had such issues booking with Airbnb. I had to book THREE different airbnbs after getting cancelled twice. My friend and I booked over a month in advance and even attempted to confirm, in writing, our bookings and still experienced these issues. Customer service was called and they were totally unhelpful. Promised to call back about the issue and to establish reimbursement, to which they never did. Fortunately, was still able to get a refund, but an absolute mess all around. Will consider using other companies in the future.

They deny ANY refund or EVEN store credit, all because of their return policy, so convenient. I booked a room in LA and literally opened news 10min after to realize that there’s a wildfire very close to the place, I reached out to CS and straight ahead asked for store credit to avoid the pain of full refund and said I will just rebook something in downtown, further away from the danger, got slapped in the face and now ignored in the chat. The platform doesn’t even shy from showing zero respect to its clients. I’ll be using any other service out there just to avoid these greedy people. How convenient, right? I asked for it right away, but no sense of urgency or trying to make the situation better.

Worst travel app ever invented. Hosts don’t have to tell you they live in the same place they rent out to you. Then hosts just try to charge you for anything extra they can and when you tell them no they ban your account. Never use this app. My advice create a Hilton or Marriott account.

Had two horrible monthly stay experiences, by two different host! Back to back in Texas.  
One unit was filled with cockroaches & Big Spiders & other bugs.   I didn’t get a full refund. 
Then the next one I booked to leave that one, I ended up in A “Low income” rough apartment unit.  I felt very unsafe staying there alone, the men that lived in the apartment area aka neighbors kept “checking me out” while I was moving my stuff in. 
I felt unsafe or that my car would be broken into. 
I called Air bnb right when I got there and tried to get them to let me have a refund so I could find somewhere else to stay.  I also cried to the host to give me a refund or let me change to there other rentals.  They said no at first. Then said it would be an EXTRA $2,400 on top of the $2,200 I Already Paid!! 
It was a Horrible experience.  Air bnb has lost a lot of my future business.  Thanks for the no help. A holes.

評論.標題: Don’t trust your bill, they will always add to it even after your stay
評論.內容: After our stay we got a message from the host stating she never added the pet fee to our stay . Something I made her aware of on our very first messaged before she reviewed and processed the booking. After the stay all of a sudden there’s more fees to add . Two days later and customer service only response is out of a booklet. Terrible customer service even worst money hungry hosts . Stay clear and save yourself a headache of having to pay a bill, more fees and a huge cleaning fee which includes you having you cleans up the property as well

應用名稱: Picsart美易 - 照片 & 影片編輯
應用描述:
加入在全世界擁有1.5億創作者的Picsart社區。使用Picsart照片編輯器和視頻編輯器，將您的創意變為現實。製作專業水準的拼貼畫、設計並添加貼紙、快速移除和更換背景，體驗流行編輯，比如 黃金時刻、鏡中自拍、復古噪點濾鏡或千禧濾鏡。 Picsart是您的首選一體式編輯器，擁有眾多工具，讓您的內容獨具特色，脫穎而出

Picsart 功能：

照片編輯器
• 體驗潮流濾鏡及流行特效

• 使用刪除工具清理圖片，移除多餘對象
• 使用海量精選的自由編輯圖像或編輯自己的圖片
• 200多種設計字體為照片添加創意文字
• 換髮色、美妝貼紙等功能修飾自拍
• 使用人工智能選擇工具模糊背景
• 快速翻轉並剪裁照片
• 給照片添加貼紙，還可以創作屬於自己的貼紙

視頻編輯器
• 使用帶有音樂的便捷視頻編輯器，製作和編輯視頻

• 使用海量視頻編輯器音樂庫，將音樂添加到視頻

• 體驗視頻編輯器中的故障視頻特效和其他潮流濾鏡
• 調整視頻或使用智能視頻合併工具混合視頻
• 使用帶有音樂的幻燈片製作器進行設計
• 將您的最佳瞬間添加到視頻剪輯中

拼貼畫編輯工具
• 用您最愛的照片製作潮流照片拼貼畫
• 嘗試照片網格拼圖、自由拼圖、剪貼簿以及圖片畫框
• 使用超火表情包編輯器，與朋友一起分享
• 使用故事圖片製作器和故事海報模板，讓您的Instagram照片與眾不同

貼紙製作器+免費貼紙
• 發現6000多萬種Picsart貼紙
• 給圖片添加貼紙，讓您的編輯趣味無窮
• 免費下載任意貼紙，即刻使用
• 製作專屬剪貼畫，創作獨特個性化貼紙

照片特效和濾鏡
• 使用流行線條畫特效勾勒自拍
• 使用拼臉特效，將自拍變為藝術大片
• 使用水滴特效貼紙製作水滴藝術，自定義混合模式
• 使用超讚魔法特效分分鐘讓您變得卡通可愛

繪畫工具
• 使用帶有可自定義筆刷、圖層以及專業繪畫工具的繪畫功能
• 在圖片上塗鴉，創作透明服飾特效
• 使用空白畫布開始創作藝術畫作之旅
• 玩轉塗鴉藝術，隨意塗鴉

模板
• 只需點擊幾下即可重新創作潮流編輯。使用簡易個性化步驟，編輯時間縮減一半
• 編輯多張風格相同的圖片。
• 通過創建個人預設，讓您的IG推送保持潮流在線

Picsart Gold會員
• Picsart會員訂閱允許始終訪問新上線的獨家內容。獲得所有頂級功能，體驗無廣告編輯。

評論.標題: Locked me out for no reason.
評論.內容: I would say this is the perfect app for editing photos, however there have been multiple times I have created an account. Just to come back and try to log in with an error message. I’m still being charged for the subscription. This is the second time this has happened however now it seems it is just going to keep showing an error when I try to log in. I deleted the app
Way more choices than before!
So fun and cool

So, About CapCut I got a notification that you guys are the new capcut if you guys can’t make us edit videos? CapCut was like my tiktok ( bc I can’t have TikTok) and you guys are disrespecting capcut for being banned. Wow Picsart wow

評論.標題: Eternal sugar cookies and candy apple cookie’s 1#FAN!1!1!1!
評論.內容: guys this apps is so coolz im so gonna tell shadow milk and eternal sugar🤭🤭

評論.標題: Will not save a video if your life depended on it
評論.內容: If you are looking for a high quality video editing platform to create things to come back and get back to, this is not the app for you. Spent 3 hours working on a project, decided to take a quick break, clicked !SAVE VIDEO! And I come back and it’s no where to be found. Extremely upsetting, but I decided to give it another chance. Work on it again for another few hours and go to save it, APP LAGGS OUT INSTEAD OF SAVING VIDEO and once again the video is no where to be found in my files. Extremely frustrating, many features that require payment, and clearly not a very high quality app. Multiple hours on this thing, even got the free trial to give it a shot, don’t waste your time on it as I have nothing to show for it other than wasted time.

評論.標題: What happend to all of it?
評論.內容: Honestly I love this app, love making little collages and trying things out with the edits. Something is greatly noticed recently is literally 99% of the stickers are for picsart plus ONLY. Can we get a little bit more freedom back? Damn…
A+ App!

Reloaded the app to make it less laggier but instead I was met with having to sign in in order to see my project which I’d spent 2 hours on. After signing in, I didn’t even get it back. Not reliable for people striving for YouTube, i don’t know otherwise.

NEW UPDATE: found my projects, met constantly with “failed to load project.” How great.
Me encanta usar Picsart
this app is horrible you have to pay for everything so you can’t even edit an actual picture without buying a membership
Really good idea who ever made this app did a good job I like it
It's so amazing and me and my friends love doing edits with this and we just love it

評論.內容: I downloaded this app js for fun, and I did the normal, yk, put my ig, made my profile and so on. I made a project, and i bent it the text because i didnt realize that my subscription  expired, and it made my project plus? and also, literally everything needs pro or plus? like.. But thats it
I love it

Not so slay fun at the moment but then is a little bit bad but it is ok sum adds idk why my bros have no adds but it ok not as good as TikTok and CapCut

It’s very fun but I wish you could have all the stickers not plus and it’s cool I can post stuff on my YouTube channel check it out (my YouTube channel) =Niy,Nizzle

評論.內容: Now this isn't a video editing app, which is fine. But making me PAY to get my voice in a video is insane. This is not replacing capcut.
Download!!!

應用名稱: B612 Camera&Photo/Video Editor
應用描述:
B612是最棒的All in one相機&照片/影片編輯應用程式。免費提供各種功能與道具，讓你的每一刻變得更特別。
快來體驗每天更新的人氣效果、濾鏡、貼圖!

=== 主要功能 ===

*親自動手製作的濾鏡*
- 製作世上獨一無二的濾鏡，和朋友們一起分享。
- 第一次製作濾鏡也沒關係，只要輕觸幾次就可輕鬆完成濾鏡。
- 體驗B612創作者們充滿創意的各種濾鏡。


*更智慧的CAMERA*
套用即時濾鏡與美肌，讓每個瞬間都是最美的時刻。

- 別錯過每天更新的AR效果與季節限定人氣濾鏡。
- 智慧美肌 : 最適合自己的臉型，製作最適合自己的美肌效果。
- AR彩妝 : 無論是日常生活還是人氣彩妝，打造最自然的妝感。同時使用美肌與彩妝，尋找最適合自己的風格。
- 利用高清模式與夜間模式，隨時隨地拍出清晰美照。 
- 使用動圖功能保存有趣的時刻。製作gif後與好友們分享，快樂加倍!
- 超過500種音樂，讓你無論在拍攝影片還是編輯都能輕鬆打造你的日常MV。
- 在我的影片中擷取音源，即可做為自己的音源使用音樂。


*ALL-IN-ONE PRO編輯功能*
免費體驗基礎、專業級的道具

- 各式各樣的濾鏡 & 效果：無論是復古風或是感性風格！打造想要演繹的風格。
- 進階補色：使用強調細節的專業級曲線、分割色調、HSL等道具，精準調色。 
- 更自然的人物修圖：利用美肌效果、修飾身形、變更髮色等打造人生美照。
- 編輯影片：人氣效果與各種音樂，人人皆可輕鬆編輯影片。
- 留白與裁切：調整喜歡的大小與比例，完成最適合上傳SNS的照片。
- 貼圖 & 文字：使用各種貼圖與文字編輯照片！也可製作我的專屬貼圖。


[B612 VIP]
訂閱B612 VIP後，將向App Store帳戶請款。將於目前訂閱時間截止前24小時進行更新，並向帳戶請款。購買後可於App Store設定隨時解除自動更新，目前B612 VIP訂閱費用是每月$3.99 USD。金額以美金為準，美國以外國家金額可能有所不同，可未經公告進行變更。即便不訂閱B612 VIP，也可持續免費使用B612。

- 服務條款: https://terms.snow.me/B612/TermsOfUse
- 免費服務使用條款: https://terms.snow.me/B612/paidservice
- 隱私權政策: https://terms.snow.me/B612/PrivacyPolicy

應用名稱: AI Mirror: 藝術圖片創作與AI擁抱視頻編輯器
應用描述:
AI Mirror 是一款先進的 AI 照片編輯和影片創作應用，提供多種AI濾鏡和豐富的風格轉換效果，適用於圖片和影片。我們可以將您的照片變成動畫、漫畫、遊戲角色以及素描畫風格。無論您是想創造病毒式傳播的內容、個性化頭像，還是與親人朋友創造珍貴回憶，AI Mirror 都能滿足您的需求。我們的亮點功能之一是「圖片轉影片」轉換，不僅能讓照片栩栩如生，還能創作出目前全球流行的 AI 擁抱特效。新年伊始，AI Mirror 為您預測 2025 年旅程，為您揭示未來的無限可能。
﻿
探索最新功能：
- AI 算命師：期待馬上到來的2025嗎？AI Mirror 變身成為您的算命先生！從職業發展預測到可能出現的浪漫驚喜、生活轉折？或者今年你可能養什麼寵物？立即上傳您的照片，讓 AI Mirror 揭開新年運勢，探索未來為您準備的驚喜吧！
﻿
AI Mirror，無限創意！
- Cosplay：使用創意濾鏡化身標誌性角色－成為調皮的小丑、詭異的骷髏或神秘的巫師。
- 動漫照片編輯器：透過AI動漫生成器將您的照片帶入二次元世界，探索多種風格，如靈動之風、童話公主或手繪素描效果。
- 漫畫濾鏡與卡通頭像：通過我們特色的照片編輯器，將您的照片變成超級英雄漫畫或卡通形象。透過卡通生成器，讓自拍照和團體照片更有創意，捕捉每個珍貴時刻。
- 遊戲角色產生器：瞬間將照片變成遊戲中的NPC角色！探索復古英雄、賽博龐克冒險者、黑色偵探或沙盒世界中的方塊角色等多種風格。將您鍾愛的遊戲角色化作現實，盡情釋放想像力！
﻿
AI 影片：
- 魔法動態照片：讓普通照片煥發生命力！我們的AI可以將您的靜態圖片轉化為動態形象，為珍貴回憶增添更加深厚的情感。
- AI 擁抱與親吻：上傳兩張單人照片即可產生逼真的虛擬互動，例如溫暖的擁抱或甜蜜的親吻。透過AI動畫，體驗情感超越時空連結的神奇時刻。
- 風格化影片：以驚豔的藝術風格重新詮釋您的影片。應用獨特濾鏡，將您的影片轉化為與眾不同的動畫風格化作品。
﻿
AI 工具：
- AI 魔法筆刷：只需輕輕一筆，即可將照片的任何區域變成驚豔的視覺效果。
- AI 照片增強器：提升照片質量，為每一張照片增添清晰度。
- AI 橡皮擦：輕鬆移除照片中不需要的元素。
﻿
AI 照片功能：
- 在DIY Lab中體驗多種風格與角色扮演，探索無盡的創意可能性！從LinkedIn專業頭像到度假穿搭、街拍和模特兒照片，您的創意將沒有邊界限制。
﻿
社群與靈感：
- 加入我們的Discord社區，不僅有 AI Mirror 的定期更新通知與靈感創意，更有同好一起交流探索更加豐富多元的風格與主題！多元靈感一起碰撞火花，讓創作變得如此簡單有趣。

評論.標題: Try free button isn’t actually free
評論.內容: I understand that most companies want to make as much money as possible but it’s a bit frustrating when almost all the filters requiere payment for usage. I’m not the type to blindly pay for a subscription, especially for apps. What’s the point of labeling a button “Try Free” when the options that follow it are pay weekly for $4.99 or yearly for $39.99. Do you people not understand the meaning behind the word “free”? The definition of the word “free” is without cost or payment. A daily filter test that recharges every 24h, where you can use the filter once, maybe even twice just to see if you like the filter and are willing to pay for it. That’s free. Viewing a 1-2 minute ad so that you’re able to see the finished image. That’s free. Suggesting I do a weekly payment or a yearly one after I select the option of “Try Free” is not free. It’s misleading. Either actually make it so the “Try Free” button gives the option to view the content without any sort of monetary payment. Or change the button to say “Pay To View”.

應用名稱: Facebook
應用描述:
這裡有真人驅動您的好奇心。不論您要節省裝備、向取得裝備的團體展示連續短片，還是透過經過 AI 改造的趣味圖片散發歡樂，Facebook 都能幫助您實現目標，其他社群網絡難以望其項背。


探索和拓展您的興趣：
* 要求 Meta AI 搜尋您重視的主題，並取得比純文字更具互動性的即時結果
* 逛逛 Marketplace，查看有哪些優惠和隱藏優質資源可以培養嗜好
* 個人化動態消息，顯示更多自己想看到的內容，反之亦然
* 深入瀏覽連續短片和影片，取得各種操作教學或快速娛樂內容

與用戶和社群交流互動：
* 加入群組，學習前人的技巧
* 開啟分享內容到 Instagram 的功能，節省寶貴時間
* 透過私密訊息傳送只有摯友才能取得，或是大家都在談論 Reels 趨勢的相關帖子

分享自己的世界：
* 使用生成式 AI，以自訂圖像取悅朋友，或是直接取得撰寫帖子方面的協助
* 自訂個人檔案，選擇要展示的資訊和帖子的顯示對象
* 透過一整套的編輯工具，輕鬆運用人氣範本製作連續短片，或是展現您的創意
* 透過限時動態即時捕捉精彩時刻

Facebook has become a platform that prioritizes profit over user well-being. The algorithm is designed to manipulate engagement by promoting divisive content, fueling political interference, and amplifying misinformation. It’s no secret that Meta has played a role in shaping public opinion through algorithmic bias and opaque content moderation policies.

Beyond that, Facebook continuously disregards user privacy, harvesting vast amounts of personal data and selling it to advertisers and third parties without meaningful transparency. The platform’s repeated scandals—ranging from Cambridge Analytica to hidden tracking—prove they don’t value user trust.

If you care about unbiased information and data privacy, steer clear. Facebook is no longer a social network—it’s a surveillance and propaganda machine.
This app sells your data. This is public knowledge and they have conducted many pay outs for this reason.

Zuckerberg started this as a way to rate women, “hot, or not.”Years later, he‘s transformed it into a safe vehicle to share misinformation and hate speech. 應用名稱: 戀愛紀念日 - 情侶交往天數紀錄
應用描述:
戀愛紀念日（Memories Widget）是一款幫助您記錄生活中重要日子的紀念日提醒應用程式，可倒數或正數計算重要日子的天數。支持記錄情侶戀愛天數、結婚週年紀念日、生日、倒數日、假期、重要事項等，讓您不再忘記每個值得紀念的日子。

【記錄戀愛天數】
▸ 還記得和另一半相愛多長時間了嗎？輸入戀愛開始的日期，可以一目了然地查看在一起的天數。
▸ 快速查看和另一半的紀念日，例如相戀100天、戀愛一周年、520天、1000天和各種紀念日（情人節、七夕、聖誕節、新年）等。

【情侶互動空間】
▸ 情侶空間：做任務賺金幣，和另一半一起精心裝飾“小家”。
▸ 萌寵陪伴：與另一半一起餵養寵物、探險尋寶、與萌寵溫馨互動...
▸ 心情氣泡：發送每日心情，告訴TA你的真實感受。
▸ 冰箱便利貼：在冰箱貼上暖心留言，共同提醒彼此。
▸ 紀念日：將自己的紀念日共享給TA，共同紀念日子。
▸ 照片牆：換上一張甜蜜的情侶照，共同表達愛意。

【日期計算器】
▸ 正數、倒數計算結婚週年紀念日、生日、戀愛天數、假期、重要事項，不再錯過值得紀念的日子！
▸ 可倒數某個即將到來的重要日子，或正數計算過去某個重要日子至今的天數。
▸ 支持設置陰曆 / 公曆日期

【紀念重要日子】
▸ 您可以自訂另一半的名稱和頭像，將專屬戀愛小組件添加至iPhone主屏幕上。
▸ 您可自訂紀念日的背景圖片。
▸ 生成多種藝術圖片分享樣式，與您的朋友分享紀念日。

【重複週期和通知提醒】
▸ 紀念日重複週期設置：按每天、每週、每月、每年重複
▸ 重要日子智能提醒：按當天、提前、累計天數提醒

【自動排序】
▸ 按創建時間、天數、日曆的方式排序日期，可幫助您專注於即將到來的紀念日。
▸ 將某個重要日子設定為重要的一天（置於頂部）。

【雲端備份和恢復】
▸ iCloud雲端同步，自動備份數據，保護你的重要資料。
▸ 現在支持多設備（iPhone、iPad）同步恢復數據。
▸ 你可以通過AirDrop直接將備份共享到附近的iOS設備。

【桌面小組件和鎖屏小組件】
▸ 提供數十款可愛的主題風格，在主屏幕上（iOS14+）可同時創建多個紀念日小組件。
▸ 您可以自訂編輯紀念日小組件，包括修改字體樣式、字體顏色、主題顏色和背景照片。
▸ 您可以選擇經典/甜蜜樣式的鎖屏小組件添加至iPhone鎖定屏幕上（iOS16+），讓您快速查看必要的信息。
▸ 橫屏充電新玩法，多種精選StandBy待機組件（iOS17+）供你選擇。

【心情日記本】
▸ 結合普拉切克情緒色彩的可愛表情，用治愈且輕鬆的方式，完成此刻的心情記錄。
▸ 用圖片、文字記錄戀愛日記，生活點滴。
▸ 用日曆視圖隨時翻閱以往心情日記。
▸ 支持深色 / 淺色模式

如果您有更好的建議請聯繫我們 ，謝謝！
反饋郵箱：memorywidget@126.com 或在應用中的“設置”→“我要吐槽”提交反饋。

【會員訂閱功能】
您可以在應用內使用 iTunes 自動續訂功能獲取會員專屬功能，我們提供「按月訂閱」和「永久會員」套餐。確認購買後，將會從您的 iTunes 帳戶中收取費用。您可以在每個週期結束至少 24 小時前取消下個週期的訂閱，每個週期結束 24 小時內將會自動續訂，已訂閱的周期將無法取消。

▸ 用戶協議：https://encofire.com/memories/terms.html
▸ 官方網站：https://encofire.com/memories
▸ 小紅書：Memories365

評論.標題: DANGEROUS APP - SEVERE PRIVACY AND SECURITY RISK
評論.內容:
I'm writing this as both a user and an app developer to warn others. This app is likely part of an organized international scam operation. Here's what happened to me:
I had TanTan installed for about a month. While I received messages from multiple supposed female users, they all seemed suspicious, and I never responded. The real issue emerged when I discovered the app was tracking my location in 'Always' mode without my conscious consent.
Yesterday, while driving on Highway 1 in San Francisco, I received an SMS claiming to be about toll charges. The link looked legitimate, but it was actually a phishing scam from a Philippines number (+63). Within minutes of entering my card details, I had to freeze my card.
After investigating how scammers knew my exact location, I found that TanTan was the only app set to 'Always' share my location. This level of location tracking was likely used to enable targeted scams.
The app appears to be of Chinese origin and shows clear signs of being part of a sophisticated fraud operation. It's not just a dating app - it's a security threat that can compromise your location data and financial information.
DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP. If you have it installed, remove it immediately and check your location sharing settings. Your privacy and financial security are at risk.

評論.標題: Full of fake profiles and scammers
評論.內容:
If you don’t want to read my detail explanation, save your money on the dating side of the app, but the social media live-streaming site is OK.  

I’ve sent over 500 messages to people who supposedly liked my profile, but I’ve only received two replies—one of which was just a GIF. Some of these profiles show they haven’t been online in over a year, yet somehow they “liked” me recently, which feels suspicious. 

There’s also a live-streaming feature on the app, which is a nice addition. I’ve made friends with one woman through her stream, and we even shared WeChat, which was surprising. I also connected with two guys during a live stream—they seem cool. But ultimately, this is supposed to be a dating app, not just a place to make friends.

I purchased a three-month subscription for about $15, expecting better results. However, I later realized that sending more “super crushes” or unlocking additional features costs $10 a month extra—meaning I ended up paying $30 for three months. Even then, I discovered there’s a more expensive tier, costing $800 a year, just to message the most popular profiles. That’s an entirely separate cost on top of changing search settings or sending more crushes.

The pricing structure feels misleading because it’s not clear what each subscription level includes. On top of that, many profiles seem fake or inactive, yet they’re still liking profiles to generate activity. I used this app seven years ago when it was simpler, but it’s definitely shifted toward being more of a social platform than a dating app. I wish I’d done more research before subscribing. It’s not just the high price—it’s the confusing benefits and questionable profiles that make me feel like I’ve been scammed.

如果您剛買了房子或公寓或者想要裝修您現有的房產，我們可以幫助您更輕鬆地做到這一點，減少喧囂，並在更少的時間內獲得更好的結果，只需支付一小部分費用。

通過該應用程序，您可以：
- 想像你的夢想，並更好地了解它的真實面貌
- 使用世界知名品牌的家具豐富您的居住環境

該應用程序的設計主題為裝飾客廳，臥室，廚房，浴室和許多其他。

其他功能，如現成的設計，完整的家具目錄（150000產品），3ds Max出口，無限數量的房間和逼真的高清渲染可通過自動更新訂閱一周，一個月或一年。在確認購買時，將從您的iTunes帳戶中收取付款。除非在當前期間結束前至少24小時關閉自動續訂，否則訂閱將自動續訂。根據您的計劃，您的帳戶將在當前期間結束前24小時內收取續訂費用。您可以在購買後隨時管理或關閉Apple lD帳戶設置中的自動續訂。

Just draw a simple smiley face on your skin, and the app will recognize it and place the tattoo right there. It looks so realistic, and you can move around to see it from different angles. This helped me a lot because I could see exactly how a tattoo would look on my arm, leg, or even my back.
