應用名稱: AI Chatbot: AI Chat Smith 4
應用描述:
Chat Smith 基于 GPT-4 和 GPT-4o 开发，提供增强的 AI 聊天应用功能，包括语音交互、撰写电子邮件、解决数学作业、图像生成，以及智能对话体验，满足您的各种需求。在您的 iOS 设备上，您可以享受 AI 聊天助手 Chat Smith 带来的个性化体验。

我們的 AI 助理聊天機器人可以完成許多任務，具有無限的可能性：

即时答案
得益于强大的最新 AI 模型，基于 GPT-4 的 Chat Smith 能快速、准确地回答您的任何问题，基于现有知识为您提供令人印象深刻的答案。

AI 寫作助理
AI 寫作助理的功能有助於輕鬆完成任何寫作任務：
- 為任何文章撰寫大綱，或撰寫出整個段落。
- 撰寫任何內容與任何風格：推文、電子郵件、文章、聊天回覆、SEO 內容、元資料描述、廣告文案、社群媒體標題
- 將產品描述轉化為廣告文案，產生產品名稱
- 產生真實的餐廳評論

釋放創意潛能
寫詩、作詞、為提案進行腦力激盪、重新研究、撰寫論文

PDF 大师
轻松总结、改写或翻译任何 PDF 文档。针对文档内容提问，立刻获得答案。

YouTube 专家
即时理解 YouTube 视频内容。只需粘贴视频链接，应用程序即可提供视频摘要、重写、翻译以及关于视频内容的问答。


練習任何語言
利用多語言功能將標準英文文字翻譯成任何語言

確立真實性
用於偵測情感的基本提示，例如推文分類工具，也可以讓您的文章充滿真實情感與個性

文法和拼寫檢查工具
快速修正標準英文文字中的文法、拼寫和標點錯誤。

專家級的文本結構與摘要工具
需要將複雜的文字翻譯成簡單的概念嗎？ 將會議記錄變成摘要嗎？ 我們的機器人使用先進的演算法來識別關鍵資訊、關鍵字，因此擅於重新組織，能以簡短而清晰的格式、以及自然的流程來呈現內容，為您節省時間和精力，同時確保您或您的受眾充分獲得所需的資訊。

代码大师
AI 驱动的代码生成器、调试器和 API 助手。将自然语言转化为功能性代码——支持 Stripe、聊天机器人 API 等。

簡歷製作工具
撰寫一份專業的簡歷和求職信，或者出色的 Linkedin 個人檔案，藉此展現您的技能、經驗和成就。 此外，AI 聊天機器人 Chat Smith 還能夠建立獨特的面試問題，藉此吸引優秀的應聘者。

聰明的演說家
無論您是要在商務會議上進行簡報，還是要在學校發表演說，這款應用程式都能透過比喻創作功能來幫助您傳遞強大且難忘的資訊，吸引並激勵聽眾。

研讀顧問
您只需提供一個主題，AI 聊天機器人 Chat Smith 就會為您精心製作易於記憶的學習筆記。

人工智慧鍵盤
增強您的寫作能力，直接從您的設備生成文本

AI 聊天機器人 Chat Smith 以 GPT-4o 作為基礎，能即時回答您的所有問題，讓您印象深刻。 無論您是需要幫助解決某個具體問題，還是想進一步認識某個主題，我們的聊天機器人都能幫您解決。Chat Smith 是独立开发的，并且与 OpenAI 无关。

我們的 AI 聊天機器人 Chat Smith 擁有友善的使用者介面和直觀的設計，您可以立即開始與我們的聊天機器人聊天。

我們的訂閱方案：
• 您可以訂閱一週 (6.99 美元)、一個月 (9.99 美元) 或一年 (69.99 美元)
免費試用結束後，系統將向您的 iTunes 帳戶收費。 除非在目前期間結束前至少 24 小時取消訂閱，否則訂閱將自動延續。 系統將在目前期間結束前 24 小時內依照總訂購價格向您的帳戶收取續訂費用。 購買後，系統將取消尚未使用的免費試用部分。 特殊介紹優惠僅適用於第一個帳單週期。 您在購買後可以透過 iTunes 帳戶設定來管理訂閱或取消續訂，路徑為：設定 > iTunes 和 App Store > Apple ID > 管理訂閱。

應用名稱: Skype
應用描述:
Skype - 現已搭配 Microsoft Copilot，可進行連線、建立、交談與探索

COPILOT 引領您的人生之路
在 Skype 中使用 Microsoft Copilot
使用 Copilot 更聰明地工作、提高生產力、提升創造力，以及與生活中的人員和事物保持聯繫 。 Copilot 是一種 AI 小幫手 ，可在您工作的所有裝置上運作。
無論您喜歡什麼 - 瀏覽網頁、搜尋答案、探索您的創意潛能，或是創作更多實用的內容，Copilot 都可以協助您發現新的可能性。

免費和任何人 SKYPE
Skype 是隨時隨地與任何人保持聯繫的最佳方式。您可用來和您的家人、朋友或同事交談。您最多可以和 100 個人進行免費視訊通話、傳送和接收簡訊、與其他人一起使用 ChatGPT、傳送語音留言、表情圖示、分享螢幕畫面以顯示您正在執行的工作。

PERSONALIZED NEWS
透過Skype的頻道，您可以取得免費的個人化新聞。利用最新的新聞，隨時掌握最新資訊、提高生產力、娛樂及啟發。

• 隱私權與 Cookie 原則: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=507539
• Microsoft 服務合約: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=530144
• 歐盟合約摘要: https://go.skype.com/eu.contract.summary
• 消費者健康資料隱私權條款: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2259814。

存取權限:
擁有權限都是選用的，需要同意 (您可以繼續使用 Skype 而不授與這些許可權，但某些功能可能無法) 使用。

• 聯絡人 - Skype 可以同步並上傳您的裝置聯絡人至 Microsoft 伺服器，讓您能夠輕鬆地尋找並連絡已使用 Skype 的連絡人。
• 麥克風 - 其他人需要麥克風才能在音訊或視訊通話期間聽到您的聲音，或是錄製音訊訊息。
• 相機 - 在進行視訊通話時，使用者需要攝影機才能看到您，或者在使用 Skype 時，您也能夠拍攝相片或影片。
• 位置 - 您可以與其他使用者分享您的位置，或使用您的位置來協助尋找您附近的相關地點。
• 相片圖庫 - 需要儲存空間才能儲存相片或與您可聊天的其他人分享您的相片。
• 通知 - 通知可讓使用者知道何時接收訊息或通話，即使 Skype 未主動使用。
• Siri - 這可讓 Siri 在 Skype 中撥打電話。
• 行事曆 - 存取行事曆，即可排程通話並新增至行事曆。
• 動作使用方法 - 使用動作使用方式，讓 Skype 偵測您的裝置旋轉時間，讓 Skype 能夠正確地定位相機。

評論.標題: Slow and clunky on iPhone 6 iOS 12
評論.內容: Been using skype for 10+ years. Used to be easy to just call — would use my contacts from my phone or computer. Now slow doing that. And whole app is slow and hands up. Call quality good. But it’s a pain to use... compared to messenger, WhatsApp, line, viber, Facetime. All perform better than skype in terms of the app. I wish you’d fix it. I liked using skype as my go to call app. I have multiple subscriptions and accounts. Also, when I get calls it is hard to answer quickly. It takes going to a couple screens. Why not just answer it by one touch. As a result, by the time I get to the call, it goes to voicemail. I then have to call them back and they’re calling me back and we are going to each other’s voicemail. Ugh. If you could solve this, it’d be great. Thanks — I wrote the above 10 years ago, and it’s still not great by comparison.   It used to be better before Microsoft bought it.

應用名稱: Photoleap-Lightricks力作，創作高級感美圖
應用描述:
透過市場上最強大的照片編輯應用程式Photoleap，在iPhone上編輯出令人驚艷的美麗大作！無論您是藝術家，或者單純就是喜歡編輯 & 創作，您都會對這款照片編輯應用程式提供的各種創作可能性大感驚艷。從圖層和混色模式，到特效、筆刷、濾鏡、字形、色調調節、影片、黑白和雙重預設，有了Photoleap 照片編輯器，輕鬆把腦海裡的想法變成手機裡美妙絕倫的藝術作品。再也不用和桌上型電腦的軟體奮戰。揮灑您的創意，現在就將照片轉變為藝術傑作。

創意組合
• 更優質的照片合成。疊加圖像、建立雙重曝光和超現實iPhone藝術
• 精緻複雜的圖層！照片結合變得更簡單，還可以隨時重新編輯每個圖層
• 照片混色：調整混色模式、透明度並轉換圖像（視角變化）
• 彈指之間輕鬆變更照片背景

藝術傑作
• 在圖像上添加文字、圖畫或塗鴉
• 使用酷炫工具建立圖形設計、街頭藝術、抽象與當代藝術傑作
• 使用獨創照片濾鏡營造特別氛圍
• 為您的公司建立專業的社群媒體貼文、傳單或海報
• 輕鬆創造令人笑到肚子痛的網路迷因
• 專門為您設計的新套件：漏光、濾鏡、元素、風格、背景、字形、效果、筆刷、貼紙。

圖像修正 & 其他
• 幾乎所有工具都掩蔽內建了新型智慧筆刷選取以節省時間。
• 完美控制與調整：色調、顏色、紋理、暈影、褪色、結構、強度等
• 以雙重濾鏡將圖像彩色化並加上美麗的色階變化
快速去除污點/物體以去除缺陷
• 維持圖像比率輕鬆調整大小與裁切圖像 
• 將照片模糊以營造效果或保護隱私

專業編輯
- 支援RAW
• 支援16位圖像深度以達到更高品質的色調調整
• 您可以設定畫布尺寸
• 尚未完成編輯嗎？照片編輯會自動儲存，以便稍後繼續編輯

- 使用條款：https://static.lightricks.com/legal/terms-of-use.pdf
- 隱私政策：https://static.lightricks.com/legal/privacy-policy.pdf

I have over 1200 projects, and if I was looking at an older one, I now have to scroll through hundreds to get back to where I just was. First you removed the TARGET TOOL which was one of the most useful features. Using the REMOVE tool on black & white images leaves random black blocks all over the image.  The BLUR tool acts erratic and sometimes won’t blur edges unless you duplicate and merge the layer back onto itself first. And even with an Apple Pencil, the TRANSFORM tool rarely does what you want and often deletes the layer forcing you to UNDO. This amazing app just keeps getting worse and worse and more difficult to use. I don’t think the creators are actually using this app before pushing updates. 評論.標題: Made my dog into a unicorn
評論.內容: My daughter loves playing card games so I wanted a unique deck and asked her to tell me a scene or anything she could think of and she said “I want a dog turned into a unicorn with a rainbow tail”. I tried several AI photo editing programs and Photoleap was by far the easiest to use, especially for someone who isn’t great with computers or photoshop. I uploaded a pic of our dog and wrote in the text “turn my dog into a unicorn with a rainbow tail”. Then I didn’t like the background so I said “change background” and it generated hundreds of different backgrounds to choose from with my unicorn dog in the forefront, saved the image and sent it off to be made into playing cards. If you want easy, this is definitely the program I’d recommend.

應用名稱: Hicut:AI換臉影片編輯器
應用描述:
HiCut 是一款頂級臉部換臉應用程式,提供有趣的圖片和視頻。

我們的 AI 技術可以根據您的自拍生成多種動畫藝術濾鏡。

[動畫濾鏡]
我們的 AI 將為您生成所需的最佳動漫圖片,無論是天真的動漫女孩、賽博龐克還是迪士尼風格,我們都能做到!您是自己動畫的英雄/女主角!

[特色場景]
您可以輕鬆製作著名地點的視頻,也可以體驗不同國家和文化之美;您也可以使用照片製作各種節日氛圍的臉部換臉視頻,看看您在壯麗的婚紗中的枝姿颯爽!

[照片會跳舞]

上傳任意照片，一鍵生成各類舞蹈視頻，爆款性感美女、搞笑等多個跳舞視頻

[遊戲寫實風]

一鍵解鎖各種遊戲風格視頻和圖片，ps2、GTA等多種遊戲

[連續訂閱會員說明]
1. 訂閱服務:連續訂閱(每週/每月/每年)
2. 訂閱週期:一週/一個月/一年;在訂閱週期內,用戶可以體驗所有功能
3. 訂閱價格:$1.99 每週 / $4.99 每月 / $27.99 每年
4. 支付方式:確認購買後,會自動從用戶的 Apple iTunes 帳戶扣款
5. 取消訂閱:如果需要取消自動續約,請在訂閱期截止前至少 24 小時關閉自動續約,關閉後將不再扣款。如果未在到期前 24 小時內取消,訂閱將自動續期
6. 續期:在連續訂閱(每週/每月/每年)到期前 24 小時,Apple 將自動從您的 iTunes 帳戶扣除相應費用。成功延長後,訂閱週期將自動延長一個週期
7. 隱私政策:http://nface.cushuikeji.cn/link/nface/Privacy_Policy.html
8. 連續訂閱協議:http://nface.cushuikeji.cn/link/nface/lianxudingyuexieyi.html

應用名稱: Videoleap：綜合影片製作、編輯和剪輯的多功能軟體
應用描述:
影片創作，輕而易舉！ 無論您想製作好萊塢水準的優質大片，或只是想與朋友分享回憶與珍貴時刻，Videoleap 都是專為您設計的突破性影片編輯器。專家級用戶肯定會愛上強大的高端編輯功能，一般愛好者則可以簡單、直觀、輕鬆地剪輯與合併影片內容。現在就下載並開始創作動人的影片。

創意合成
混合影片與圖像以打造雙重曝光與藝術效果。
基於圖層的編輯！ 添加影片、效果、文字與圖像，然後隨心所欲地排列。
以各種轉換效果、遮罩與混色模式自訂圖層。
在剪輯片段上套用流暢、電影風格般的過渡效果。

高端工具
關鍵影格動畫。
綠幕 / 色度關鍵合成。
讓剪輯內容吻合格式。將剪輯內容置於白色或彩色畫布上。
非破壞性編輯。
無限次數撤銷/重做。
直觀的時間軸以及放大功能，以掌握每張影格精度。

特殊效果
稜鏡、散焦、著色、像素化、色差現象以及更多！
文字：各種字體、表情符號、陰影、顏色、不透明度與混合。
為每個珍貴瞬間提供獨特、可調整的濾鏡。

精確的編輯 & 豐富的可能
影片編輯：剪裁、分割、複製、翻轉、鏡像、轉換。
色彩修正：調節亮度、對比、飽和度與更多。
超過 100 種音效！
控制音量大小並套用等化器預設置。
自動改變寬高比並讓影片吻合格式大小。
自訂背景顏色。

還有哪些優勢？
程式內存畫面，包括綠影片與疊加。
針對每項功能推出有用的迷你教程。
自動儲存專案。隨時隨地修改、編輯。
以全螢幕預覽編輯影片。
 
- 使用條款： https://static.lightricks.com/legal/terms-of-use.pdf
- 隱私政策： https://static.lightricks.com/legal/privacy-policy.pdf

Videoleap used to be my go-to all in one application of choice for years and I never expected to drop my ratings, but here we are. The prioritization of AI integration appears to have come at the loss of some very basic features. The one that is most inconvenient is that it’s no longer integrated with giphy for stickers. Well you don’t use stickers for advanced video editing, there is a time in a place for them such as making a tutorial video and wanting a quick circle around a highlighted button. But it’s gone. Today I wanted to create a short animation referencing that this is fine meme where again, fire stickers would have been ideal. Instead, I had to choose an overlay with less than ideal fire video. But it has a black background and the chroma feature to remove it is gone/ replaced by their new button “remove background” but that button apparently is not an option to use for the fire overlay. So essentially my entire video is covered up by the stupid black video with red flames. Most people who use video editing phone apps are newbs and they will rely even more on stickers. But no, its gone.

Videoleap also got rid of their integration with their other software. Previously there was a link to quickly open a photoleap (adjacent editing software). It’s gone. 

I’m just not sure why they drop features that are clearly helpful. They did the same thing with their OG editing app, ENLIGHT, which I still keep on my iPhone despite the lack of updates because it has features that were never carried over into subsequent releases after they changed the pay model from one time purchase to subscription-based. 

There are plenty of great features about Videoleap, but if I can’t do everything in one place, particularly the basics, it makes me want to look elsewhere for an alternative app before renewal.
I’m doing a video that requires a simple shape to appear on screen, and then disappear. This simply does not appear to be possible in this buggy, overpriced, AI infested, frustrating piece of trash.

I really liked Videoleap. I used to use it since 4 years ago to edit short videos. Once I started making long-form content, I decided to buy the yearly plan at about 39.99 USD at the time (I forgot the exact price) so I can edit my YouTube videos. It was worth it, but I quickly learned that highly edited videos over 8 minutes are extremely unoptimized and need to be put together in separated segments so the entire editing program isn’t horrendously laggy and difficult to work with. I continued using it until the awful addition of a TikTok / Instagram Reels / YouTube shorts type thing was implemented, which I absolutely never used. My discontent with the editor I loved started to grow. It got worse when the program started to use AI generated voices and images, something I’m highly against due to being an artist. They even pulled an Instagram type thing in their terms of service that anything you post / make can be used to fuel their AI machines. Pretty awful for artists and editors alike, not to mention a huge breach of security. 

I just checked today to find that the yearly plan has been changed for the worst. It is now $4.99 USD WEEKLY, not monthly as it was before. Worst of all, the yearly plan went from around about $35.00 - $39.00 USD to $89.99 USD per year. This absolutely drove me off, as this is more expensive than most of the high-end editor softwares on PC! It would be more worth the money to just buy a better software altogether. I’m never using Videoleap again as a YouTube editor, even a TikTok editor and such. It’s better to just get a permanent purchase or free software on PC or on mobile.

應用名稱: Unidream AI繪畫 - AI夢境生成器
應用描述:
"AI 繪畫，無限可能，一切盡在 Unidream"

Unidream 是一款多功能的 AI 繪畫工具應用程式，只需輸入文字或上傳圖片，即可快速生成您夢想中的藝術作品。無論您是初學者還是專業藝術家，Unidream 都能幫助您輕鬆創作並探索無限的創意。

應用程式功能：

【文字生成圖像】
只需輸入簡單的描述，即可生成夢幻場景。我們還提供多個描述詞優化工具：指令生成器提供數百個可自由組合的關鍵詞選項；AI 智能擴展通過大型語言模型豐富您的創意；隨機靈感功能幫助您發現更多創作的可能性。

【圖片生成圖像】
上傳圖片，並通過一次點擊將其轉換為 3D、厚塗、復古漫畫、水彩等數百種風格。批量漫畫化、草圖 3D 轉換，甚至還可以體驗經典角色扮演。通過細節增強、智能面部增強和姿勢控制，提升圖像的精確度和創作控制力。

【局部改圖】
指定的部分修改，如服裝、髮型或背景，只需一次點擊即可選定區域並輸入指令，AI 修改即可完成，使作品更加完美。

【AI擴圖]
以任意比例智能擴展，輕鬆挽救被廢棄的圖像，創作無限。

【草圖上色】
想成為畫家嗎？上傳草圖，Unidream 將自動完成並上色，實現您的創意。

【AI藝術攝影】
上傳原始圖像，保持人物姿勢，同時生成多張工作室級別的創意照片，輕鬆獲得專業照片效果。

【畫質提升】
一次點擊即可提升模糊實拍照片和低解析度漫畫圖像的畫質，大幅提高清晰度。

還有更多功能：如【AI 二維碼】、【AI 背景更換】和【一鍵生成海報】等功能，探索更多創意方法。

快速生成圖像：高性能機器和優化算法，快速生成高質量圖像。
支持批量生成：支持批量生成，節省時間，提高效率。
免費試用：每天獲取免費繪圖卡片，先試後付。
多樣化的 AI 工具：提供多種先進功能，滿足不同創作需求。

訂閱信息：

訂閱 VIP，解鎖每月更新的資源和所有 VIP 功能。
訂閱選項：每月或每年訂閱，也提供一次性購買選項。
扣款說明：購買確認後，將向iTunes帳戶付款。
自動續訂：在當前周期結束前 24 小時自動續訂，用戶可在賬戶設置中管理訂閱並關閉自動續訂。
免費試用：免費試用期內未使用部分將在用戶購買訂閱時被取消。

隱私政策與使用條款：

I used this app for AI drawings and NSFW content. I decided to buy a Lifetime $35 membership. When I originally downloaded the app, they didn’t allow NSFW content on the realistic “photography” style. Which is to be expected. I wasn’t too upset about that. For a very short time, they removed the filter recently, which allowed NSFW content in ALL styles! Great! But, very recently they banned NSFW pictures in ALL styles. Now there is NO NSFW content. I mean I don’t understand. How do you allow us to make NSFW content, bait us into purchasing a membership, then pull the plug, and leave us hanging? Pros: I really like this app, the styles are good, the AI drawings are amazing. Cons: The new “coin” system is straight up confusing, and greedy. Now u use “coins” to make AI pictures, and free services (like AI recognition) now use “coins” which is straight up stupid. Like what happened to the old system where u just had limited pictures a month? Removed NSFW content. Which as previously stated, is a total bait and switch. I’m even tempted in asking for a refund. ————————————————————————
Edit: They added back NSFW content, therefore I will give it 4 stars. However, this should have never happened in the first place. Edit: They removed it again…

Edit: They removed it again! 2 Stars!

應用名稱: Piczoo-照片拼图修图组合
開發者: Xi'an Button Software Technology Co., Ltd.
應用描述:
PICZOO - 一款集美貌與才華於一身的美圖神器。極簡的設計風格和全面的美化功能讓你真正享受做圖的樂趣。

如果你間歇性為一款軟件中冗雜繁瑣的功能而費神，持續性準備十幾種美圖軟件佔用你寶貴的內存，經常性拍照一分鐘修圖兩小時，最後還是無法滿足你發圖的慾望，那你可能要試一試Piczoo哦！簡而全，一直是我們的目標。美圖神器盛行的的時代，Piczoo去其糟糠取其精華，智能square fit、多種形狀遮罩、完美濾鏡、創新拼圖、花樣貼紙等，讓你的圖片質感有質的飛躍，分分鐘讓你把持不住自己分享照片的衝動。

Piczoo作為一個有追求的zoo：

- 極簡操作：修圖、拼圖、加素材幾分鐘輕鬆搞定，隨時隨地，Piczoo都能幫你用最少的操作做出想要的效果。讓即時分享變成可能，簡是一種追求。

- Square Fit: 無需剪裁，將各種圖片自適應到方形。不丟到任何細節是一種追求。

- Shape crop：30+創新形狀遮罩讓你的圖片獨一無二。與眾不同是一種追求。

- 精選濾鏡：不僅要創意，還要文藝，50+精選濾鏡定能滿足你躁動的心。美是一種追求。

- 創意拼圖：一張或多張圖片拼圖，隨心調節拼圖佈局，讓拼圖不再死板。一張圖片裝不下多變的你，隨心所欲是一種追求。

- 多樣素材：100+創意貼紙70+最新字體讓你的圖片會說話。創新個性是一種追求。

- 一鍵分享：輕鬆分享你的滿意作品到Instagram，Facebook，Twitter等等。高清無碼...是一種追求。

這裡有更多的追求，等你發掘。分享你的圖片，等著你的朋友們問你是怎麼做到的吧！

Ps. 即使不修圖，單單是看界面風格也是極爽的呢

ZooService VIP訂閱

您可以訂閱ZooService VIP來獲取應用內提供的所有功能和內容。
Piczoo提供年訂閱。訂閱價格為：$29.99 /年
- 您可以訂閱年度計劃（免費試用3天，試用期結束後每年收取$29.99）。
- 付款將在確認購買後向 iTunes 帳戶收取。
- 除非至少在當前預訂期結束前 24 小時關閉自動續訂，否則訂閱將自動續訂。
- 在當期結束前的24小時你的賬戶將被收取續訂費用，並確定續費費用。
- 用戶可以管理訂閱，購買後在用戶的“帳戶設置”中也可以關閉自動續訂。
- 如果提供的免費試用期的任何部分未使用，如果用戶在試用的情況下購買該部分的訂閱，那麼未使用部分將失效。

隱私政策：

評論.標題: 이미 토익을 공부해본 경험이 있고, 학원다니기는 돈아까울때? 산타토익 강추입니다~~
評論.內容:
저는 2년 전에 토익을 학원다니면서 공부한 경험이 있고 이번에 갱신을 하고자 학원을 다닐까 고민하다가 산타토익을 접하게 됐어요! 결과는 대만족입니다👏 

1. 어디서든 공부할 수 있다
 이건 산타토익의 정말 최고의 장점이라고 생각되는데요, 학원 다닐때는 무거운 책들과 mp3 파일로 재생하고 해아하는 번거로움이 공부를 시작하는데 항상 조금의 제약을 주곤 했어요. 그런데 산타토익은 지하철에서든, 누워서든 핸드폰만 있으면 할 수 있고 진짜 그냥 어플만 있으면 끝이라서 너무 편리해요. 원래 학원다니거나 하면 많은 시간을 투자를 해야하는데 산타토익으로는 그 효율이 몇배가 되는거 같네요. 

2. 복습이 귀찮은 분들에게도 최고
 토익은 솔직히 단어나 문법 문제가 정말 유형화되어있어서 오답노트를 만드는게 굉장히 중요하다고 생각해요. 예전에 학원다닐때도 그런부분을 엄청나게 강조를 했었구요. 근데 막상 만들고 나면 따로 챙겨보기가 귀찮아져요..(저만그런가요..ㅋㅋ) 근데 산타토익은 틀리면 저절로 노트를 만들어주고, '오늘의 학습'에서 틀린 문제 복습하라고 계속 말해줘서 잊지않고 복습을 하게끔 하는게 정말 좋아요!

3. 강의가 은근 좋다
 솔직히 강의 별로 기대안하고 봤는데, 내가 부족한 부분에 대해서 5분 이내로 항상 알짜 강의를 제공해주는게 너무 도움이 많이 됐어요. 이것도 사실 복습과 관련된 부분인데 내가 무슨 부분이 부족한지를 그냥 ai가 알려주니까 따라가기만 하면 부족한 부분이 채워져서 좋더라구요!

4. 개선했으면 좋겠는점
 대부분의 기능에 만족을 하면서 산타토익을 이용했지만.. 조금의 바램이 있다면 와이파이 없이도 이용할 수 있었으면 좋겠어요! 몇문제 만큼을 저장해서 오프라인 환경에서도 학습을 할수 있으면 더 좋을거같네요☺️

TIP. 
저는 나머지는 다 폰으로 하는데 part 6,7 는 아이패드가 있으시면 아이패드로 하는거 추천합니다!
토익을 보기엔 아직 멀었지만, 대비를 하기 위해 이 앱을 깔았습니다. 그런데 정말 많이 도움이 된 것 같아요. 토익을 다 풀지 않고 예상점수를 받아서 실질적인 목표를 세울 수 있다는 것과, 필요한 문제만 콕콕 집어서 풀 수 있다는 점이 정말 좋고 유익하게 느껴졌습니다. 앞으로도 산타토익을 이용해서 대비를 착실히 하고 실전도 잘하겠습니다!😁😁

使用MixerBox AI 技術即時生成各種圖像，節省你在搜尋相對應圖片的時間和精力。徹底地解放你的創造力，可創造出各種異想天開的圖片。未來再也不受技術限制，你就是最佳攝影師、設計師。

隨時協助更正你內容中的文法或拼字錯誤，確保溝通無礙，更可協助你在英文寫作上的學習，隨時幫自己改作業。

輕鬆精準地在各種語言之間翻譯，打破語言障礙。 外語再也不是一件困難的事！

我們的人工智慧聊天機器人提供有用的回應，有效地支持你的需求，是你最堅強的後盾。

【即時網頁摘要】

不蒐集你的個資
你的瀏覽紀錄不會被追蹤，可以安全又快速地找到你要的資訊，讓你安心上網！

分頁管理

將常用網站添加到手機桌面，即可一鍵快速開啟該網站。支援 YouTube、Twitter、Facebook 等網站快捷。

輕巧容量

應用名稱: Naver Papago - AI Translator
應用描述:
Whenever you need translation during your travels, business trips or while studying a language just bring Papago, a smart parrot who can translate multiple languages for you.

▶ What does ‘Papago’ mean? 
In Esperanto, Papago refers to a parrot, a bird with language abilities. 
Papago supports 14 languages : Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified/Traditional), Spanish, French, Vietnamese, Thai, Indonesian, Russian, German, Italian and Arabic. 

▶ Main features
1) Text Translation
Real-time text translation for phrases and words

2) Image Translation
Automatic recognition and translation of text in the image by taking a picture and pressing the button 

3) Voice Translation
Real-time voice translation to both text and audio

4) Offline translation
Can translate even in offline

5) Conversation Translation 
Simultaneously speak in each other’s language when talking one-on-one with a foreigner

6) Handwriting Translation
Handwriting translation that finds the correct word and translation when you write using your finger

7) Website Translation 
Automatic translation for all content when you include the URL of a foreign website

8) Edu
Taking a picture of the passage you want to study will create a 
My Note that you can use to study passages and words

9) Dictionary
Dictionary information provided to check additional meanings other than initial translation results

Be confident anytime, anywhere with your translating partner Papago!

Papago Facebook Like :  https://www.facebook.com/NaverPapago
Papago Instagram Follow : https://www.instagram.com/papago_naver/


※ Speech recognition permission provided by the mobile OS is used to provide voice translation and dialog translation in Vietnamese, Thai, Indonesian, Russian, and Italian. If you use voice translation or dialog translation in these languages after granting speech recognition permission, only voice data will be sent to Apple as per Apple's policy; no other information will be sent.



※ Supporting iOS 15.0 or above
 ※ Available on PC and mobile. https://papago.naver.com
 ※ For app-related issues and errors: https://goo.gl/9LZLRe
  
Developer Contact No.: 
1588-3820  

178-1, Green Factory, Jeongja-dong, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do, Seoul

評論.標題: Highly recommend, but needs some more work. Overall, happy with Papago.
評論.內容: I’ve been using Papago for about four years. In the beginning there were significant issues with translation (I’m using for both Korean and Japanese). The issues were particularly with Korean. Being new to Hangul, I didn’t understand the sentence structure and the app didn’t work well with helping to understand that aspect. With the help of other sources I was finally able to figure out, for the most part, how to put together sentences and phrases. It still translates some words and sentences awkwardly and differently than other translation apps. I’m actually still trying to figure some of those out. In certain cases I just go with what the majority of the other apps say. But I’m writing a review today for one very important (to me at least) that seems to not be working as well as previously. I think it’s very important especially to foreigners and those who are younger who are using this app. There is an “honorific” option when translating. Recently, I’ve noticed it’s not working as it has in the past. I’m not saying it just gives outright casual translation, but it certainly doesn’t provide the ”니다“ ending like it used to. I understand not everything ends with “니다” , but it seems like there’s more of the “요“ ending instead. This is just my personal opinion, but if I’m speaking to someone who I don’t know and who is older than me I would rather use the more formal ending. Please take these suggestions into consideration. 감사합니다.

The screen reading feature is really helpful for un-translated YouTube video captions. But the interface needs a lot of work and the program is really buggy. Recently, the video feature started defaulting to portrait mode and you have to rotate your device several times to force it back to horizontal. I’d like to see a preference that just locks horizontal mode. The audio (speech) feature really doesn’t work most of the time. As with all translation programs, I wish there was a preference to translate into English without altering the syntax. For example, if the foreign language text literally reads, “Bathroom, where is it at?” I’d like to be able to see the translation that way rather than, “Where is the Bathroom?” It’s much easier to learn a foreign language if you learn to think in the native syntax.

It’s not a gameplay bug or anything of that nature, but the game will always close itself out for no reason.

I’ve encountered this issue almost every time I launch the app on my phone. It works fine for a bit but then the random crash always occurs.

In fact, most of the time, the amount of time I spend playing the game is dependent on when the random crash occurs. When it crashes, even if I launch the game again it seems like it will crash in an even shorter amount of time. Sometimes it will crash on specific triggers which make no sense, like opening a menu, something that doesn’t take any processing power. Never have I crashed while in combat or actual gameplay. Sometimes it gets so bad the game crashes when it boots up.

I don’t know if it’s because I have an iPhone 11? Either way it’s unacceptable, the game should be formatted for most recent iPhone versions.

I only bring this up since this issue has existed the entire time I’ve played the game. I won’t be installing it until I see this specific issue being mention in some patch. If I do get some developer response please do something about this.

P.S. since I’ve gotten used to crashes and starting the game over and over again, I’ve grown to hate the extremely long loading times to boot the game, it takes about a min to actually launch which is kinda crazy in my book. Though this annoyance could be due to my other situation, but faster loading times on everything would also be a big plus.

評論.標題: Best most amazing app in universe
評論.內容: This app is truly incredible once you take time to explore what it can do and use creative thinking. I made the mistake for a while of avoiding functions that i didn’t understand by their name alone but once i began learning what each thing is the whole experience really opened up and it’s great. The wait times are not bad at all, seconds basically, compared to many other similar apps that crash and stall or make dozens of ads between every click! This means you can do fairly quick work, especially once you have got the hang of it and can go through a routine of fundamental things you apply. The AI functions are better than any website AI apps i tried. Sometimes you have to try different wordings, the AI seems to understand very literally and you have to re-write it for it to understand what you mean. It seems to learn as you go along, idk if that’s me imagining it but when you “regenerate” it seems like it is thinking “hmm, that wasn’t it, try this?” And so on until you get it. If that is the case then that’s really cool. Also have found that sometimes it might make something, like a foot you are adding, too big proportionate to the body, but if you edit the prompt and write “make it fit proportionately” it will usually get the right one, don’t give up on the first try is what i’m saying. I have genuinely found this app to be very enjoyable and enhancing my art work and the creative process and experience. I’m sorry for never giving a review until now but i feel ready to praise and recommend this app now and i have turned several other people on to it after they were impressed with some of my work. Thank you.

應用名稱: LINE 熊大上菜
應用描述:
熱愛美食的熊大非常喜歡動手做料理，而他的夢想就是擁有一間屬於自己的餐廳！為了實現夢想的熊大和莎莉開始經營起餐車，你也快來和他一起邁向頂級主廚之路吧！

《LINE 熊大上菜》是款可愛又有趣的新型態料理遊戲。遊戲方式簡單好上手，只要點擊螢幕就能進行操作！在遊戲中登場的客人個個討喜又極具獨特魅力，但熊大卻為了滿足這些客人而忙得不可開交。努力提供美味料理來幫助熊大實現他的主廚夢吧！


【LINE 熊大上菜的樂趣】
・類型豐富的各種餐廳等你來挑戰！不管哪間餐廳都超可愛～
・可以嘗試製作各國的特色料理！讓料理帶你環遊世界吧！
・可愛的客人們都來光顧囉～快來體驗他們的獨特魅力吧！
・得讚／提供／分數模式等各種遊戲方式等你來挑戰！
・遊戲不僅提供免費下載，而且只需點擊畫面就能進行操作。不論大人小孩都能輕鬆享受到遊戲樂趣！
・努力收集金幣就能讓料理和烹調用具變得更加豪華！
・巧妙地連接COMBO還有機會獲得大量金幣！
・可愛的夥伴會使用技能來幫你做料理喔！
・贈送巧克力給好友就可以獲得禮物！
・除了鬆餅、義大利麵、咖啡輕食和牛排以外，還有更多特色料理和新餐廳將陸續登場！
・熊大、莎莉、兔兔和CHOCO等可愛的LINE卡通明星也會陪你一起玩遊戲喔！


【推薦給這樣的你】
・喜歡料理烹飪遊戲
・喜歡漢堡排和蛋包飯等美食
・喜歡熊大、莎莉和兔兔等LINE卡通明星
・喜歡PokoPoko、POKOPANG、Rangers和Bubble2等LINE GAME
・喜歡做料理
・喜歡品嘗美食

和LINE卡通明星們一起努力成為頂尖廚師！
現在就去下載風格可愛的料理遊戲《LINE 熊大上菜》吧！

* 依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法，此軟體為普遍級，任何年齡皆得使用。

應用名稱: Notability
應用描述:
使用 Notability，化想法為現實！免費下載並輕鬆使用強大的筆記功能。您很快就會明白為何我們是 Apple 編輯首選了！

Notability 與您一樣多才多藝。記下想法、匯入和標註教科書、錄音、研究習題，或者勾勒出下一個傑作。無論您是學生、專業或業餘人士，都能找到自己所需的功能。

功能更勝紙筆 
• 利用多媒體工具記下筆記，像是鉛筆、螢光筆、文字和音訊。
• 標記教科書、文件、授課投影片、作業或影像。
• 搜尋筆記中的任何內容，包括手寫文字和文件。
• 使用數學轉換功能整理數學公式。

運用 Learn 功能提升學習效率 
• 快速複習 AI 生成筆記總結。
• 量身訂作習題，評估學習成果。

更直覺的手寫和素描 
• 使用市面上最逼真的向量型數位筆。
• Ink 經過精心微調，提供最靈敏的書寫體驗 (適用 Apple Pencil 或羅技 Crayon)。

條理分明、無紙化 
• 所有筆記集中一處！隨時隨地做筆記，輕巧、方便又節省紙張。
• 使用個人化主題和分組整理筆記。

播放音訊，重點一字不漏 
• 錄音與筆記同步，深入了解授課和會議內容。
• 搜尋或複製音訊逐字稿中的時戳文字。

輕鬆呈現想法 
• 全螢幕分享您的想法，沒有礙眼工具列。
• 利用雷射筆等多種 Notability 工具與聽眾互動。

多重筆記，讓您一心多用 
• 併排處理兩個筆記
• 在筆記之間拖放手寫、輸入的文字和影像。

匯入、標註和分享 
• 匯入和標記 PDF、DOC、PPT、影像、GIF 等檔案。
• 使用文件掃描功能，輕鬆建立可搜尋的 PDF 檔。

尋找靈感並與他人分享 
• 在 Notability 藝廊上發表和瀏覽筆記。
• 尋找靈感、搜尋課堂筆記和下載範本。
--- 
在 iPad、Mac 和 iPhone 上免費下載 Notability。訂閱整年的 Notability Plus，解鎖無限制的高階筆記功能。訂閱可享：
• Learn 功能，由 AI 驅動的學習體驗。
• MyScript 手寫辨識和數學轉換技術。
• 無限編輯、音訊逐字稿、支援自動備份和 iCloud 同步等豐富功能。
--- 
除非取消訂閱，否則將會自動續訂，並且透過 Apple iTunes 帳戶收費 (價格因地而異)。
如需技術支援，請來信至 support@gingerlabs.com 聯絡我們的團隊。
隱私權政策：https://notability.com/privacy 服務條款：https://notability.com/terms 
Notability 是 Ginger Labs, Inc. 的註冊商標。

評論.標題: What kind of app has a paywall for WRITING MORE NOTES
評論.內容: Absolute dog piss app. Do not use. OneNote is miles better and DOESN’T HAVE A LIMIT ON HOW MUCH YOU CAN WRITE THAT EXPIRES AFTER TWO ENTIRE PAGES.

評論.標題: It’s amazing but a few flaws
評論.內容: This is a really great notes app but there are some issues. The main one is (this needs some explanation so) I was doing my science fair research when it suddenly said “You can only read your notes now no editing. You can renew on Jan. 25.” So now I can’t continue my researching. It’s overall great but definitely needs tweaking.
I love this app. I love the fact that allows you to record lessons, especially for those classes that are 3 hrs plus long. It also creates quizzes based on the chapters you are learning.

評論.標題: Best note-taking app for college students!
評論.內容: I did a lot of research on which app would be the best to take notes for my classes on my ipad. As a Pre-Med student, all of the classes I have to take I have to retain the information for Med school. This app is the most organized note taking app I tried (Free form, good notes, apple journals, etc.) Having all of my class notes in one spot and not collecting a thick heavy spiral every semester is so nice and convenient. You can download your lecture slides as a pdf and then share it to add it to your notes in Notability to then annotate directly on the slides or pdf your prof. gave you. You do have to get the annual subscription for the total benefits, but i think $15-18 ish dollars once a year is completely worth it, plus Notability has the cheapest subscription plan I could find. I recommend this app to everyone who wants to be able to make clean and neat notes with straight lines, perfect shapes (LOVED this feature for organic chemistry), and unlimited colors, writing utensils, and thickness of the ink. The best new feature has helped me a lot, where they use AI and take your notes you have written (or imported as a pdf or slides) and you can summarize all of your notes, and even make AI generated practice questions and quizzes! This helped me a lot with cramming for finals teehee. There are a lot of customization options in every aspect of your notes (page color, line sizes, lines, graph paper, music staff paper, color ink, ink thickness, crayon, sticky notes, highlighter, etc) Anyways, excuse the essay, but I highly recommend this app to someone wanting to switch to electronic notes!!!🤍🫶🏻

評論.標題: Fantastic app but they lost a star for forcing AI into the subscription
評論.內容: I am happy to pay for the app even thought I brought it and now I subscribe to it but AI features should be a different tier of subscription rather than raising everyone’s price.

I have been using notability for years and everything about it is amazing (I’ve basically stopped using planners and writing lists on paper bc of how much I love notability) and I haven’t really had any serious issues with it until now. 

Parts of things I have written on notes randomly disappeared while some remained. Sometimes the pencil doesn’t work even though I selected it. These are very recent problems and it is making it difficult to use notability now. 

Besides these new issues I’ve loved notability so much, it’s perfect for me as a student but these recent issues are hindering the things I need to do as a student. 

Some suggestions:
- be able to have multiple folders within subjects for more organization 
- make the text feature more user friendly 
- add a feature to choose if you would like notability to automatically delete blank notes 

I am so grateful for notability and I hope these new issues I have will be resolved soon since they create problems for me as I am writing notes and completing assignments in notability for classes as a student.

I do not know the technical term for it, but it would nice if you could  create your own textbox for a certain word click or hover over a word and it have more information. Sometimes I will write a word and not remember what the word means and it would nice to be able to hover over the text and the definition be there without actually being in the paragraph.  I hope that makes sense. I would REALLY love that feature. It would be so helpful. Also, if it could be done with not just typing but writing with an Apple Pencil in your own handwriting.  Also if pictures could be placed there too. Very cool!!
So convenient, easy to use, lots of features!
It’s very annoying how often I need to redownload my notes, why can’t they just stay on my device 😓
It’s really useful and I recommend it, but I think it costs money

Not that they need to fix anything; it's just that when there's a new feature, it feels like I just won the lottery.

Do NOT use this app.  In theory, the functions are great- and at first it will perform very well.  However, after around the second year I used it (once I was committed and all my notes were saved in the app), it started performing horrendously.  I use the app on my phone, Mac, and iPad.  None of the notes ever sync up, and now it almost never allows me to open notes on my iPad at all.  I just get a consistent loading sign, essentially locking me out of many of my notes at once.  This will occur for days at a time. This causes me to entirely lose access to the ability to annotate/handwrite on any of my saved notes— which was my primary reason for purchasing this app.  Multiple times, I had all my edits deleted, as they failed to save, losing significant amounts of work.  The app crashes constantly and fails in its reliability. I have never written a review for an app but I wanted to warn all users before it is too late for them— please make the switch to a functioning notes app.

Notability is one of the most frustrating apps I’ve ever used. At first, I was excited—it seemed like the perfect tool for organizing my notes and staying on top of my work. But after just a few hours of use, it stopped me in my tracks.

I was in the middle of taking notes during an important lecture when the app suddenly switched to read-only mode. Imagine this: I’m frantically trying to keep up with the professor, writing down key points, and then—bam!—the app refuses to let me type or annotate anything. Instead, I was left staring at my half-finished notes, completely helpless.

At first, I thought it was a glitch, but no. Apparently, I’d hit some kind of usage limit after only a few hours, and the app locked me out of editing unless I subscribed to their premium plan. There was no warning, no grace period, and no way to continue taking notes without paying up.

This threw my entire week into chaos. I missed out on notes for multiple classes while scrambling to find an alternative app. I felt blindsided and frustrated—if I’d known this would happen, I never would have relied on Notability in the first place.

If you’re considering downloading Notability, be warned: the free version is basically a trap. It lures you in, gets you comfortable, and then blocks you from using key features unless you fork over money. Save yourself the stress and find an app that doesn’t pull stunts like this.
There’s a usage limit. What’s even the point of having a free version then? I can’t use the app, and I’m not buying a subscription to take notes.

I took notes using this app for two lectures and immediately it began pushing me to pay for more storage space, literally what am I supposed to do with that? The features aren’t good enough to warrant such a paid plan pushing app.

If I can’t use your app without a subscription, you shouldn’t be allowed to call it free

This has been extremely frustrating, as the AI functionality was the primary reason I downloaded the app. I had high hopes for this feature, but it has left me very disappointed.

To make matters worse, I requested a refund from Apple, but my request was denied. This added to my frustration and dissatisfaction with the overall experience. I hope the developers can address these issues in future updates to prevent others from facing similar problems.

評論.內容: Was great, but I updated it and lost a lot of functions I depended on. Worst one is auto-backup just does not work anymore. Expecting better tech support from an app I pay for.

In the middle of taking notes for my lecture today I got a notice that I had “reached my editing limit”for the day and was put into read only mode and when I tried to create a new one a subscription menu pops up instead… So apparently once I write enough in one document I get locked out and can’t create a new page at all, and if I want to continue writing my notes I have to pay for a subscription. I couldn’t take notes for the rest of my lecture and I missed some parts because I was panicking trying to figure out why I couldn’t write anymore. Notability used to stand out for its availability and the fact you didn’t have to pay to use basic features, I know that’s why I downloaded it and have used it for so long but this new update means I now have to find another app to use because I don’t have the spare money to pay for a subscription as I’m in college which is really disappointing and just adds more work to my plate since I have to now move ALL my notes over into another app.
This app is helping my ADHD riddled brain be more organized. It’s simple to use, which is huge for me because of my overstimulation issues. It has lots of templates available to suit my needs.

應用名稱: 愛掃描 (iScanner): PDF掃描儀&OCR文字識別
應用描述:
你是否正在尋找一款先進、可靠的掃描儀？
iScanner作為排名第–的掃描與文件管理工具，可以隨時隨地、輕鬆建立專業文件。即使沒有筆記型電腦或掃描列印機，你也可以透過iScanner在任何地方工作和學習。

適用於iPhone和iPad！

文件掃描
我們的智慧掃描儀是遠端與移動辦公人士、學生與教育工作者，以及所有小型企業相關人員（會計師、不動產經紀人、經理或律師）的必備工具。將你需要的檔案數位化–合同、納稅申報單、票券、收據、手寫便簽、作業–並匯出為PDF、JPG、DOC、XLS、PPT或TXT！

雲端儲存
– 將你的檔案儲存在安全的雲端伺服器中
– 即時同步項目和資料夾
– 從任意平台或網頁瀏覽器傳輸和查看檔案
– 隨時存取和管理文件
– 在你的所有裝置上共用–個訂閱項目

AI工具
– 自動檢測和調整文件邊框
– 校正掃描頁面，消除彎曲和歪斜
– 辨識20+種語言的文本

免費的全功能PDF編輯器和文件管理器
– 使用色彩校正和噪點移除功能來編輯掃描文件
– 在你的掃描文件上手動簽字，或從圖片中加入簽名
– 標記文件，覆蓋或模糊不需要被看到的文字
– 在表格上新增文字，或使用自訂模板自動填寫文件
– 使用檔案管理器及其便利的資料夾和拖放功能
– 使用PIN碼鎖定資料夾和檔案，來保護你的機密掃描文件
– 將多個文件合併為–個文件，或按頁面分割檔案
– 給你的文件頁面編號、插入頁尾，以及加入浮水印

多種掃描模式
• 文件–隨時隨地掃描多頁面文件
• 身份證與護照–為你的個人證件建立掃描版本
• 數學–解答數學題和複雜方程式
• 面積–測量物體的長度並計算其面積
• QR碼–使用你的裝置相機來讀取任意QR碼
• 計數–自動為相似物體計數

應用描述:
玩美 AI 繪圖 — 最棒的生成式 AI 圖片製作 app，透過 AI 魔法將腦中無限創意化為現實！只需要輸入簡單的文字提示並挑選喜歡的藝術風格，玩美 AI 繪圖就會在幾秒內將您的概念轉變為引人注目的傑作。現在就釋放您的想像力，踏上一場迷人的 AI 藝術之旅吧！

探索玩美 AI 繪圖的無限可能：

▲文字轉藝術
生成式 AI 的藝術性，能夠將文字轉為圖像，讓您發現更多有趣、好玩之處！想像一隻兔子太空人在月球種胡蘿蔔，或者希望透過新的藝術視角重新構想一幅永恆的作品，這些都不再只是天馬行空的想像！只需要描述您的想法，就能獲得符合不同尺寸的 AI 生成藝術圖像。您還可以盡情探索 AI 生成圖片的各種藝術風格，增添更多樂趣！

▲照片轉藝術
不僅限於文字，照片也可以轉換成神奇的藝術作品！只要上傳圖片，就能看到您的圖像被轉變為高品質的 AI 頭像。

▲創造獨一無二的 AI 虛擬大頭貼
準備好用時尚造型展現自己了嗎？上傳 10 張自拍照就能被轉化為數百張獨特的 AI 社群頭貼，一起解鎖奇幻的虛擬世界。還能從超過 25 種豐富的風格中進行挑選，包括貴族、復古、科幻、日本動畫電影等造型。

▲為心愛的萌寵打造寵物 AI 頭像
我們的寵物 AI 虛擬頭貼功能，將為您的貓狗毛小孩創建特別的大頭貼，帶領他們變身成華麗的超級英雄、嘻哈風或是小廚師等造型，透過 AI 呈現寵物的多樣個性，還能以全新的藝術形式展現出來！

▲隨時隨地進行 AI 藝術創作
無論您身在何處，都能體驗 AI 的無限創造力。例如將文字或是圖像轉為 AI 生成藝術，玩美 AI 繪圖都提供一系列的風格款式，而且整體使用過程非常好上手。現在就開始大展身手，將您的創意在幾秒內轉為現實吧！

▲AI 物件移除
拍出曠世巨作卻被雜物搶走風采？趕快試試我們最新的 AI 物件移除功能，再也不怕照片主題失焦，輕鬆為你消除照片上不想要的物件！

▲AI 物件取代
想把手上的保溫杯變成獎盃？頭上的鴨舌帽變成大草帽？AI 物件取代都能輕鬆做到！只要圈選物體並輸入文字，輕鬆取代照片上的物件！

不要錯過好玩、有趣又令人驚豔的 AI 生成藝術功能！玩美 AI 繪圖為藝術世界打開大門，邀請您在這裡將想像力無限延伸。立即開始創作屬於您的獨特藝術作品吧！

I had to learn to refine my ai prompts several times to obtain my desired results, but I’m learning how to word things.  I have found the youcam line of products, while powerful, are fairly easy to learn if you are persistent and determined.  I think the $40 a year is a fair price for the power of this app! Thank you!

評論.標題: Get Rid of Subscription Model, Add 1 Time Purchase
評論.內容: I would have rated this a 4 or 5, but I give it a 2 because you can only generate 2 pics a day unless you buy pro. The only purchase options are monthly or yearly subscription models which are the worst. I stop using apps that only offer a subscription. If a 1 time purchase option is offered then I’d change my rating. There are so many AI art apps on the App Store right now that it’s over saturated. So many other apps offer a lot more for free than this app does. Some of them have way better art styles and a lot more art styles that aren’t just for pro users who pay. They also offer way more images generated per day and options to watch ads to collect credits to generate more images or remove the watermark. Do yourself a favor and use Starry AI instead of this app until it is updated to offer a 1 time purchase and better art options.

Just a few days after paying for Pro, they dropped a new update that ruined it. The AI Expand is now broke. I get an “inappropriate” content warning 99% of the time even if it’s just a hairstyle on a face I’m trying to extend. Worse than that, they removed several of my favorite Styles (zombie, horror, sci-fi, etc) and added Jade and Clay?! So, my dazzling new style choices are to turn everything green or make it mud.?

…Yass! They brought back the Horror styles boosted my rating back up.

應用名稱: Vidma Cut：Vlog 影片剪輯&AI 繪圖，動畫製作
應用描述:
剪影是一款易於使用的影片剪輯和製作App，提供超過 6000 首高品質音樂、200 多種精美特效和 1000 多種流行影片模版可供選擇，幫您快速提升影片製作速度和精美度，讓您編輯的影片在 Instagram、TikTok 和 Facebook 上輕鬆脫穎而出！

使用此應用程序，您可以輕鬆創建和製作影片，隨時捕捉您生活的點滴瞬間。 文字標題動畫、酷炫特效、質感濾鏡、精美貼紙、絲滑轉場應有盡有！

【免費的影片編輯和視頻製作軟體】
- 影片編輯界面清晰直觀，多軌道編輯，方便快速匯入不同素材開始剪輯。
- 免費下載使用，非常適用於社交媒體的影片編輯App。
- 支持對素材進行裁切、分開、刪除和調整素材順序。
- 提供免費的文字標題、轉場、特效供影片剪輯製作。
- 豐富的音樂曲庫幫你打造獨一無二的vlog。
- 適用於 TikTok、Instagram 等的全能影片編輯工具。

【添加音樂】
- 剪影內置 4000 多首高品質音樂可供影片編輯，且無版權風險。
- 支持對音頻文件做細緻的調整，您可以在添加前預裁剪音頻長度。
- 沒有喜歡的音樂？不要緊，您還可以從社媒影片中一鍵提取熱門音頻。
- 支持錄製畫外音、加入好玩的變聲效果等。
- 音樂和音訊支持調整為淡入/淡出效果。

【豐富的影片效果和濾鏡】
- 使用專業的濾鏡和精美的效果編輯您的影片。 每週都有新鮮出爐的特效效果，故障特效、運動模糊、復古、VHS、90 年代、3D、AI 特效等應有盡有。
- 電影級的畫面調色功能。 透過調整飽和度、溫度、曝光、亮度、暈影、褪色和對比度，讓您的影片或影片片段更接近大片效果。

【音樂影片製作】
- 多軌影片編輯應用程式。 輕鬆添加疊加影片、效果、轉場、貼紙和文字。
- 精確的影片編輯應用程式。 合併、複製、分割和剪輯您的素材。
- 隨時儲存草稿並稍後編輯。
- 根據需要重做/撤銷您的編輯。

【自帶多種背景的影片製作工具】
- 內置各種模板的幻燈片製作器。
- 可以快速調整影片畫布的寬高比，各種社交媒體規格可供切換。
- 支持一鍵裁剪、縮放、更改尺寸和縱橫比。
- 多種背景任你選：純色、漸層色、Instagram 上熱門圖案等。

【變速卡點】
- 提供預設的曲線變速效果。
- 輕鬆建立加速/慢動作影片。
- 速度提升時可旋轉維持影片音調，避免失真。
- 你還可以將影片倒放、並添加音樂進行卡點。

【專業影片編輯】
- 去除背景：支持從影片中移除背景，摳出人像部分。
- 關鍵幀：可通過關鍵幀的變化做出使靜態影像栩栩如生的效果。
- 色度鍵：用綠幕功能替換任何影片背景，放飛你的想象力。
- 畫中畫：疊加不同的素材並將它們混合在一起，創作出不一樣的夢幻效果。
- 凍結幀： 只需輕輕一按即可將影片畫面靜止，為您的影片增添一絲戲劇性。

【高清影片編輯器】
- 以 4K 解析度匯出並儲存視頻，不會造成品質損失。
- 將影片調整為任何適合社交媒體的大小並在任何地方共享。

應用名稱: 有趣的 3D 競賽 — 跑步和跑酷
應用描述:
有趣的 3D 競賽 是一款讓你體驗跑酷和奔跑的刺激的遊戲。你將在數百個充滿驚人和挑戰性障礙和陷阱的關卡中與對手競爭。這些障礙包括擺動的錘子、旋轉的鋸子、巨型球等等為了贏得比賽並到達終點線，你需要運用你的速度、技巧和策略。

但這個遊戲不僅僅是跑步。 這也是為了表達你的個性和風格。 您可以選擇許多不同的角色，從瘦到胖，從人類到超級英雄。 您還可以使用各種衣服和配飾來定制您的角色。 您可以用炫酷的舞蹈和手勢來慶祝您的勝利。

這還不是全部！ 有趣的 3D 競賽 還具有 有趣的城市 模式，您可以在其中創建帶有各種障礙和陷阱的自己的賽道。 用迷人的海灘裝飾您的城市，海灘上配有舒適的躺椅、色彩繽紛的遮陽傘、美味的冰淇淋和飲料店等等。 通過出售課程門票來賺取寶石，並用它們來升級您的歡樂城。 打造有史以來最令人興奮和最具創意的地方！

有趣的 3D 競賽 是一款讓您微笑、開懷大笑並享受樂趣的遊戲。 在數小時的娛樂和刺激中測試您的反應能力、策略和想像力。

該遊戲具有直觀的控制：按住即可運行，鬆開即可停止。 隨著你在關卡中不斷進步，它們會變得更具挑戰性，將你的技能測試到極限。

你準備好加入這刺激的行列了嗎？

應用名稱: 玩美AI修復 - 模糊照片變清晰 & AI畫質修復工具
應用描述:
您手機裡必載的 AI 照片修復 App，讓模糊照片立刻變清晰、提高照片與影片解析度！

玩美 AI 修復是一款一站式的 AI 智慧照片畫質修復 App，您可以將舊設備拍攝的老照片、下載的模糊照片或低解析度肖像照等照片細節還原，並修復成高解析度的清晰照片。

透過提高照片畫質，讓照片所紀錄的回憶不再模糊！只需輕點幾下，即可輕鬆修復照片，並與您的朋友和家人分享！

玩美 AI 修復的照片&影片修復功能：
• AI 智慧修復照片畫質
日常照也能有高畫質呈現。
• AI 智慧提高照片解析度
提高解析度修復回憶舊照。
• AI 影片畫質提升
一鍵輕鬆提升、修復影片畫質, 重現精彩片段。
•  AI 智慧模糊照片變清晰
讓模糊照片變清晰，還原美好時刻。
• AI 智慧照片降噪
減少照片顆粒感，自然還原銳利度。
• AI 智慧照片強化放大
照片放大不失真，更清晰且無損畫質。

用「玩美 AI 修復」工具為您的照片升級，不論是老照片、肖像照、產品照或夜拍風景照等都能一秒救援。

玩美移動使用條款(https://www.beautycircle.com/info/terms-of-service.action) 與隱私政策(https://www.beautycircle.com/info/privacy.action).

評論.標題: Single mother screwed over on trash app
評論.內容:
Requested a refund, denied. I downloaded this app and a few others in search of one that would slim down my figure in a video, and I saw marketing that promoted (subliminally, of course) a slimmer figure in a video after using the app for edits. I took the bait, and next thing I know I’ve got some sort of golden coin balance and I’ve spent some and made an in-app purchase during my free trial? 

I opted for push notifications, I was never alerted about the expiration of the free trial BUT I was prompted to come “check out the app” or whatever they said. It’s so obvious now, I feel so stupid. Straight up scam. So basically I’ve been auto-renewed for a SUBSCRIPTION and paid for some mysterious tool I’ll never use and nobody will refund me the $60.

Might I add—not only am I short $60 for Christmas time but this UNEXPECTED WITHDRAWAL from my bank resulted in an overdraft fee—two, to be exact. So an additional $10 that I’m supposed to just eat for an app that DID NOT DO WHAT IT ADVERTOSED
Was excited to find this app. Then I try my first video and find out I don’t have enough credits. $80 a year and then credits too. PASS

應用名稱: ChatArt: AI 聊天、創作與寫作
應用描述:
隨時隨地編寫、解答您的任何疑問。馬上與最新的AI工具開啟聊天！
與您的個人AI助手ChatArt迸發不一樣的火花！
使用了最新的ChatGPT API、GPT-4o、Openai-o1模型，ChatArt為您帶來全新的AI類人交互。 內建AI寫作助手可激發靈感，為您撰寫大綱、甚至創作長文，輕鬆解決任何寫作難題。
【獨一無二的 AI 虛擬大頭貼】準備好用時尚造型展現自己了嗎？上傳自拍照就能被轉化為數百張獨特的 AI 社群頭貼，一起解鎖奇幻的虛擬世界。還能從超過 25 種豐富的風格中進行挑選，包括萬聖節、貴族、復古、科幻、日本動畫電影等造型。
AI電郵寫作：輕鬆簡單獲取各類行銷、通告或銷售活動電郵！ChatArt可光速制定專業并吸睛的行銷資訊。 
AI文本摘要：通過應用先進算法，ChatArt能辨識文本中的重點信息并通過簡要、易於理解的方式將其呈現，確保重要資訊的傳達，讓您事半功倍。
【嚴謹細緻的校對助手】
得益于ChatGPT及GPT4o助力，ChatArt聊天機器人的AI校對助手更是其中的佼佼者，在分析您創作內容的基礎上，提出相關建議讓內容更顯專業。同時，ChatGPT及GPT4o讓您的創作盡善盡美。
AI校對：內構ChatGPT及GPT-4 API的ChatArt AI聊天機器人助您隨心使用任意的文體及腔調進行表述，同時確保文法、標點符號及拼寫準確無誤。
【AI即時語音功能】
內建AI即時語音功能，您可通過即時語音功能及與AI對話獲取您所需的內容。AI不僅可作為玩伴，為您提供情緒價值，更可進行口頭溝通，甚至成為您的外語學習教師。
【連網功能】
連網功能可在網路上搜索最新資訊，以便更精確、完善地回答您的即時提問。連網功能讓ChatArt更智能，解答更完善、全面以及迅捷。
AI聊天機器人-隨時隨地發問
想要與歷史偉人或商業大咖聊天？通過手機內的AI聊天問答機器人即可快速實現！您可尋求建議、獲取靈感及學習新事物。
【圖片生成及探索】
成為自己的藝術家：您可創想或描述一個您未曾探訪的地方，ChatArt的AI圖片生成可將您的奇思妙想轉換超正的圖片。此外，還可生成封面、社交媒體帖文圖片、明信片等。
Dall-e-3大大提升了圖片生成的精確率，也可通過您拍攝的圖片了解您身處環境：拍攝您身邊的任何事物，如建築、藝術品或風景，圖像擷取技術即為您提供相關信息。

【智慧輸入，AI鍵盤提升效率】
我們的AI鍵盤不只是輸入工具，它是一個整合了多種智慧功能的全面輸入解決方案，旨在提升您的寫作和溝通效率。 包括文法檢查、語氣轉換、翻譯、重寫等等。

【全能私人AI助理】
-寫作助理、數學解題、程式輔助
-AI影像產生器，激發創意靈感
-商業與財務諮詢，為您的決策提供數據支持
-社群媒體文案撰寫，讓您的內容更具吸引力
-語言學習與翻譯，打破溝通障礙

-健康與健身指導，個人化您的健康計劃
-輕鬆閒聊，讓日常對話更有趣
-心理健康支持，為您的情緒健康護航
-多功能應用，滿足各種需求

【選擇我們的理由】
1. AI Chat：智慧對話引擎
我們的AI Chat功能是您貼心的智慧夥伴，無論何時何地，您都可以向它提出問題或要求協助。 它不僅能夠回答各種問題，也能協助您撰寫文章、報告、電子郵件等各類文件。 AI Chat理解您的需求，提供個人化的解決方案，讓您的溝通更有效率。

2. AI 生圖：創意圖像生成
AI 生圖功能讓您的創意想法瞬間變成視覺藝術。 只要簡單描述您想要的圖像風格或主題，AI就能產生令人驚嘆的圖像。 AI生圖能幫助您快速實現創意，節省時間並提升作品的吸引力。

3. AI 辨識圖片：智慧型影像分析
透過AI辨識圖片功能，您的裝置能夠「看懂」圖片內容。 無論是辨識物件、場景或進行影像分類，我們的AI都能提供精確的分析結果。 這項功能在教育、設計、醫療等多個領域都有廣泛的應用潛力，是您探索圖像世界的智慧助理。

4. 即時資訊取得：最新資訊觸手可及
我們的APP能夠即時獲取互聯網上的最新信息，讓您始終保持信息的領先優勢。 無論是新聞、天氣、股市動態還是社群媒體趨勢，只需一鍵，您就能獲得最準確、最及時的數據，讓您的決策更加明智。

5. 預設Prompt：多功能智慧助手
我們提供了多種預設的Prompt，涵蓋寫作、程式設計、翻譯、教育等多個領域，讓您輕鬆使用AI的各項功能。 每個Prompt都是我們精心設計的，旨在簡化操作流程，提升使用者體驗。 無論是初學者或專業人士，都能快速上手，享受AI帶來的便利。

6. 語音輸入：智慧語音識別
我們的APP現在支援語音輸入功能，讓您與AI的互動更加自然便利。 只要對著裝置說話，AI就能準確辨識您的語音指令，將語音轉換為文字輸入。 這項功能特別適合在您雙手忙碌或需要快速記錄資訊時使用。

7. AI鍵盤：多維智能輸入助手
我們的AI鍵盤不只是輸入工具，它是一個整合了多種智慧功能的全面輸入解決方案，旨在提升您的寫作和溝通效率。

主要功能：

語法檢查（Check Grammar）：AI鍵盤內建的語法檢查功能可以即時識別並指出語法錯誤，幫助您確保文字的準確性和專業性。

語氣轉換器（Tone Changer）：透過語調轉換器，您可以輕鬆調整文字的語氣，無論是正式、隨意還是幽默，都能準確傳達您的意圖。

翻譯（Translate）：AI鍵盤提供即時翻譯功能，支援多種語言，讓您能夠無障礙地與世界各地的人溝通。

文字續寫（Continue Text）：AI鍵盤能夠理解您的寫作風格和上下文，幫助您續寫文本，保持內容的連貫性和一致性。

同義詞查找（Find Synonyms）：尋找合適的詞彙來取代或強調某個概念？ AI鍵盤的同義詞查找功能為您提供豐富選項。

改寫（Paraphrase）：需要重新表達某個句子或段落？ AI鍵盤的改寫功能可協助您以新的方式表達相同的意思，增加文字的多樣性。

詩歌化（Versify）：將普通文本轉換為詩歌形式，AI鍵盤的詩歌化功能激發您的創意寫作靈感。

段落生成（Paragraph）：AI鍵盤能夠根據您提供的關鍵字或主題，產生完整的段落，簡化您的寫作流程。

智慧回覆（AI Reply）：無論是郵件、訊息或社群媒體，AI鍵盤都能提供智慧回覆建議，節省您的時間，同時保持回覆的品質。

Try to get this to write something that is not extreme left wing and good luck. It will refuse and then have the gall to lecture you. I’d love a fair fight but they cut my space too short. That’s fear. Their primary argument is about scientific consensus. I’ll put Michael Crichton’s speech on that topic up against these programmers any day of the week. It reminds me of the fear on college campuses these days.  Global warming has all the marks of a religion that rejects questioning the tenets of a very flawed theory whose supporters know their careers depend on spouting support for the popular thesis, regardless of significant holes. If they question the orthodoxy, their funding sources dry up. Why are scientists whose work receives funding from a pharmaceutical company or the like, required to report that potential bias, but those whose entire careers depend on their allegiance to CC/GW and its vast sources of funding not also required to report that obvious bias?

應用名稱: PicMa: AI寫真 & 老照片修復 & 創作熱門藝術圖片
應用描述:
一鍵提升你的照片和影片！

PicMa 結合尖端的 AI 技術，提供簡單易用的設計，讓你隨時隨地為照片和影片進行專業級的增強。不論是修復家庭回憶、預測未來孩子的樣貌，還是創造動態瞬間如虛擬擁抱、親吻和舞蹈，一切都只需輕輕一按！

探索我們的 AI 強大功能：

BabyAI – 未來孩子預測： 想知道未來的孩子會長什麼樣嗎？只需上傳你和摯愛的照片，讓 BabyAI 幫你揭開未來的面紗！

AI Hug Video – 跨越時空的擁抱： 使用 AI Hug Video，和年輕的自己或遠方的摯愛互動，將照片轉化為溫暖的擁抱影片，拉近彼此的距離。

AI Kiss – 增添浪漫風味： 用 AI Kiss 為你的照片注入甜蜜，讓親吻效果令每一個瞬間更加生動。

Break Dance – 讓照片動起來： 用 Break Dance 功能為靜態照片帶來活力，讓你的影像展現出舞動的魅力。

Video Enhance – 升級影片質量： 立刻提升影片的清晰度、顏色和整體質感，讓每段影片都能驚豔四座。

一鍵增強： 迅速改善人像、寵物照片、風景等的質量，讓你的每張照片都充滿魅力。

舊照片復活： 去除刮痕和模糊，讓舊的、褪色的照片重現光彩，珍貴的回憶重新煥發活力。

黑白照片上色： 為黑白圖像增添生動的顏色，讓它們看起來既現代又充滿活力。

延展圖片邊緣： 無縫擴展你的照片，展示更多精彩的場景。

去除不必要的物件： 輕鬆清除照片中分散注意力的元素，讓畫面更整潔。

專業調整： 使用高級編輯工具對照片進行微調，讓每一張照片都完美無瑕。

AI 轉換： 借助 AI 技術探索創意項目，創造出獨特的藝術作品。

AI 圖片生成： 利用生成式 AI 發掘新風格和視角，讓你的作品更具創意。

為什麼選擇 PicMa？

成為數百萬用戶的一部分，他們信任 PicMa 來增強、修復和轉換照片與影片。體驗簡單又創意的生活，讓專業效果隨手可得。

訂閱計劃：

透過我們靈活的訂閱選項，解鎖高級功能，包括每週、每月或每年的計劃。付款將通過你的 iTunes 帳戶進行，且續訂過程簡單易管理。

聯繫我們：

如有任何問題或需要支持，請隨時聯絡我們： picma_support@magictiger.ai

使用條款： https://magictiger.ai/picma/termsofuse.html
隱私政策： https://magictiger.ai/picma/privacypolicy.html

與我們聯繫：

Facebook.com/PicMaAI
Twitter.com/PicMaAI
instagram.com/picma_official

Lost all photo history!

I initially went from free version to premium, as it did a fantastic job recovering and restoring blurry pictures. It worked like magic in the beginning, giving excellent results every time. However, over time, the app has taken a sharp turn for the worse. The performance has decayed significantly, with the quality of restoration becoming mediocre at best. To make matters worse, they are now pushing users to go "Pro" and charging more money for features that were once available in the premium version. It feels like they’re asking us to pay more for the same functionality that worked perfectly in the past. This has been a frustrating experience, and I can no longer recommend the app in its current state.

應用名稱: 快剪輯-零基礎掌握視頻編輯製作
開發者: Wenzhou XunChi Digital Technology Co., Ltd.
應用描述:
海量模板與教程，強大的視頻剪輯工具
快剪輯是【抖音、快手、B站、朋友圈】等平台用戶強烈推薦的一款視頻剪輯軟件，無論你是入門新手還是視頻剪輯專家，都能創作出被熱門推薦的精彩視頻。
快剪輯每周更新【剪輯教程】教你快速制作出跟達人一樣的爆款短視頻和Vlog作品，剪輯小白秒變吸贊紅人！
【快剪輯特色功能】
「AI寫真」簡單操作，一鍵生成寫真大片，無需等待。多種寫真模板，證件照、形象照等風格千萬選擇，輕鬆體驗不同妝造魅力，實現寫真自由！
「關鍵幀動畫」輕松實現自定義動畫效果
「裝飾素材庫」每周持續更新，助你上抖音熱門
「AI快字幕」快速生成vlog同期聲字幕，再也不用手敲字幕了
「多視頻層混合」玩轉雙重曝光，把平淡無奇的視頻變成吸引眼球的佳作
「超級色度鍵」一鍵實現背景摳像
「高清錄屏」爲遊戲視頻提供高清順暢的錄屏體驗
【剪輯功能豐富，全能型選手】
「拆分」以幀爲單位的精確拆分，一段素材一分爲二
「拼接」多素材拼接成一個完整視頻，支持調換順序
「修剪」任意調整素材的時間，快速掐頭去尾
「編輯」任意比例裁切，去除不需要的畫面區域
「旋轉」調整視頻方向，支持90度旋轉上下左右翻轉
「轉場」預置數十款無縫酷炫轉場，可定義轉場時長
「變速」快、慢變速，輕松get儀式感變速視頻
「倒放」一鍵倒放，制作特效小視頻
「定格」抽取視頻畫面轉爲圖片，123木頭人
「變焦」十款變焦效果，實現畫面推拉搖移
「音頻分離」輕松提取全網視頻裏的音頻
「4K」支持4K像素視頻素材編輯
「高幀」支持最高240 fps高幀率視頻編輯
【編輯功能強大】
「濾鏡」多個電影級系列濾鏡：風景、人像、電影、膠片、美食等
「畫質」色溫、色調、Gamma和顆粒等18款畫質調節參數，只需稍加修改，視頻的效果就會大不相同
「光效」炫酷的視覺魔法光效，賦予視頻氣氛的霓虹
「特效」數十款特效，快速制作酷炫技術流視頻
「混合模式」柔光、顔色加深等 10 種視頻混合模式
「音樂」提供當下熱門的抖音音樂，並支持本地導入
「音效」海量音效素材，靈感不枯竭
「變聲」聲音秒變精靈、磁性大叔
「音量」不僅支持靜音、音量調節更支持聲音淡入淡出
「字體」數十款正版字體庫
「貼紙」數百款靜態、動態貼紙素材
「動效」預置5款動畫效果，制作動態貼紙字幕
「背景」支持純色、漸變、貼圖和毛玻璃背景效果
「水印」用戶自定義水印，做好視頻防盜

還有更多主題模板等待你去發現

「導出」支持自定義分辨率和碼率導出保證質量和效率
「分享」支持快速分享至社交平台

評論.標題: Made it Rank #32 and I realized something…
評論.內容: I dolphin’d in the game and spent a couple bucks but for the most part I was f2p. I made friends with someone who was always ranked top 30. After grueling months of rolling for good characters. I finally got to a point where I made it to rank 32. One day, the friend I first met in the game made it to #3. I got a message saying I was the new owner of my friend’s clan. I was so confused I asked him why he gave me his clan. He said something that stuck with me and made me quit 2 days after. “The commitment is too much, winning and being at the top feels good but not fun anymore. I want to spend time with my family. Thank you for being my friend.” I realized how much time I committed to the game the next day and quit cold turkey. The concept is great, battle chess is fun. I love this game but cannot play it anymore. It’s very addictive, play in moderation, don’t get obsessed with ranked.

評論.標題: Feels like an Old school gacha
評論.內容:
This game feels like a relic, even though it launched in 2017, but I dig those vibes. 

The game is very generous towards new players and has lots of systems that are fun to interact with. Are they systems designed to drain you of your cash? Yes, but at least they did a good job designing it. 

However it’s not the best experience. The story is ok, I personally have been having difficulty connecting with it; probably because of how it’s presented, very static cutscenes in between battles which aren’t super engaging to begin with.

In that note, yes strategy is involved in setting up your units, you can get very technical about it, but after that you just watch them, combat is automatic and you get no input, it’s not very dynamic.

It does have the benefit of being an older game, which means there’s lots to do, but most of it you have to slog through.

Maybe if this game out in 2010 I wouldn’t be so harsh on it, but even when this game came out there were better mobile games out there, and there still are.

Fortunately they have a sequel that’s pretty good, even if it does crash a lot. You don’t need to play this to play that, go try Brown Dust 2.

評論.標題: f2p friendly, best gacha game in a while
評論.內容: I routinely download a bunch of gachas without any intent to spend much but this one has stopped that trend. the mechanics might seem daunting at first but all of the information is there to be ignored or utilized at your leisure. the game likes rewarding you just for playing it, and costumes and the like are still accessible to a f2p dedicated player. refreshing and beautiful, this game has captured me for a while.

I love the designs and mechanics of the game regardless of the super easiness of the game. I love the auto battling and the incredible anticipation of the outcome of the insane battle is great. I love the graphics and the overall quality of the game. 9.5/10. For sure for sure!!

I have logged into this game for over 1000 days over the course of the last couple of years and in total I have only spent 28 dollars 

Overall the game is very fun and can keep you sucked in for a long time. The artwork is amazing and the amount of characters is nice as well. As a f2p player you can get lots of gems and materials from doing normal weeklies and events that will allow you to pull many characters. So as an f2p definitely worth giving it a shot. 

The only reason i didn’t give it a 5 star is that while they do make a good amount of content somewhat regularly it can get very repetitive after playing the game for months on end and for that reason I ended up taking many breaks from the game. But in the end this is one of the only games that I keep coming back too.
Having a good time, better than some of its competitors for sure. Plus great artwork.

應用名稱: 搜狗输入法-语音变声斗图表情
應用描述:
====== 炫酷功能 ======

‣ 卓越拼音\语音\手写\笔画\文字扫描\跨屏输入
‣ 词库强大、本地深度学习模型、流畅高效，搜狗总能懂你
‣ 快捷分享图片\影音\资讯，让表达更简单
‣ 炫动皮肤、DIY按键音\壁纸，键盘你做主
‣ 随心定制皮肤背景、按键形状、动效、字体、按键音 
‣ 小字\花漾字\图片字，玩出文字花样
‣ 全量Emoji\全类图形\标记\音标\字符\符号
‣ 鲜萌颜文字，潮流弹幕\朋友圈\流行语
‣ 热门表情、DIY斗图，不玩别人玩剩的

===== 快捷小窍门 ===== 

【移动光标】左右划键盘能方便地移动光标
【文字扫描】可以直接识别出照片中的文字
【点划输入】向上划能直接输入数字和符号
【手写注音】手写输入生僻字可以得到读音
【键盘手写】不用换到手写键盘，直接在拼音键盘写
【单手键盘】一秒切换大屏，方便单手操作
【闪光语录】热门流行语，自定义语录，助你花式表达
【滑行输入】手指不离键盘，行云流水快速输入
【韩语键盘】能换皮肤、发表情，사용을 환영합니다.
【开挂模式】三连发、说三遍、回声模式、聊天开挂，怼人更爽

===== 常见问题解答 ===== 

【1】 App Store更新搜狗输入法失败怎么办？
重启手机或开启「允许完全访问」后，不调起键盘直接去App Store点击更新。

【2】 如何启用搜狗输入法？
添加键盘：下载安装搜狗输入法，进入系统设置 - 通用 - 键盘 - 键盘 - 添加新键盘 - 第三方键盘 选择 搜狗输入法 -"搜狗输入法" - 开启「允许完全访问」- 完成
使用键盘：打开任何输入框 - 按住小地球键 选择 "搜狗输入法"

【3】 更新后，键盘列表出现(null)无法切换到搜狗输入法怎么办？
由于系统原因，可能会出现输入法更新后键盘丢失的问题，请进入系统设置 - 通用 - 键盘 - 键盘中删除"搜狗输入法"，再重新添加即可解决

【4】如何启用云输入、表情、皮肤、按键音、快捷短语等高级功能？
进入系统设置 - 通用 - 键盘 - 键盘 - "搜狗输入法" - 开启「允许完全访问」

【5】 如何使用3D Touch快速切换到单手键盘？
支持3D Touch的设备，用力按键盘的任意一侧即可快速呼出单手键盘，方便单手输入。

【6】 为何已经开启过允许完全访问，换肤、通讯录词库等功能仍然不可用或App设置不生效？
可能「允许完全访问」已经失效。
请进入系统设置 - 通用 - 键盘 - 键盘 - "搜狗输入法" - 重新打开「允许完全访问」

【7】 如何使用左右滑动键盘移动光标功能？
首次安装用户可直接在键盘上左右滑动实现光标的移动。
注意：滑动键盘移光标功能在滑行输入状态下不生效。
升级用户可以在 搜狗输入法App - 设置 - "左右滑键盘移动光标"选项中开启此项功能。

【8】 如何输入按键字母上方的符号？
向上滑动按键，可以快速输入按键字母上方的符号。
如果您不喜欢字母上方的符号，可以在 搜狗输入法App-设置-常规设置-“字母键的上滑符号”选项中关闭此项功能。

【9】 如何切换到其他键盘？
按住键盘右下方的“中/英 小地球”，在弹出菜单中选择“切换输入法”即可切换到您键盘列表中的下一个键盘。

有啥疑问和意见，欢迎随时联系我们：
用户反馈：搜狗输入法App - 设置 - 用户反馈
反馈/新功能试用QQ群：262063114
官方微博：搜狗输入法技术支持

您的支持是我们前进的动力。

評論.標題: 切换成英文输入时还保留着上次输入结果
評論.內容: 比如在网页上输入"apple"，按回车，搜索出结果，再进行第二个词搜索时，因为我设置默认是中文输入，所以要点一下（中/英）切换成英文输入，这时会发现输入法备选词里还保留着apple，没注意的话会接着apple继续输入，原来想要打banana的，结果就成了applebanana。即使注意到了，也需要手动删除apple再输入banana，非常烦人
你去死吧一点都不准
更新后反而一堆bug

特别喜欢搜狗输入法，键盘都特别特别好用，就比如说光标它可以直接在键盘上滑动就可以移动。我本人喜欢用9键，这个键盘左边的符号也特别特别的便捷！！还有重输按键我已经离不开它了！！而且这里面还有超多超多可爱的键盘我特别特别喜欢！！而且还自带翻译，就是语音输入还需要再加强，使用的时候需要跳转到应用挺麻烦的（当然苹果用户没这个烦恼键盘右下角自带语音输入）还有这个英文键盘也很好用！！除了比较容易点错以外输入时上面提供的单词很多很方便！！还有数字键盘也很好用左边也自带符号而且还能给你直接算出来。符号大全里面的可选符号也很多很好用特别是有箭头和拼音这类的！！还有这个键盘可以按照你的打字习惯来记忆你常使用的词汇这点真的很喜欢，就是有的时候一个词打错多遍以后都第一个出现的词都是这个挺麻烦的吧。还有就是手写也做的非常全面可以直接叠加书写外瑞古德！！还可以在应用里添加词汇包，以后有的游戏用语也会直接跳出来也特方便！！还有紧跟时代有些梗也能直接打出来还有诗词等，就是感觉有些跳出的歌词有点过于老了希望可以增加点热歌进去。然后呢就是这个打错矫正也是最最基本的了算正常发挥（苹果自带键盘你学学啊！！）接着就是这上面的小表情按键也很好用可以直接进去找想要emoji。还有就是闪光语录也很好玩就是我平时用不上吧因为还要去翻我嫌麻烦。有的时候找不到想要的字键盘上面的选项还会跳出手写的选项也很方便哈哈哈。说到手写，我在遇到不会念的字的时候都是直接进去写出来看左上角他给我标注的拼音的也是个好用的小技能。以及右上角小叉叉点掉后的那个收起键盘的小按钮也很好用，就比如有的时候遇到键盘没法点屏幕收起的时候就能发挥它最大的用处了！！最后就是很喜欢键盘的音效和动效都很治愈很喜欢，还可以自己免费做键盘也是特别好评！！几乎都是免费的键盘手感大部分都还特好也很美观也有能符合各代人的审美的键盘。最最后夸一下打错字后删掉还会出现同音字和同音词让我们大概率不用再打一遍的小功能。豪惹个人觉得搜狗输入法是国内做的最好的一个输入法软件了！！直接爱上使我的脑袋旋转——都去用！！
不知道是出于什么样的原因，搜狗居然决定在输入法上面加一个大写加粗的S。作为一个输入法，简洁好用就可以了，为啥要喧宾夺主？

應用名稱: VSCO: Photo & Video Editor
應用描述:
VSCO 讓您充分展現自我。 我們提供創意照片和影片編輯工具以及靈感，讓您有個地方做自己。

與 #VSCO 分享您的照片和影片，讓 VSCO 有機會曝光這些作品。我們熱切期待您的創作成果。

免費照片編輯器
運用 10 個免費的 VSCO 預設效果，將您的攝影技巧提升到更高境界。輕鬆匯入並編輯原始照片。使用對比度和飽和度等編輯工具讓照片更突出，也可以使用顆粒效果和淡化效果來增添質感並模仿類比電影效果。使用裁切和拉伸來調整或實驗照片透視角度。使用秘訣來儲存與重新創作您最愛的編輯。

進階照片編輯工具
加入 VSCO 會員，就能使用 VSCO 的完整預設效果圖庫，包括 200 多個預設效果。透過 Film X 重現柯達、富士、Agfa 等其他廠商製作的懷舊風電影效果。運用 HSL 和分割色調等進階照片編輯工具。使用飾邊為圖片加上有特色的邊框。

影片編輯器
使用等同於照片編輯器的高級 VSCO 預設效果和進階編輯工具，在行動裝置上讓影片脫胎換骨。透過 HSL 來調整白平衡和測試顏色控制。透過 DSCO 輕鬆創作短片 GIF 圖檔。

VSCO 剪輯
使用影片、圖像與形狀圖層來製作動態拼貼，用影片說故事。慶祝美好時刻、描繪情緒，也可用工作室現成的相片與影片試做。調整媒體圖層的不透明度，建立風格多元的自訂凝膠顏色與雙重曝光。

連結創意社群 
在「發現」頁面中探索帶來靈感啟發的相片、影片和評論。尋找認識的人並聯繫 VSCO 上的好友。以日誌創作。透過專屬於 VSCO 會員的每週照片挑戰，嘗試新東西。

會員試用期與訂閱條款
透過 7 天的免費試用期展開您的 VSCO 會籍。試用期結束後，系統會向您收取一筆年度訂閱費用。除非您在目前訂閱期結束前至少 24 小時關閉自動續訂，否則 VSCO 會籍將自動續訂。您可以依序前往「設定」>「iTunes 帳戶和 App Store」>「Apple ID」>「訂閱」，管理會員設定並關閉自動續訂。確認購買後，系統將透過您的 iTunes 帳戶收取費用。

請在此深入了解我們的條款和細則 -
http://vsco.co/about/terms_of_use

請在此深入了解我們的隱私權政策 -
http://vsco.co/about/privacy_policy

評論.內容: literally the worst app ever

VSCO used to be my favorite photo sharing app but recently in the past few years and not for sure months EVERYTHING is a paid feature and to top it off they finally got ads. Stupidly enough it’s ads for Instagram which is the app most people are avoiding and why they’re posting on VSCO in the first place. Ads but getting harassed every few min to buy something I think the VSCO glory days are finally over, such a shame.

It’s crazy to see VSCO get so money hungry after years. I have used this app for around 13 years now on and off, just to add some cute filters and whatnot. There were filters you had to pay for but not many tools. I decided to download it and use it again after two years, I saw that you need to pay for nearly every feature, even something as simple as highlights and shadows. It’s so sad to see now, no point in downloading when several apps and your phone can do the same exact thing for free.
Just got a subscription renewal when I’m pretty sure I canceled it after a couple weeks because it wasn’t a very good platform. No way get a refund even though the renewal he just went through.

I’ve been on VSCO for about 6-7ish years and as much as I love the app, it’s not as friendly as it used to be. Certain editing features, filters and capturing modes are behind a paywall now. I get the idea behind a membership, especially with the immense amount of filters offered and for more serious photo artists. However, a part of the apps appeal was the easy access to a wider variety photo editing capabilities as opposed to Adobe or the more expensive options. Having to pay to post videos and boomerangs? That’s also really odd considering that no other app has you pay to post either of those since they are so widespread and basic features on every social media app. Locking basic editing features? Definitely interesting. I still love using the app to gain inspo and save memories though.
Recent update screwed up one thing. Where the picture was taken place doesn’t show up.

評論.標題: Keeps getting worse with every update.
評論.內容: I don't know how they keep making this worse but they do. Constant pop ups for "account updates". Basically trying to get you to pay a monthly subscription fee. I already pay a yearly fee. The import feature is somehow drastically worse. It keeps the pictures you imported last time. Super confusing. Terrible app. How this has a 4.7 rating I don't know.

評論.標題: Do not buy an annual membership
評論.內容: The features are pretty good, but lots of other apps do similar. Do not waste your money on an annual membership if there is any chance you may switch from apple to android or vice versa. The annual membership is not transferable, even if you paid for it just a month  before. In addition, you have to wait until the previous membership runs out to get a new annual membership  or make a new account. Which,  by the way, costs $30 more for Apple then it does on android for the same features. In addition, their support is close to worthless. They seem to only skim messages, not really analyzing the content at all and only use a set of pre-canned phrases to reply. I’ve been a loyal VSCO user for several years, but can’t see myself paying for a  membership ever again.
You have to pay for EVERYTHING

Please don’t ever change the fact there isn’t a way to see a number of followers or likes on a post. VSCO is like the only social media app that doesn’t have people’s follower amount posted and I LOVE THAT! Please don’t change it! Ever! ❤️

I was already frustrated with VSCO when they not only moved most of their filters behind a massive paywall, but also changed their interface so navigation was near-impossible. (I often had to totally close and reopen the app, just to return to pages that most apps would simply have a "Back" button for.)

But then VSCO deleted my entire account, and refuses to tell me which post of mine was apparently against the Community Standards.

I've had it with this app. If I could give it zero stars, I would. And it's a shame, because it had some cool filters. But if I can no longer access them, for reasons they refuse to disclose: zero stars. And I'll continue to warn others about my experiences.

That was the quickest I have ever downloaded and deleted an app. Everything behind a paywall, and not even worth the cost. I already pay for FaceTune and Photoshop which offer so much more for the price you pay so it’s an obvious choice. I was looking for an app to add text to a picture for a project, and remembered liking this app before. Looks like everything I liked about it is now locked and the app doesn’t offer much for free.

And so does VSCO! This a great photo filter and editing app that delivers quite a lot of goodies if you’re willing to ante up a subscription fee. For the record I’m on the more basic plan, not PRO, but that’s only because I like photos. If you love photos, and are well off, who am I to stop you from going all the way?

BONUS: I am a huge fan of the double exposure cam because I love taking them in camera, instead of trying to mash two shots together in post later. What would take the feature to the next level is the ability to change the zoom lens between exposures, like Hipstamatic.

評論.標題: No memory - has to reload every time.
評論.內容:
I can’t quite literally comprehend how this app went downhill. Besides all the UI bugs, this app can’t go 1 minute with out needing to refresh in the background and making me loose all my edits in the mean time. I’m serious, if I simply switch apps for a mere minute, by the time I switch back to VSCO it needs to load again from scratch. It’s like it can’t even use memory. 

So sad to see such a good app in the 2015 era go downhill. What a shame.

評論.標題: My favorite photo edition app ever!! Except it isn’t working right 😭
評論.內容: A little while ago I was going to use vsco to edit some photos but it wouldn’t load, it said “issue connecting to your account” or something along those lines. I deleted it and tried to sign back in but idk it just kept denying my email. I would really like to use this app again but unfortunately it won’t let me sign in
The app is good but dude, you gotta have a premium subscription to add borders!!! What? That’s beyond greedy

評論.標題: Not what it used to be.
評論.內容: Which is really sad. This app used to work consistently. Used to keep your edits and work. Didn’t constantly sign you out or have most of your work randomly go missing. Regardless of my phone, now with the best available, it’s the same problems and yet they want even more money, and are offering less features (of the same style and caliber) as other apps that cost less or the same. The quality has really dropped off hard. If my work is randomly going to go missing, the app lacks features and functionality of others, has the same type of film styles as others, I’m not sticking around. I’ve used this app for many years, and before it, had all the sets for Lightroom. It’s just not the same and it’s not worth it. I am tired of missing images, lost work and time, and tired of constantly having to restore my subscription. It’s just not keeping up with others providing better editing services of the exact same style. Sad.
I love VSCO
Literally every time I go to upload a pic from my camera roll it’s saying I have no albums or pictures when I do. So I literally can’t upload anything. This issue is present.

I did enjoy vsco before they locked all the tools under premium, it’s not something I use everyday so I don’t want to pay for the monthly or yearly subscription. I doubt you’ll be able to use anything for free here soon, very sad as it was a cute app to use but I’ll find something else now.

評論.標題: It will up your game but…
評論.內容: Have been using VSCO for many years and it has helped my Instagram game so much. And it has captured my moments when I lost photos from a phone transfer. Very helpful tools and I hope soon they will update the remove feature because it has been in Beta for so long… over all it’s a great app to fix lighting and add special charm to your photos.
Poo poo ca ca
They told me i was subscribing to the 4.99 monthly plan then when i payed it said i was paying 29.99 for the yearly. They apparently don’t do refunds?

If you want to create a community for photographers and editing enthusiasts, you need to be more flexible with profile customization. I can’t even add a profile picture without upgrading to a paid version—what a shame!
Slowest app ever, always sending nonsense, nothing ever loads.
The “free trial” takes your money even if you cancel days before the renew date and they don’t send you a confirmation email as proof. 0 stars. Scam. Also just a trash app made by losers.

Now don’t get me wrong, I love this app, it’s literally changed my life and helped me realize what I truly love to do: edit photos and post my art. However, for the amount of money I pay yearly for Pro, it doesn’t feel like the app functions in a way that’s even worth it anymore. When I’m editing pictures in studio, as compared to after I post them, some of the color and textures are different. It’s like all the work I put in to make my photos look exactly how I want, is all for nothing and it’s frustrating. Another thing is, is after you post it, the quality of the original photo is significantly reduced. I even tried VSCO on desktop to see if it helped, and it was actually worse quality. Also, this is the biggest thing that genuinely kind of makes me angry, is after I post my photos,  for some reason on select photos, it’ll add a white bar to the side of my photos. It ruins my feed and it ruins the quality and the aesthetic of my work. It literally makes no sense to me and I’ve tried everything to try and prevent it. The app crashes a lot as well, sometimes when I’m editing in studio and all the (sometimes hours) of work is gone and I have to restart. It’s a shame because there is really no other app like this out there and it doesn’t seem like I’ll be straying away from posting, but I also think the artists on this app deserve better. For me, and I’m sure for a lot of others, it brings me intense joy to see my work displayed beautifully. It brings me joy to edit and make art, especially with all the beautiful functions of pro. It’s something I’m extremely proud of (my profile and work) I just wish you guys would improve the overall quality of the app. I know you guys value us as artists, there’s just a lot of bugs and unnecessary glitches that have yet to be fixed, especially when you have subscriptions options where people are paying YOU guys for ‘pro,’ it shouldn’t be happening. Please, please, do better.

評論.標題: they stole my wife’s account and money
評論.內容: DO NOT GIVE THEM YOUR MONEY. they will not refund you if they decide to delete your entire account and they will not explain to you why they stole your account

評論.標題: 0/5 Stole my account and my money
評論.內容: I have had the same VSCO account since around 2017, this account was filled with priceless photos and memories as well as an expensive membership. Fast forward to two days ago, I was notified that VSCO PERMANENTLY DELETED MY ACCOUNT. They will not explain to me why it happened, they will not give me my account back, and they refuse to refund me the money I spent. DO NOT BUY THE SUBSCRIPTION!!!! you will be stolen from. VSCO, count your days.
Хуже редактора я еще не видел

I’ve been using this app for over five years. I am a plus subscriber and with their update my account lost the subscription that I have paid for. I have made multiple attempts at contacting them, but they make it a maze of inconvenient steps to resolve the issue. I still do not have access to the membership that I have paid for. I’m hoping that someone can reach out and fix this problem but it appears it is challenging to solve as a design. Poor customer service, even worse response rates.

評論.標題: SO buggy!!! (filters are good but what is the point when you can hardly import your photos)
評論.內容: For the past year I have had issues with this app, when I import, the photos don't show up in the editing bay like they normally would, and then if I import a second time, both photos show up which is a waste of space. Right now I have tried to import a photo about 10 times and it simply will not show up in the editing bay. Getting really frustrated with this app that I've been using for years and years. The filters are good, but the functionality is awful.

評論.標題: STOLE my MONEY and my professional PHOTOGRAPHY
評論.內容:
I am a birth worker who offers complimentary birth photography to my clients. I decided to use VSCO to edit photos for a client and signed up for their 7-day trial to use Pro. After the trial, I paid for a one-year subscription.

The VERY NEXT DAY, I tried logging in but kept getting a message that my password was wrong (which is impossible because I saved it to Chrome), but I went ahead and tried resetting the password. After several attempts, I never receive a link to reset my password. Hours go by and still no link to reset my password. I checked and searched my entire business email inbox.

The only thing I can think of is my profile was flagged by a bot as having illicit photos, even though my photography is modest and doesn't show any compromising photos of my client or her newborn.

I'm not a moron either and obviously made sure not to post any photos to the community tab, so I have no idea why VSCO would kick me out after taking my money and never explaining why.

I opened a support ticket (it hasn't been 24 hours yet, so haven't heard back), but I'm thinking of just going to my bank and disputing the charge and just getting rid of VSCO and actively advocating against VSCO to everyone I know. It's absolutely insane that birth photography would be flagged.
for some reason it will not let me sign into my old account or sign up for a new one. i am connected to my wifi while trying this. i have redownloaded it multiple times and powered off my phone.

This is a must have for iPhone photographers. Lots of great tools, brilliant set of presets, and a pleasant social media experience—what Instagram once was, a place to share and connect with photographers. 

While the subscription is a good price, there is an incessant pop up for more services. Ad nauseam. 

Lastly, performance is abysmal. With the most powerful iPhone 16 Pro, it loads photos to edit like a Window machine in ‘95 opening Photoshop. Can’t imagine why when more powerful editing tools load instantly.

I've been using VSCO since 2019 and it's been going downhill ever since. From removing the journaling feature to putting all the best photo editing features behind a paywall. This app just isn't what it used to be and definitely isn't worth the expensive subscription. Everything I can do on here editing wise I can just do using my Iphone's photo editing feature and using Ibispaint "noise" filter for the grainy effect. This app just doesn't have anything unique or fun for every day users who can't afford another expensive subscription.
But now they want to charge you for everything. No thank you I got other options.
Is rubbish app why did use guys block my vsco stupid app
I was charged wrongfully for a pro subscription some how and they refused to give me a refund even though i submitted the request as soon as i got a bank account notification.

評論.標題: Kept saying my account is unrecognized.
評論.內容: I’ve had this account for years. Never thought I’d lose it from it not recognizing my email or username. Won’t even let me make a new account either, as it just says error. Sad to see what this company became. Won’t be paying, renew or making a new account again.👎

Way too many fake spam accounts DMing asking to “use” pictures. Is this some glitch?? Your personal  profile picture is often times very blurry too. Just small minor loading issues as well, weird glitches everywhere i haven’t experienced before. Pitiful. Used to be my favorite app.

評論.標題: Good but sometimes won’t upload pictures
評論.內容: The app is amazing along with the presets even if you don’t buy it. My only problem is that when I go to upload pictures it doesn’t let me. Not sure why. I can still take pictures directly from the app and upload so I still use but it is frustrating. Otherwise love the app and highly recommend

評論.標題: THEY WILL CHARGE YOU EVEN IF YOU DELETE YOUR ACCOUNT
評論.內容: I received an Apple email stating my account will be charged $29.99 for a membership I don’t have. I’m not subscribed through my Apple ID and my account was deleted last year so I can’t access the information through the app. I cancelled it last year and deleted my account. An absolute SCAM company. I tried reaching out for support but the bot I was forced to talk to informed me deleted your account wouldn’t delete your membership (though I did both at once). FRAUDULENT COMPANY. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

Please make it private! I don’t want random people seeing my posts. I’m not aloud to show my face cuz it’s not private so my posts aren’t as cute 🤪 other than that I love it! Haha I like how there is no comments or choice of dislike so there is 0 drama!
love this app but plz make a mute option

I have been reaching out to them for weeks trying to get an account deleted that is connected to email I no longer have ! They keep sending me to different people/never getting back to me ! So infuriating.
This horrible app continues crashing out of nowhere. I’ve even updated to iOS 18.1.1 and it didn’t solve a single issue.
they updated the app and made it so much more confusing, adding an extra step just about anywhere you can think when trying to edit and post a photo. boo !

I’m an editor and use this app for the slow motion feature. Every time I go to export a video it does not render. I’ve tried updating, deleting, and re-downloading, restarting my phone, checking my storage, and updating my phone, but it doesn’t work.
Downloaded the app and was immediately asked to start a trial. Not free. Avoid.

᥆ᥒᥱ ᥆𝗍һᥱr 𝗍һіᥒg іsᥒ𝗍 𝗍һᥱrᥱ ⍴r᥆ᑲᥣᥱm ᑲᥙ𝗍 ᥆ᥒ mᥡ ძᥱ᥎іᥴᥱ і𝗍 mᥲkᥱs mᥱ ᥕᥲ𝗍ᥴһ s᥆mᥱ𝗍іmᥱs ᥲძs ᥆᥎ᥱr ᥲᥒძ ᥆᥎ᥱr. ᥣіkᥱ 𝗍᥆ძᥲᥡ, і𝗍 mᥲძᥱ mᥱ ᥕᥲ𝗍ᥴһ ᥲᥒ ᥲძ ᥣіkᥱ 9 𝗍іmᥱs. s᥆ mᥲᥡᑲᥱ ᥴһᥱᥴk 𝖿᥆r ᑲᥙgs. ᥲᥒძ і𝖿 ᥡ᥆ᥙr rᥱᥲძіᥒg 𝗍һіs ᥲᥒძ ᥡ᥆ᥙr ᥒ᥆𝗍 ᥲ ᥴrᥱᥲ𝗍᥆r, і𝖿 ᥡ᥆ᥙr ᥕ᥆ᥒძᥱrіᥒg ᥕһᥱrᥱ • 𝗍һіᥒgs ᥲrᥱ іᥒ, і𝗍s ძᥱ𝖿ᥱᥒ𝗍ᥣᥡ іᥒ 𝗍һіs ᥲ⍴⍴, ᥒ᥆𝗍 sᥙrᥱ ᥲᑲ᥆ᥙ𝗍 ᥆𝗍һᥱrs.

應用名稱: 愛字體 (Fonts Art) - 字體美化，鍵盤輸入法
應用描述:
遇見Fonts Art——幫助你在數位平台展示自我的終極工具包！擁有了這款應用，你將享有：

龐大的字體庫

500+款字體可供選擇，足以迎合你的每種心情和風格。無論你是要在Instagram和TikTok上建立貼文，還是在iMessage或WhatsApp的對話中傳送訊息，我們精美時尚的字體設計都會讓你的訊息脫穎而出。

多種鍵盤設計

讓你的鍵盤既實用又賞心悅目！選擇一款既符合你的心情，又能彰顯個人風格的鍵盤，讓你的手指在其上飛舞。

豐富多樣的符號

從符號和GIF，到主題標籤和表情符號，Fonts Art應有盡有，讓你的個人檔案更加新穎獨特，讓你的訊息更加令人印象深刻。

字體製作器

透過親手繪製每個字元來設計客製化的字體，為你傳送的每一條訊息打上你的個人烙印。

鍵盤主題製作器

設計一款能夠100%體現你的風格的鍵盤，讓你的指尖擁有一個既實用、同時顯然只屬於你的舞台。

唯美主題

探索風格統一、無縫融合為一體的原創背景圖片、應用圖像和小工具，透過你的螢幕彰顯你的獨特風格。

簡而言之，Fonts Art不僅僅是一個為你助力數位社交活動的工具包；它也是一個帶你通往無界限數位化自我表達的世界的入口。讓我們憑藉Fonts Art進一步提升你的網路存在感，吸引受眾，重新定義你的數位身分！

備註：你可以啟用免費試用來體驗所有功能。

無限制存取會員訂閱項目
• 你可以訂閱，以獲得無限制存取Fonts Art內所有功能的權限。
• 訂閱將按週或年收取費用，具體費用取決於訂閱計畫。

所有個人資料均受《使用條款》和《隱私權政策》保護：
https://aiby.mobi/fonts/terms/ 
https://aiby.mobi/fonts/privacy/

應用名稱: 翻譯器 GO: ai翻譯－圖片語音文字翻譯。即時且自動翻譯
應用描述:
採用先進的 AI 技術
提供 110 多種語言
即時提供照片、文字和語音翻譯！

認識已採用 AI 技術的全新語言翻譯軟體 Translator GO。對於每個想說出並聽懂任何外國語言的人，我們的翻譯應用程式都能派上用場。您總算可以跟尷尬的語言障礙說「bye」，有了這款應用，您就可以在旅遊和社交中有效溝通。離線模式讓您可在國外使用 Translator GO，而不需要支付昂貴的漫遊費用。不需要再搜尋 Wi-Fi！

輕鬆翻譯照片、文字和語音，共有 110 多種語言。

◉ 進階功能：

- AI 翻譯
我們的全新 AI 功能提供順暢的翻譯。只要輸入或複製要翻譯的文字、選取想要的語言，再交給我們的聊天機器人處理就好了。您也可以個人化自己的翻譯來符合個人偏好：調整語氣或產生替代翻譯來提升精準度。

- 語音翻譯
使用語音對語音翻譯，輕鬆進行對話。以任何語言了解別人並讓別人了解自己。

- 相機翻譯
拍下您想翻譯的任何文字的相片。有了這個工具，只需按下按鈕既可翻譯菜單、通告和文件。

- 文字翻譯
輕鬆翻譯字詞、短句和句子。只需輸入您想翻譯的文字，快速獲得結果。

- 文字轉語音/語音轉文字翻譯
輸入文字並獲得語音相應翻譯，反向也可成立。有了這些實用功能，練習您的發音並自信對談。

- 離線模式
帶著 Translator GO 旅行時，不再需要網際網路連線。不用再擔心漫遊費、尋找 Wi-Fi 或 4G/5G 的問題。隨時隨處皆可翻譯。

◉ 額外功能

- 文字自動更正
- 複製和分享翻譯
- 加速或減慢語音翻譯速度
- 自動語音功能，可聆聽正確發音
- 儲存您最愛的翻譯和翻譯記錄

◉ 支援的語言 

使用 Translator GO 時，您可將文字和語音翻譯至超過 110 種語言：

阿爾巴尼亞文、阿姆哈拉文、阿拉伯文、阿塞拜疆文、愛爾蘭文、愛沙尼亞文、奧迪亞文 (Oriya)，白俄羅斯文、保加利亞文、巴斯克文、冰島文、波蘭文、波斯文、波斯尼亞文、丹麥文、德文、俄文、法文、菲律賓文（塔加洛文）、芬蘭文、弗里斯蘭文（西）、高棉語（柬埔寨），古吉拉特文、哈薩克文、海地克里奧爾文、韓文、豪薩文、荷蘭文、吉爾吉斯文、加泰羅尼亞文、加利西亞文、捷克文、金雅萬達文、卡納達文、克羅地亞文、科西嘉文、科薩文、庫爾德文（庫爾曼吉文）、拉丁文、拉脫維亞文、立陶宛文、寮國文、盧森堡文、羅馬尼亞文、馬耳他文、馬達加斯加文、馬拉地文、馬拉雅拉姆文、馬來文、馬其頓文、緬甸文、毛利文、苗文、蒙古文、孟加拉文、南非文、尼泊爾文、挪威文 (Bokmål)、旁遮普文 (Gurmukhi)、葡萄牙文、普什圖文、奇切瓦語（馬拉維）、喬治亞文、日文、瑞典文、薩摩亞文、塞爾維亞文、桑他文、紹納文、世界文、斯洛伐克文、斯洛文尼亞文、斯瓦希里文、蘇格蘭蓋爾文、宿霧文英文、索馬里文、塔吉克文、塔塔爾文、泰盧固文、泰米爾文、泰文、土耳其文、土庫曼文、威爾士文、維吾爾文、烏克蘭文、烏爾都文、烏茲別克文、希伯來文、西班牙文、希臘文、夏威夷文、信德文、匈牙利文、亞美尼亞文、伊博文、意大利文、印地文、意第緒文、印尼文、約魯巴語、越南文、僧伽羅文（斯里蘭卡）、爪哇文、祖魯語、中文。

◉ TRANSLATOR GO PREMIUM 

可免費下載 Translator GO。升級為 Premium 版，可存取所有功能，您可隨時取消訂購。沒有額外費用！

使用應用程式需要網際網路連線。要啟動「離線模式」，您需要下載語言套件。

◉ 聯絡資訊

如需進一步資訊或應用程式支援，請透過 infotranslatorgo@mobileapptools.app 聯絡我們

https://mobileapptools.app/translations/term-of-use
隱私政策：
https://mobileapptools.app/translations/privacy-policy

應用名稱: 百度文库- 一站式AI内容获取和创作平台
開發者: Beijing Baidu Netcom Science & Technology Co.,Ltd
應用描述:
百度文库，一站式智能写作与文档资源集合平台，文档查找、AI内容生成、编辑，资料管理一应俱全的办公学习平台。

【AI智能生成 文档/PPT/思维导图等】
1. 根据输入的主题及内容要求，一键生成格式标准、内容个性化的范文；
2. 基于主题或文档，快速生成多图PPT，海量精美PPT模版随心选择，一键搭配应用；
3. 思维导图、研究报告、小红书/朋友圈文案、小说/漫画配图文案，也可快速生成，满足学习、工作、休闲等多场景写作需求；
4. 支持输入主题生成、基于文库文档生成或选择上传文档、模版进行生成，也可多文档合并参考生成，高效便捷一键搞定；
【AI随心编辑】
1. 智能总结与问答，精准提炼文章要点，充分理解和学习文章内容做出个性化回答；
2. 辅助润色美化文案，支持一键扩写、续写或改写内容；格式排版，查找替换，功能一应俱全；
3. 场景化伴随式交互，让内容创作与阅读更加流畅自如；多场景语音交互，简单口语化指令直接进行编辑或生成；
【海量文档资料查找】
12亿专业文档，内容涵盖各行各业，随查随用，一键搜索，智能推荐。
1. 实用文档：简历模版、PPT素材、心得体会、计划方案、公关文件、总结汇报、制度表格、英语学习、工作范文、考研资料等文档模版；
2. 教学资料：幼儿园、中小学、大学、职业教育等各阶段所需的课件教案，PPT模版、真题、习题、答案、作文、知识点总结、考研文件、教师工作文档、汇报PPT等；
3. 考试真题：英语四六级、英语专业考试、计算机二级、考研攻略、公务员、教师、会计、医药、建筑、证券、保险等资格考试真题、答案、习题、讲解PPT等； 
4. 合同模版：租房购房、店铺租赁、劳务借贷、汽车买卖、工程建设、赔偿申诉、离婚协议等； 
5. 专业资料：学术论文、报告、K12、考研、医药、建筑、法律、英语、财经等不同领域资料文件；
【资料库管理】
1. 最近浏览/收藏/下载内容随时查看，百度文库APP、文库小程序、文库网页多端数据实时同步；
2. 支持文件夹创建，文档进行分类管理，版面呈现更清晰，有效便捷查阅内容；
3. 支持上传本地文档或微信聊天记录中文件，个人私有化管理，数据隐私安全不外漏；
【实用工具】
1. 文档格式转换，如word、PDF、PPT等多格式进行切换；
2. 文档导入导出、打印、发送等快捷操作；
3. 语音速记、图片转文字等便捷功能；
4. 扫描查词、英语翻译等学习辅助工具；
各种实用工具，助你随时随地，高效工作学习。

【自动续费百度文库会员】
订阅名称：百度文库会员连续包月
时间：购买后立即生效
周期时长：1个月
如何取消：请手动打开苹果手机“设置”-->进入“iTunes Store与App Store”-->点击“Apple ID”，选择“查看Apple ID”，进入“账户设置”页面，点击“订阅”，选择百度文库VIP取消订阅即可，如未在订阅期结束的至少24小时关闭订阅，此订阅将自动续订。
隐私协议：https://tanbi.baidu.com/h5-business/browse/privacy_policy
会员协议：https://tanbi.baidu.com/san-home/vip_protocol
自动续费服务协议：https://tanbi.baidu.com/san-home/auto_pay_protocol

在百度文库，开启内容创作新篇章！

應用名稱: Motionleap：Lightricks打造的動圖製作工具
應用描述:
試試令人耳目一新的照片藝術！Motionleap 的動畫處理功能，把您的照片變得栩栩如生。可選擇把一個或多個部分動畫化，讓觀眾的目光聚焦到照片上任何地方。
 
Lightricks 繼 Enlight 獲獎創意套件後的新出品。我們開發了 Photofox、Leightleap 及 Apple 的年度年度最佳應用 Videoleap。
 
無限藝術可能
把照片任何部分作動畫處理：頭髮、浪、雲、或衣服。Motionleap 的各種功能讓您控制動畫處理的每個細節，把心目中的構想製作成完美的作品。選擇適合您作品的動態速度，達到想像中的效果：從燭光的微晃，到夢露被風吹起的經典白裙，層疊的瀑布，或上落的手扶梯。
 
簡易動畫處理照片
在照片上添加箭頭，來畫定動態的範圍。用錨定逐漸降低動畫化範圍內的速度。凍結照片中某些部分不動，使結果看來更真實。或者完全脫離現實，違反所有科學原理：讓水不受地心引力控制，向上流！
 
Motionleap 獨家製作
	簡單易用，專業效果。移動部件和用工具來控制照片中的動畫製作，最簡單不過了。
•	FX 照相機模仿電影中的動態，延伸您的創意。流行的照相機特效包括傾斜、放大和 Dolly，讓您嘗試不同的透視投影。
	全新幾何工具，使在移動設備上動畫處理的建築完素如樓梯、地板和走廊等，看來像真的一樣，細節盡善盡美。
	天空暗淡無色？有多種日落和藍天選項，供您用 AI 「自動」工具把它們動畫化。

高級功能
	自由軌道：直觀、寫意風格
	箭頭
	錨定
	凍結筆刷和取消
	實時控制動畫化速度
	多種重播選項
•	FX 照相機
	大小縮放
	火焰、雨點或其它覆蓋層，增添氣氛 
	隨您動畫處理照片中多少部分 
	以多種格式匯出到社交網絡
	無限制專案數目


- 使用條款：https://static.lightricks.com/legal/terms-of-use.pdf
- 隱私政策: https://static.lightricks.com/legal/privacy-policy.pdf
需要靈感嗎？為您的作品加上 #Motionleap 標籤，我們將分享最佳的照片！
